K12D0686_H0689:197a-1: a'arya aa go gha p'a sha kalpa r'a dza /
K12D0686_H0689:197a-3: 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho gzhib mo'i rgyal po /
K12D0686_H0689:197a-6: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12D0686_H0689:197a-7: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12D0686_H0689:197b-0: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa @197b dus gcig na /
K12D0686_H0689:197b-1: bcom ldan 'das ri bo po ta la na spyan
K12D0686_H0689:197b-2: ras gzigs dbang phyug gi pho brang shing s'a la
K12D0686_H0689:197b-6: aa ti mugta ka sna tshogs mang pos legs par
K12D0686_H0689:197b-7: brgyan pa na dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po
K12D0686_H0689:197b-8: brgya stong dang / byang chub sems dpa' sa ya
K12D0686_H0689:197b-9: bye ba brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu dang
K12D0686_H0689:197b-11: gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu brgya stong phrag
K12D0686_H0689:197b-12: du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas pa
K12D0686_H0689:197b-16: lha'i bu rnams kyi dbang du mdzad nas chos ston par mdzad do //
K12D0686_H0689:197b-17: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
K12D0686_H0689:197b-18: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stan las langs
K12D0686_H0689:197b-19: te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus
K12D0686_H0689:197b-20: mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te thal
K12D0686_H0689:197b-21: mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das ga la
K12D0686_H0689:197b-22: ba de logs su 'dzum pa'i bzhin gyis bcom ldan
K12D0686_H0689:197b-24: bcom ldan 'das gang 'di don yod pa'i zhags pa'i rgyal po'i snying po zhes bgyi pa mchis te /
K12D0686_H0689:197b-25: bdag gis bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig gi sngon
K12D0686_H0689:197b-26: logs su 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par blta bar
K12D0686_H0689:197b-27: de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten dbang phyug rgyal po
K12D0686_H0689:197b-28: la mnos nas 'di ltar bdag gis dbang phyug dang
K12D0686_H0689:197b-29: / dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa'i lha'i bu rnams dang /
K12D0686_H0689:198a-1: lha'i bu brgya stong phrag mang po bla na med
K12D0686_H0689:198a-2: pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dzin du
K12D0686_H0689:198a-3: stsal nas bdag gis rmongs pa ma mchis pa'i ye
K12D0686_H0689:198a-4: shes bkod pa la sogs te ting nge 'dzin brgya
K12D0686_H0689:198a-5: stong phrag bcu thob par bgyis lags so //
K12D0686_H0689:198a-7: 'di ltar yang sa phyogs gang du snying po 'di spyod pa'i sa phyogs der dbang phyug dang /
K12D0686_H0689:198a-9: tshangs pa la sogs pa lha'i bu khri nyis stong bsrung ba dang /
K12D0686_H0689:198a-11: sba pa'i slad du gnas par rig par bgyi lags so //
K12D0686_H0689:198a-13: gang na don yod pa'i phun sum tshogs pa'i snying
K12D0686_H0689:198a-14: po 'di spyod pa'i sa phyogs de mchod rten du
K12D0686_H0689:198a-18: sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du
K12D0686_H0689:198a-19: ma la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur lags
K12D0686_H0689:198a-20: so // gang zhig don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po 'di mnyan par bgyid na /
K12D0686_H0689:198a-21: bcom ldan 'das sdig pa spyod pa'am /
K12D0686_H0689:198a-22: sdig pa'i chos kun tu spyod pa'am /
K12D0686_H0689:198a-29: rang sangs rgyas thams cad spong ba de 'gyod par gyur cing /
K12D0686_H0689:198a-30: ma 'ongs pa na sdom pa thob par 'gyur lags so /
K12D0686_H0689:198b-0: re zhig de @198b nyid kyis zhag gcig smyung ba bgyis te /
K12D0686_H0689:198b-2: tshe 'di nyid la las de rnam par dag pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:198b-9: de bzhin du rims nyin bdun pa'am /
K12D0686_H0689:198b-19: ngo rgyab dang rked pa'i nad dam /
K12D0686_H0689:198b-20: yan lag dang nying lag gi nad dam /
K12D0686_H0689:198b-24: lag pa dang rkang pa'i nad dam /
K12D0686_H0689:198b-36: gzhan gyis bgyis pa'i gsod pa'am /
K12D0686_H0689:198b-40: bden pa ma lags pas skur pa 'debs pa'am /
K12D0686_H0689:198b-42: mdor na lus kyi gdung ba'am /
K12D0686_H0689:198b-44: rmi lam ngan pa'i las de yongs su gtugs par 'gyur na /
K12D0686_H0689:198b-45: sems can dag pa lhag par dad pa rnams kyi
K12D0686_H0689:198b-46: yongs su byang bar gyur ba lta smos kyang ci
K12D0686_H0689:198b-49: rigs bzhi las gang dag sgyu dang /
K12D0686_H0689:199a-0: g-yo dag gis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po 'di nyan @199a *//
K12D0686_H0689:199a-8: sems can gzhan la yang sgrog par bgyid cing /
K12D0686_H0689:199a-9: tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gtogs pa rnams
K12D0686_H0689:199a-10: kyi rna khung du gtad de rna bar bzlas brjod
K12D0686_H0689:199a-11: bgyid la rdo rje'i tshig 'di rnams sems par bgyid
K12D0686_H0689:199a-12: de / skur ba ma mchis pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:199a-14: rnam par mi rtog pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:199a-15: kun tu 'byung ba ma mchis pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:199a-16: ring du 'gro ba ma mchis pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:199a-17: bgyid pa ma mchis pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:199a-18: gos pa ma mchis pa dang /

K12D0686_H0689:199a-20: phung po lnga dang bral ba ste /

K12D0686_H0689:199a-22: de la phyogs bcu nas sangs rgyas stong zhal ston par mdzad par 'gyur zhing /
K12D0686_H0689:199a-23: nongs pa 'chags par 'gyur ba la sogs pa rgyas par sbyar ro //
K12D0686_H0689:199a-24: glegs bam du bgyis te khyim du 'chang bar bgyid dam /
K12D0686_H0689:199a-25: rje dpon gyis skrag pas bgyis sam /
K12D0686_H0689:199a-27: bzhad gad tsam gyi rgyus mnyan par bgyid na /
K12D0686_H0689:199a-29: mkhas pas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi
K12D0686_H0689:199a-30: mthus de dag gi rna khung khu du sgra de
K12D0686_H0689:199a-31: grags pa lags par 'tshal bar bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:199a-34: skyes bu 'ga' zhig gis tsandan nam /
K12D0686_H0689:199b-1: gla rtsi zhig la khros sam /

K12D0686_H0689:199b-5: gla rtsi de 'di snyam du 'dis bdag la khros sam /
K12D0686_H0689:199b-6: yongs su smad pas dri mnam par mi bgyi'o snyam du mi sems kyi /
K12D0686_H0689:199b-7: gzhan du na de nyid la dri bda' bar bgyid lags so //
K12D0686_H0689:199b-9: de bzhin du bdag gi don yod pa'i zhags pa'i
K12D0686_H0689:199b-10: snying po 'di yang gang su yang rung bas bzhad
K12D0686_H0689:199b-11: gad tsam gyi zhes bya ba rgyas par sbyar ro
K12D0686_H0689:199b-14: sgyus mchod par bgyid na yang de nyid sems can
K12D0686_H0689:199b-15: dmu rgod de dag gi dge ba'i rgyur 'gyur lags

K12D0686_H0689:199b-20: tshul khrims kyi dri bda' bar bgyid pa lags so //
K12D0686_H0689:199b-22: gang yang rigs kyi bu pho'am /
K12D0686_H0689:199b-28: de las gzhan pa'i sems can su yang rung bas
K12D0686_H0689:199b-29: don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i ched du yar
K12D0686_H0689:199b-30: gyi ngo'i tshes brgyad la smyung ba bgyis te gzhan
K12D0686_H0689:199b-31: mi smra bar don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po
K12D0686_H0689:199b-32: lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyid na bcom ldan 'das /
K12D0686_H0689:199b-33: des cha 'di nyid la phan yon nyi shu rtsa gcig thob par 'gyur te /
K12D0686_H0689:199b-34: nyi shu rtsa gcig gang zhe na /
K12D0686_H0689:199b-36: de'i lus la nad rnams 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:200a-1: la las kyi dbang gis nad rnams byung na yang
K12D0686_H0689:200a-2: myur du zhi bar 'gyur zhing lus mdangs dang ldan
K12D0686_H0689:200a-3: pa dang / yid du mchi bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:200a-4: skye bo mang po'i snying du sdug pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:200a-7: de'i don grub pa yang chom rkun gyis mi 'phrogs te /
K12D0686_H0689:200a-10: rgyal po'i mthus dbrog par rngo mi thogs par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:200a-11: de'i las kyi mtha' rnams rgyas par 'gyur te /
K12D0686_H0689:200a-13: chab kyi 'jigs par 'byung bar mi 'gyur te /
K12D0686_H0689:200a-14: rlung dang char gyi 'jigs pa ma lags so //
K12D0686_H0689:200a-15: don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po thal ba dang /
K12D0686_H0689:200a-16: chu la lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis nas zhing gi

K12D0686_H0689:200a-27: de la nyon mongs pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:200a-28: nye ba'i nyon mongs pa drag po 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro //

K12D0686_H0689:200b-3: sbed pa'i phyir gnas par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:200b-4: gang dang gang du skye bar 'gyur bar byams pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:200b-5: snying rje dang dga' ba dang /

K12D0686_H0689:200b-8: gzhan yang chos brgyad 'thob par 'gyur te /
K12D0686_H0689:200b-10: 'gum pa'i dus su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
K12D0686_H0689:200b-11: phyug dge slong gi gzugs su mngon sum du zhal
K12D0686_H0689:200b-13: bde bar 'chi ba'i dus bgyid par 'gyur ro //

K12D0686_H0689:200b-16: rkang pa mi g-yob pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:200b-17: bshang gci ma mchis pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:200b-18: khri'i steng du 'chi ba'i dus bgyid par 'gyur ro //

K12D0686_H0689:200b-20: kha bub tu 'chi ba'i dus bgyid par mi 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:200b-21: 'gum pa'i dus na yang spobs pa mi bas par 'gyur ro //

K12D0686_H0689:200b-32: 'di rnams khyad par du don du gnyer bas sbang bar bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:201a-0: don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang sems can rnams la @201a *//

K12D0686_H0689:201a-11: sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba ni /

K12D0686_H0689:201b-0: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs @201b dbang phyug mig mi

K12D0686_H0689:201b-9: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12D0686_H0689:201b-11: 'phags pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun 'das pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:201b-13: da ltar byung ba thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12D0686_H0689:201b-14: yang dag par song ba rnams dang /

K12D0686_H0689:201b-28: ae hye hi ma h'a ka ru ni ka /

K12D0686_H0689:202a-30: aom k'a ra prahma be sha dha ra /

K12D0686_H0689:203a-23: tshon sna lnga'i skud pa la lan nyi shu rtsa
K12D0686_H0689:203a-24: gcig bzlas brjod bgyis te seng ldeng gi phur bu
K12D0686_H0689:203a-25: bzhi la bcings nas phyogs bzhir gzugs par bgyis na
K12D0686_H0689:203a-26: / mtshams chen po bcings par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:203a-27: thams cad srung ba la ni /
K12D0686_H0689:203a-32: tshon sna lnga'i skud pas so //
K12D0686_H0689:203a-38: mgrin pa 'gags pa thams cad la ni /
K12D0686_H0689:203a-40: pi pi ling bsres pas so //
K12D0686_H0689:203b-5: skur pa 'debs pa thams cad la ni /
K12D0686_H0689:203b-6: chab la bzlas brjod bgyis te kha ba shal bar bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:203b-10: yul 'khor rnams srung ba la ni /
K12D0686_H0689:203b-11: bum ba gang ba bzhag la gos gtsang ma bgos
K12D0686_H0689:203b-12: pas mchod pa rgya chen po bgyis nas bklags par
K12D0686_H0689:203b-13: bgyis na zhi ba chen por 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:203b-14: des yang chab kyis gtor bar bgyis te /
K12D0686_H0689:203b-15: sems can thams cad la srung ba bgyis par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:203b-18: 'tshe ba thams cad zhi bar bgyid pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:203b-19: glags lta ba rnams la ni /
K12D0686_H0689:203b-20: tsandan la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis te snying gar byug par bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:203b-21: mtshams ma mchis pa'i las thams cad pas par bgyi ba ni /
K12D0686_H0689:203b-22: rtag tu bzlas brjod kyis so //
K12D0686_H0689:203b-25: sems can thams cad bskyang ba dang /
K12D0686_H0689:203b-27: gdon thams cad las srung ba la ni /
K12D0686_H0689:203b-28: tsandan gyi sbyin sreg gis so //
K12D0686_H0689:203b-34: tse dra ba ru ni dang /
K12D0686_H0689:203b-35: aa bha ya ba ni dang /
K12D0686_H0689:204a-0: su na nad rnams la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te nor bur bgyis nas spyi @204a *//
K12D0686_H0689:204a-2: dpung pa la btags pas bsrel bar bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:204a-7: dpal dang ldan par bgyid pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:204a-8: bkra mi shis pa rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa'i nor bu 'di bsrel na /
K12D0686_H0689:204a-9: thams cad las srung ba bgyis par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:204a-10: dug dang mes mi tshugs lags so //
K12D0686_H0689:204a-11: dug gis gnod pa skye bar mi 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:204a-12: skyes na yang gnod pa skyed par mi bgyid cing myur du zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:204a-18: ser ba zlog pa la ni /
K12D0686_H0689:204a-19: shing k'a ra b'i ra'i lcug mas te /
K12D0686_H0689:204a-21: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po /
K12D0686_H0689:204a-22: grub pa dam pa ma bsgrubs par las 'di rnams bgyid par 'gyur lags so //
K12D0686_H0689:204a-25: ras la lhag ma ma yin pa'i tshon rtsis sangs rgyas dang /
K12D0686_H0689:204a-26: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs brnyan ral pa'i thor tshugs dang /
K12D0686_H0689:204a-27: ae na ya'i pags pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:204a-28: phyugs bdag gi cha lugs 'chang ba /
K12D0686_H0689:204a-29: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bri bar bgyi ste /
K12D0686_H0689:204a-30: ri mo mkhan gso sbyong can 'brir stsal bar bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:204a-31: de nas sgrub pa po sku gzugs de'i spyan sngar
K12D0686_H0689:204a-32: ba'i lci ba'i dkyil 'khor bgyis te me tog dkar
K12D0686_H0689:204b-0: po'i sil ma bkram @204b la spos kyis bkang ba'i
K12D0686_H0689:204b-4: gzhan yang lha bshos sha dang khrag dang ma 'dres
K12D0686_H0689:204b-5: pa bshams shing drangs la aa ga ru'i bdugs pas
K12D0686_H0689:204b-6: bdugs te lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:204b-8: nyin zhag gsum du smyung ba bgyis nas zas dkar
K12D0686_H0689:204b-9: gsum 'tshal te dus gsum du khrus bgyis nas gos
K12D0686_H0689:204b-11: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bdag nyid mchis
K12D0686_H0689:204b-12: nas bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid
K12D0686_H0689:204b-14: mig sman la bzlas brjod bgyis te mig la bskus na /
K12D0686_H0689:204b-15: de nas mi gda' bar gyur nas nam mkha' la
K12D0686_H0689:204b-16: mchi bar 'gyur zhing don yod pa'i ye shes bkod
K12D0686_H0689:204b-17: pa zhes bgyi ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob par 'gyur
K12D0686_H0689:204b-18: te / ci 'tshal bde bgyid par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:204b-20: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas
K12D0686_H0689:204b-21: byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
K12D0686_H0689:204b-22: phyug dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu de dag dang /
K12D0686_H0689:204b-23: mi mdzed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:204b-25: dbang phyug chen po'i lha'i bu rnams yi rang ste
K12D0686_H0689:204b-26: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod
K12D0686_H0689:204b-27: do // don yod pa'i zhags pa rdzogs so ////
K12D0686_H0689:204b-28: de bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtsho rab 'byams thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12D0686_H0689:205a-0: de nas byang chub sems dpa' @205a *//
K12D0686_H0689:205a-1: sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
K12D0686_H0689:205a-2: phyug stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig
K12D0686_H0689:205a-3: tu gzar nas pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa
K12D0686_H0689:205a-4: la btsugs te nyi ma'i 'od ltar 'od zer stong
K12D0686_H0689:205a-5: 'phro zhing 'od zer sna tshogs pa 'gyed pa'i lus
K12D0686_H0689:205a-6: kyis bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su
K12D0686_H0689:205a-7: thal mo sbyar ba btud de zhal gyi dkyil 'khor
K12D0686_H0689:205a-8: rgyas shing rdzogs la zhi ba /
K12D0686_H0689:205a-9: bzhin 'dzum pa'i bzhin gyis byams pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:205a-10: snying rje chen po'i mthu yid la byed pas rigs bzhi'i 'jig rten la phan pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:205a-11: snying brtse bas don thams cad grub par rig sngags
K12D0686_H0689:205a-12: 'chang rnams kyis bla na med pa'i de kho na
K12D0686_H0689:205a-13: nyid grub pa / mchog sbyin pa thob par bya
K12D0686_H0689:205a-14: ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
K12D0686_H0689:205a-15: nyid grub pa / to // bcom ldan 'das /
K12D0686_H0689:205a-16: bdag la don yod pa'i rgyal po'i cho ga zhib
K12D0686_H0689:205a-17: mo'i rgyal po chen po'i snying po 'di mchis te
K12D0686_H0689:205a-18: / 'di padma rgya chen po'i dkyil 'khor de kho na nyid chen po'i snying por 'phags pa /
K12D0686_H0689:205a-20: de kho na nyid sgrub pa /
K12D0686_H0689:205a-22: dkyil 'khor chen po 'di phyag rgya dang /
K12D0686_H0689:205a-24: snying po rim par phye ba /
K12D0686_H0689:205a-25: gsang ba dam pa rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor /
K12D0686_H0689:205a-26: dam tshig dang sgrub pa gsang ba 'di bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bsgrag par bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:205b-4: mi mang po'i 'khor chen po'i mdun dang /
K12D0686_H0689:205b-5: rig sngags grub pa'i lha'i dkyil 'khor gyi mdun 'dir yang bsgrag par bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:205b-18: rig sngags 'chang grub pa'i lha mo rnams kyi mdun
K12D0686_H0689:205b-19: du de kho na nyid kyi snying po yang dag
K12D0686_H0689:205b-23: bsgoms pas grub pa bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar
K12D0686_H0689:205b-24: rig sngags chen po 'chang ba'i tshogs kyis yongs su
K12D0686_H0689:205b-25: bskor ba'i mdun du de kho na nyid kyi snying
K12D0686_H0689:205b-26: po gsang ba dam pa bsgrag cing brjod par bgyi'o
K12D0686_H0689:205b-27: // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa'i bsod nams stong gis brgyan pa /
K12D0686_H0689:205b-28: mtshan dang dpe byad rnams kyis rnam par spras pa /
K12D0686_H0689:205b-29: phyag dpung pa'i mdog gser gyi kha dog lta bu 'od zer 'phro ba du ma'i phreng ba dang /
K12D0686_H0689:205b-30: spos kyi glang po che'i sna lta bu'i phyag brkyangs
K12D0686_H0689:205b-31: te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags
K12D0686_H0689:205b-32: pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyi bor bzhag
K12D0686_H0689:205b-33: nas klad pa la byugs te 'di skad ces bka'
K12D0686_H0689:206a-0: stsal to // sems can dag pa dam pa snying rje chen po dang ldan pa khyod smros @206a *//
K12D0686_H0689:206a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs te /
K12D0686_H0689:206a-3: ngas kyang da ltar byin gyis rlob kyi /
K12D0686_H0689:206a-4: khyod gsang ba dam pa'i dam tshig smros shig /
K12D0686_H0689:206a-5: phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rjes su yi rang zhing byin gyis brlabs pa /
K12D0686_H0689:206a-6: gangg'a'i klung 'bum phrag bye ba brgya stong gi bye
K12D0686_H0689:206a-7: ma'i rdul phra rab snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa
K12D0686_H0689:206a-8: rnams kyis kyang byin gyis brlabs shing rjes su yi
K12D0686_H0689:206a-10: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
K12D0686_H0689:206a-11: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis phyogs bcur
K12D0686_H0689:206a-12: bltas te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar rang gi
K12D0686_H0689:206a-13: snying po de kho na nyid gsang ba'i gsang sngags
K12D0686_H0689:206a-16: ma h'a aa mo gha p'a sh'a s'a dha ya
K12D0686_H0689:206a-17: sa ma ya hri da ya tsa ra tsa ra
K12D0686_H0689:206a-18: h'um/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i rang bzhin gyi gzungs kyi snying po yin no //
K12D0686_H0689:206a-19: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa
K12D0686_H0689:206a-20: spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gsang ba'i snying po
K12D0686_H0689:206a-21: 'di brjod ma thag tu ri'i rgyal po po ta
K12D0686_H0689:206a-24: rtsva shing du bcas pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:206b-0: khor yug chen po dang @206b bcas pa rnam pa
K12D0686_H0689:206b-1: drug tu rab tu g-yos shing lha'i gnas rnams kyang
K12D0686_H0689:206b-6: srin po'i gnas rnams kyang 'khrug par gyur to //
K12D0686_H0689:206b-7: rgya mtsho chen po'i rlabs kyang 'khrug par gyur to //
K12D0686_H0689:206b-8: chu gter rnams kyang 'khrug par gyur to //
K12D0686_H0689:206b-9: de ma thag tu phyogs bcu na sangs rgyas kyi
K12D0686_H0689:206b-10: sku gzugs brnyan bzhugs pa rnams kyis legs so zhes
K12D0686_H0689:206b-12: 'di skad ces kyang bka' stsal to //
K12D0686_H0689:206b-13: rgyal ba'i bdag nyid du skyes pa /
K12D0686_H0689:206b-14: don yod pa'i zhags pa'i gsang ba'i snying po bklags
K12D0686_H0689:206b-15: pas 'grub pa bla na med pa smras pa legs
K12D0686_H0689:206b-16: so legs so // bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
K12D0686_H0689:206b-17: pa sh'akya thub pas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to
K12D0686_H0689:206b-18: so legs so // // sems dpa' dag pa /
K12D0686_H0689:206b-19: khyod kyis gsang ba bklag pa'i cho ga de kho
K12D0686_H0689:206b-20: na nyid sgrub pa rgyas pa dang bcas par smros
K12D0686_H0689:206b-21: shig / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gsol pa /
K12D0686_H0689:206b-23: gsang ba'i snying po'i gzungs 'di lan gcig brjod pa
K12D0686_H0689:206b-24: tsam gyis de'i mod la phyogs bcu tha dad pa
K12D0686_H0689:206b-25: nas gangg'a'i klung sa ya bye ba brgya stong gi
K12D0686_H0689:206b-26: bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag brkyang
K12D0686_H0689:206b-27: ste spyi bo la bzhag nas legs so zhes bgyi
K12D0686_H0689:206b-29: gsungs pa tsam gyi mod la sngon bskal pa brgya
K12D0686_H0689:206b-30: stong du bsags pa'i sgrib pa rnams nyams par bgyid
K12D0686_H0689:207a-2: de bzhin du gnod pa zhi bar bgyid do //
K12D0686_H0689:207a-4: sems can gdug pa rnams dang /
K12D0686_H0689:207a-5: phas kyi rgol ba rnams dang /
K12D0686_H0689:207a-6: mi mdza' ba rnams 'jigs par bgyid de /
K12D0686_H0689:207a-8: rtag tu 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mchog sbyin blta 'tshal bar 'gyur lags so //
K12D0686_H0689:207a-9: rig sngags 'di'i cho ga sgrub pa ni /
K12D0686_H0689:207a-11: rig sngags 'chang gtsang mar gyur pas shin tu gos gtsang ma bgo bar bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:207a-13: snying rje yid la bgyis pas 'byung po thams cad la mchog tu snying brtse bar bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:207a-14: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ri mo'i gzugs la mchod par bgyi'o; ;me tog dang /
K12D0686_H0689:207a-21: tshes bco lnga la sgrub pa'i bzlas brjod kyi cho
K12D0686_H0689:207a-22: ga bgyi'o; ;ri mo'i gzugs kyi mdun du thog mar
K12D0686_H0689:207a-23: skyil mo krung bcas nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i
K12D0686_H0689:207a-24: snying po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:207a-25: tshig gzhan mi smra bar khro bo'i rgyal po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te chab dang /
K12D0686_H0689:207a-26: yungs kar gyis dbang bskur bar bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:207a-27: phyag rgya bcing bar bgyi ste /
K12D0686_H0689:207b-0: lan nyi shu rtsa gcig tu gdon @207b par bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:207b-3: phyag rgyas kyang dbang bskur bar bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:207b-4: de'i 'og tu don yod pa'i zhags pa'i gsang ba'i
K12D0686_H0689:207b-5: dam tshig gi snying po stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod
K12D0686_H0689:207b-6: bgyi'o // bzlas brjod bton pa tsam gyis de'i mod
K12D0686_H0689:207b-7: la don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po khro bo'i
K12D0686_H0689:207b-8: rgyal po dang bcas pa 'bum 'gyur du bzlas brjod
K12D0686_H0689:207b-10: bzlas brjod rdzogs nas ri mo'i gzugs 'bar zhing sa yang g-yo bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:207b-11: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi lus las 'od zer sna tshogs 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:207b-12: don yod pa'i zhags pa lag na thogs pa'i zhags
K12D0686_H0689:207b-13: pa 'bar bar 'gyur zhing rig sngags 'chang snying dga'
K12D0686_H0689:207b-14: ba dang / spyi bo'i gtsug 'bar bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:207b-18: legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byin te /
K12D0686_H0689:207b-19: don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i cho ga zhib mo'i phyag rgya 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:207b-20: de nas dgos pa thams cad dang /
K12D0686_H0689:207b-21: las thams cad brjod pa tsam gyis de'i mod la 'grub par 'gyur lags so //
K12D0686_H0689:207b-22: de bzhin gshegs pa sa ya bye ba brgya stong
K12D0686_H0689:207b-23: gang'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dang mnyam pa'i phyag
K12D0686_H0689:207b-24: gser gyi kha dog 'dra ba'i spyi gtsug tu 'jog
K12D0686_H0689:207b-25: par rmi lam du mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:208a-1: phyug gi rang bzhin gyi lus shin tu dri ma
K12D0686_H0689:208a-2: dang bral zhing yongs su dag pas dri ma med
K12D0686_H0689:208a-3: pa'i bdag nyid kyi lus rang bzhin gyi mdun na
K12D0686_H0689:208a-4: mchis par 'gyur ro; ;mchog thams cad stsol bar 'gyur
K12D0686_H0689:208a-5: ro // rnam pa thams cad du grub pa stsol bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:208a-6: don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po cho ga zhib mo'i phyag rgya grub pa stsol bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:208a-7: ji ltar snying las skyes pa'i bu bzhin du sangs
K12D0686_H0689:208a-8: rgyas kyi byang chub thob kyi bar du yongs su
K12D0686_H0689:208a-11: 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can gyi dkyil 'khor
K12D0686_H0689:208a-12: mtha' dag yongs su rdzogs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing
K12D0686_H0689:208a-13: legs par brgyan pa byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis
K12D0686_H0689:208a-14: yongs su bskor ba dang bcas pa na khang pa
K12D0686_H0689:208a-15: brtsegs pa legs par brgyan pa'i sengge'i khri'i mchog la
K12D0686_H0689:208a-16: 'phags pa rgyal ba 'od dpag med 'od zer brgya
K12D0686_H0689:208a-17: stong phrag 'bum 'phro ba'i skus bzhugs shing chos ston
K12D0686_H0689:208a-19: rig sngags 'chang des legs par bkrus te gtsang mar gyur pas gos gtsang ma bgos te /
K12D0686_H0689:208a-20: cho 'phrul gyi zla ba yar gyi ngo la byams pa'i sems dang /
K12D0686_H0689:208a-21: snying rje'i lhag pa'i bsam pas gus pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:208b-0: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ri mo'i gzugs la ci 'byor ba @208b me tog dang /
K12D0686_H0689:208b-8: ba dan gyis mchod par bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:208b-9: tshes brgyad nas tshes bcu gsum gyi bar du zas dkar gsum 'tshal bar bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:208b-10: ri mo'i gzugs kyi mdun du nyin gcig bzhin dus
K12D0686_H0689:208b-11: gsum du don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan
K12D0686_H0689:208b-13: tshig gzhan mi smra bar khro bo'i rgyal po'i snying po dang /
K12D0686_H0689:208b-14: nye ba'i snying po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis
K12D0686_H0689:208b-15: nas ri mo'i gzugs de nyid kyi mdun du mchis
K12D0686_H0689:208b-18: yon chab dus gsum du dbul bar bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:208b-22: gu gul gyi me tog khu ba dang bcas pa
K12D0686_H0689:208b-23: gla rtsi dang lhan cig bsres nas blang bar bgyi'o
K12D0686_H0689:208b-24: // dgug pa'i sngags lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi ste /
K12D0686_H0689:208b-25: don yod khams gsum rnam par grags //
K12D0686_H0689:208b-26: bdug pa'i rgyal po bla na med //
K12D0686_H0689:208b-27: gang phyir bdug pa tsam gyis ni //
K12D0686_H0689:208b-28: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
K12D0686_H0689:208b-29: kyi phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su bdug
K12D0686_H0689:208b-30: pa'i sprin chen po 'khrigs pas rgyas par 'gyur ro
K12D0686_H0689:208b-31: // dri 'khrigs pa de dag gis sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /
K12D0686_H0689:209a-5: mi ma yin pa rnams la dri chen po'i mchod pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:209a-6: bdug pa chen po'i mchod pa bgyis par 'gyur zhing /
K12D0686_H0689:209a-7: de dag thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:209a-8: gang yang dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gtogs pa'i sems
K12D0686_H0689:209a-9: can gang dag gis bdug pa'i dri tshor na; de
K12D0686_H0689:209a-10: dag thams cad ngan song du skye bar 'gyur ba'i
K12D0686_H0689:209a-11: las kyi sgrib pa rnams yongs su gtugs par 'gyur
K12D0686_H0689:209a-24: mi bde ba thams cad dang /
K12D0686_H0689:209a-25: nad thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:209a-29: tsha ba'i sprin thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:209a-30: sdig pa thams cad 'jig par 'gyur ro; ;byad dang /
K12D0686_H0689:209a-32: sngags kyi sbyor ba thams cad dang /
K12D0686_H0689:209a-35: dug sbyar ma thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:209b-0: gnod ltas thams cad bdug pa'i dris 'bros par 'gyur @209b ro; ;'jigs par 'gyur /
K12D0686_H0689:209b-2: byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du lan 'ga' yang tshugs par mi 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:209b-3: bdug pa'i rgyal po 'di rtag tu sbyar bar bgyi'o;
K12D0686_H0689:209b-4: ;'di ltar tshes bcu bzhi'i nub mo mchis la don
K12D0686_H0689:209b-5: yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po brgya rtsa brgyad dang
K12D0686_H0689:209b-6: / khro bo'i rgyal po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:209b-7: zas dkar gsum gyi gtor ma ci 'byor ba dbul bar bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:209b-9: nye ba'i snying po stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis
K12D0686_H0689:209b-10: la dri dang 'bru mar gyi mar me dbul bar
K12D0686_H0689:209b-11: bgyi'o // ri mo'i gzugs de nyid kyi mdun du
K12D0686_H0689:209b-12: nam langs kyi bar du mchis nas nyal bar bgyis
K12D0686_H0689:209b-13: te rmi lam du dbyig gi mdzod mthong ngam /
K12D0686_H0689:209b-14: bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams gzhal med khang dang bcas /
K12D0686_H0689:209b-15: rin po che'i shing dang bcas /
K12D0686_H0689:209b-16: rin po che'i ri dang bcas /
K12D0686_H0689:209b-19: khang pa brtsegs pa dang bcas /
K12D0686_H0689:209b-22: rnam par 'phrul pa dang bcas pa mthong ngam /
K12D0686_H0689:209b-23: de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med byang chub sems
K12D0686_H0689:209b-24: dpa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing khang pa brtsegs
K12D0686_H0689:209b-25: pa na bzhugs la; lha dang /
K12D0686_H0689:209b-32: lto 'phye chen po 'khor dang bcas pa mthong ngam /
K12D0686_H0689:210a-1: 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
K12D0686_H0689:210a-2: par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das tshe dpag
K12D0686_H0689:210a-3: med de yang rig sngags 'chang de la dbugs 'byin
K12D0686_H0689:210a-4: par mdzad cing / legs so zhes bgyi ba yang stsol bar mdzad de /
K12D0686_H0689:210a-6: khyod kyis rig sngags 'chang gi skyes bu'i byed pa mang du byas pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:210a-7: khyod kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba mang du bskrun pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:210a-8: khyod kyis lhag par mang du byas pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:210a-9: khyod kyis bya ba gang yin pa byas pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:210a-10: khyod kyis don yod pa'i zhags ba'i snying po rnam
K12D0686_H0689:210a-11: par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor phyag rgya chen po dang
K12D0686_H0689:210a-12: / gsang sngags rnam par bya ba'i snying po sgrub pa ni /
K12D0686_H0689:210a-15: khyod rig sngags 'chang gi sangs rgyas nyid du gyur cig /
K12D0686_H0689:210a-16: khyod 'di nas ma 'ongs pa'i mngal gyi skye ba
K12D0686_H0689:210a-17: blangs te tshe brjes nas nga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing
K12D0686_H0689:210a-19: byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:210a-20: zhes phyag g-yas pa spyi bor 'jog par 'gyur /
K12D0686_H0689:210a-21: 'jig rten pa'i dngos grub thams cad stsol cing /
K12D0686_H0689:210a-22: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub sgrub pa ste /
K12D0686_H0689:210a-24: dam pa sgrub pa yin no //
K12D0686_H0689:210a-25: zhes bdag nyid sad nas dga' bar mthong ste /
K12D0686_H0689:210b-0: sgrib pa thams cad dang bral zhing yongs su dag @210b par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:210b-1: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bram ze'i gzugs kyis mdun na mchis par 'gyur zhing /
K12D0686_H0689:210b-2: 'dod pa thams cad kyi mchog stsol bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:210b-3: gzugs kyi ri mo de yang 'bar zhing 'od zer 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:210b-4: yon tan brgya stong mang po gzhan yang 'thob par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:210b-5: 'jig rten pa'i phun sum tshogs pa yang 'thob par 'gyur ro; ;skye bo dang /
K12D0686_H0689:210b-9: khyim bdag thams cad dbang du 'gyur zhing cher mchod par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:210b-11: bram ze rnams la don yod pa'i grub pa chen po 'thob par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:210b-12: grub pa chen po bla na med pa yang 'thob par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:210b-13: nyin gcig bzhin dus gsum du phyag rgya bcing bar bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:210b-14: de nas tshes bcu bzhi la thog mar dge sbyong dang /
K12D0686_H0689:210b-15: bram ze rnams la ci 'byor ba'i yon dang bcas pa'i mchod ston stsal bar bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:210b-16: de nas bdag nyid longs spyad par bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:210b-17: gang gi tshe yang sangs rgyas la blta ba dang /
K12D0686_H0689:210b-18: byang chub sems dpa' la blta ba dang /
K12D0686_H0689:210b-19: lha rnams la blta bar 'tshal ba na /
K12D0686_H0689:210b-20: de'i tshe bdug pa'i rgyal po la dgug pa'i gsang
K12D0686_H0689:210b-21: sngags lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyi ste
K12D0686_H0689:210b-22: / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bdug par bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:210b-23: bdug pas bdugs pa tsam gyi mod la zhal ston par 'gyur zhing /
K12D0686_H0689:211a-2: nyams pa'am bri ba de dag thams cad gsung bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:211a-3: ji tsam tshe'i mthar thug gi bar du gsung ba'am /
K12D0686_H0689:211a-6: de nas gsang sngags kyi cho ga dang /
K12D0686_H0689:211a-8: las kyi cho ga yang ji lta ba bzhin du bshad par bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:211a-9: aom padma dha ra aa mo gha dza ya de tsu ru tsu ru sv'ah'a /
K12D0686_H0689:211a-10: don yod pa'i rgyal po'i nye ba'i snying po'i gsang sngags so //
K12D0686_H0689:211a-11: aom padma p'a sha dha r'a ya /
K12D0686_H0689:211a-12: aa mo gha ba ra sanytso da ya h'um/
K12D0686_H0689:211a-13: de bzhin gshegs pa dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /
K12D0686_H0689:211a-23: mi ma yin pa la sogs pa skul ba'i gsang sngags te /
K12D0686_H0689:211a-24: bdug pa'i rgyal pos bdugs nas chab dang /
K12D0686_H0689:211a-25: yungs kar bsres pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis nas phyogs bcur gtor na /
K12D0686_H0689:211a-26: thams cad bskul bar bgyis par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:211a-27: aom tree lokya aa bhya h'a na aa mo gha p'a sha /
K12D0686_H0689:211a-28: padma bi lo ki ta a'a yantu /
K12D0686_H0689:211a-29: bhu ba na su ra su ru su ru /
K12D0686_H0689:211a-32: gu gul gyi bdug pa la lan brgya rtsa brgyad
K12D0686_H0689:211a-33: pa zlas brjod bgyis nas chu dang me tog bsres
K12D0686_H0689:211b-0: pas phyogs @211b bcur gtor bar bgyi ste /
K12D0686_H0689:211b-1: thams cad nas dgug pa dam pa grub pa lags so //
K12D0686_H0689:211b-2: aom padma bhu dza mah'a b'a sha dha ra ni mantra ya mi /
K12D0686_H0689:211b-3: aa mo gha p'a sha yantu bhu ba sv'ah'a /
K12D0686_H0689:211b-5: de bzhin gshegs pa dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /
K12D0686_H0689:211b-6: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang /
K12D0686_H0689:211b-7: dkyil 'khor thams cad na gnas pa'i lha tshogs la sogs pa spyan drangs pa'i gsang sngags te /
K12D0686_H0689:211b-11: tshems shing la bdug pa'i rgyal pos bdugs te thams
K12D0686_H0689:211b-12: cad la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi ste
K12D0686_H0689:211b-13: / thams cad spyan drang ba'i rig sngags so //
K12D0686_H0689:211b-14: aom padma aa mo gha badzra aa dhishtha na ku ru ku ru sv'ah'a /
K12D0686_H0689:211b-16: chab dang yungs kar la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas sa la gtor na /
K12D0686_H0689:211b-17: dpag tshad sum brgyas kun nas 'khor ba'i sa'i dkyil 'khor rdo rjer byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:211b-18: de thams cad bsrungs pas ni /
K12D0686_H0689:211b-19: rdo rje sra ba'i sems su 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:211b-20: dgra rnams kyis mi mthong ba dang /
K12D0686_H0689:211b-30: 'dod rgur sgyur ba'i gzugs can thams cad kyis mi mthong ste /
K12D0686_H0689:212a-0: rnam pa thams cad du mi mthong @212a *//
K12D0686_H0689:212a-1: bas rdo rje ltar sra bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:212a-2: aom aa mo gha p'a sha padmotta ra simh'a /
K12D0686_H0689:212a-3: santu ti si ri si ri h'um/
K12D0686_H0689:212a-5: yungs kar la stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te sa la gtor na /
K12D0686_H0689:212a-6: padma chen po'i gzhal yas khang gi gdan du byin gyis brlabs nas legs par phul bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:212a-7: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la rin po che
K12D0686_H0689:212a-8: sna bdun las byas pa'i seng+ge'i gdan du byin gyis
K12D0686_H0689:212a-9: brlabs nas legs par phul bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:212a-10: rig sngags 'chang gis rang gi stan la chab dang /
K12D0686_H0689:212a-11: yungs kar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis nas gtor te /
K12D0686_H0689:212a-12: rig sngags 'grub pa'i padma'i stan gsang ba'i gsang sngags so //
K12D0686_H0689:212a-13: aom mah'a k'a ru ni ka padma aa mo gha
K12D0686_H0689:212a-14: p'a sha dri dha badzra aa dhi shathi te bhu
K12D0686_H0689:212a-15: ru bhu ru bandha re sv'ah'a /
K12D0686_H0689:212a-16: dkyil 'khor mtha' dag na khyim dang /
K12D0686_H0689:212a-24: gnas gsang ba'i phyir dri chab dang /
K12D0686_H0689:212a-25: yungs kar la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis
K12D0686_H0689:212a-26: nas gtor bar bgyis te gnas su gtogs pa thams
K12D0686_H0689:212a-27: cad gsang ba chen po bgyis par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:212b-3: gnas gsang ba'i gsang sngags so //
K12D0686_H0689:212b-4: aom padma aa mo gha p'a she na sa manta da sha su di kashu si m'a ghandha ya /
K12D0686_H0689:212b-6: lcags kyi bur bu sor brgycad pa'i chcad lnga la
K12D0686_H0689:212b-7: tshon sna lnga'i skud pas dkris te lan stong rtsa
K12D0686_H0689:212b-8: brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas phyogs bzhir gzugs par bgyi'o
K12D0686_H0689:212b-10: dbus kyi bzhir gzugs par bgyi ste /
K12D0686_H0689:212b-11: rgyang grags bdun 'khor bar mtshams bcing ba bgyis par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:212b-12: ji srid du phur bu ma byung ba de srid
K12D0686_H0689:212b-13: du mtshams chen po bcing pa bgyis par 'gyur ro
K12D0686_H0689:212b-14: // aom aa mo gha manda la bandha ya sa manta na /
K12D0686_H0689:212b-15: padma ma h'a padma dhu ru dhu ru sv'ah'a /
K12D0686_H0689:212b-18: yungs kar la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas dkyil 'khor mtha' dag dang /
K12D0686_H0689:212b-21: dkyil 'khor chen po bcing bar bgyis par 'gyur te /
K12D0686_H0689:212b-26: sha za mchi bar 'os pa thams cad kyis mchi bar mi 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:212b-29: klu gdug pa gang su yang rung ba de dag thams cad zil gyis mnan par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:212b-30: 'jig rten pa'i bgyi ba ngan pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:213a-1: cad yongs su spong bar 'gyur ro //

K12D0686_H0689:213a-3: dhi ri dhi ri shuddha satva ma h'a padme h'um/

K12D0686_H0689:213a-23: phyag dar gyis gang ba dang /
K12D0686_H0689:213a-27: rigs ngan pa thams cad yongs su spangs par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:213a-30: bdag nyid la dbang bskur na /

K12D0686_H0689:213b-9: lus ngan la sogs pa bsrung ba dang /
K12D0686_H0689:213b-11: sba ba'i slad du rtag tu rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:213b-12: 'jig rten thams cad kyi snying du sdug pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:213b-15: nad thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:213b-18: gnod pa la sogs pa thams cad las yongs su thar par 'gyur ro //

K12D0686_H0689:213b-36: don yod pa'i grub pa chen po 'grub par 'gyur ro //

K12D0686_H0689:214a-8: btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad dbang du 'gyur zhing mchod par 'os par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:214a-9: rtag tu gtsang mar spyod par gtsang zhing dag par
K12D0686_H0689:214a-10: 'gyur ro; ;rtag par dus kun tu 'phags pa spyan
K12D0686_H0689:214a-11: ras gzigs dbang phyug blta 'tshal bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:214a-12: 'dod pa thams cad kyi mchog stsol bar 'gyur ro //

K12D0686_H0689:214a-22: aom aa mo gha aa nu sha ya ma h'a padma bandhu re h'um/
K12D0686_H0689:214a-24: aom aa mo gha padma shi ge tu ru tu ru tishathi badzra bandhe sv'ah'a /
K12D0686_H0689:214a-25: spyi gtsug bcing ba'i gsang sngags te /
K12D0686_H0689:214a-26: lan nyis shu rtsa gcig bzlas so //
K12D0686_H0689:214a-27: aom aa mo gha padma dza lod kesha pa bhi ri bhi ri h'um/

K12D0686_H0689:214b-0: @214b lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so //
K12D0686_H0689:214b-1: aom aa mo gha bi ka ta sam bha ra

K12D0686_H0689:214b-7: lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so //

K12D0686_H0689:219b-12: aom di bya aa wa lo ki ni bi bha
K12D0686_H0689:219b-13: dza yam tu sa mante na sa ma ra na
K12D0686_H0689:219b-14: sv'a h'a / lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis te so sor dbye bar bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:219b-15: aom na n'a pra h'a ra na aa mo gha mu dr'a dzva la dzva la sv'a h'a /
K12D0686_H0689:219b-18: aom aa mo gha ratna su tra dha re ki ni ki ni sv'a h'a /
K12D0686_H0689:219b-19: thig skud kyi gsang sngags te /
K12D0686_H0689:219b-20: lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te dkyil 'khor ram /
K12D0686_H0689:219b-21: ri mo bri ba'i ras sam /

K12D0686_H0689:219b-23: aom bi pu la ba re bra be sha ya /

K12D0686_H0689:219b-26: sgo re rer yang lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzla'o //
K12D0686_H0689:219b-27: aom su bhi bhakti su mam ga la dra ra b'a banti /
K12D0686_H0689:219b-28: aom di bya bha dza na /
K12D0686_H0689:219b-29: aa mo gha p'a sha na ba re /
K12D0686_H0689:219b-31: aom sam b'u rna ru phyid bya ba dza ni /
K12D0686_H0689:219b-32: aom mo gha padme sv'a h'a /
K12D0686_H0689:219b-34: aom bi bi dha r'u pa h'a ro ba ksha ra na /
K12D0686_H0689:219b-36: aa mo gha ba ti sv'ah'a /
K12D0686_H0689:219b-37: lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzla'o //
K12D0686_H0689:219b-38: aom di bya gandha nu sa ra ni aa mo gha ba le dha ra dha ra sv'ah'a /
K12D0686_H0689:219b-39: mchod yon gyi gsang sngags te /
K12D0686_H0689:219b-41: aom gandha spha ra ni sa manta /
K12D0686_H0689:220a-0: @220a *// aa mo gha pra sphu ra h'um/
K12D0686_H0689:220a-3: aom ni rma la k'a ya sho dha ni di bya gandha pra bu ra ni p'u ra ya h'um/
K12D0686_H0689:220a-6: aom ghandha ts'u rna pra p'u ra ni /
K12D0686_H0689:220a-7: tsu ru tsu ru sv'a h'a /
K12D0686_H0689:220a-8: dri'i phye ma'i gsang sngags te /
K12D0686_H0689:220a-11: bi ma le ganbho tta re sv'a h'a /
K12D0686_H0689:220a-14: aom di bya gandha pra p'u ra ni s'a ga
K12D0686_H0689:220a-15: ra dza la di bya aa dhi shthi te ka
K12D0686_H0689:220a-16: la sho dha ra p'u rna p'u ra ya dza
K12D0686_H0689:220a-18: bum pa'i dri chab kyi gsang sngags te /
K12D0686_H0689:220a-20: aom ra sa s'a gra pa ti /
K12D0686_H0689:220a-21: sarbba bi dha aa dhishtha na aa dhi shthi te sam p'u ra ya h'um/
K12D0686_H0689:220a-22: gtor ma ro sna tshogs can gyi gsang sngags te /
K12D0686_H0689:220a-23: lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzla'o //
K12D0686_H0689:220a-24: aom di bya bho dza na /
K12D0686_H0689:220a-26: bi pu la pra bhe sv'a h'a /
K12D0686_H0689:220a-27: kha zas kyi gsang sngags te /
K12D0686_H0689:220a-28: lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzla'o //
K12D0686_H0689:220a-29: aom tri shu kla bho dza na ba li bi
K12D0686_H0689:220a-30: p'u la ra s'a gra ba ti su ra pra
K12D0686_H0689:220a-31: su ra h'um/ zas dkar gsum gyi gtor ma'am /
K12D0686_H0689:220a-32: gtor ma gzhan la yang lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzla'o //
K12D0686_H0689:220a-33: aom pha la ba ti sv'a ra ba ti di bya ba na spa ti /
K12D0686_H0689:220a-34: ta ra ta ra tu ni sv'a h'a /
K12D0686_H0689:220a-37: aom di bya ku su motpa la n'a n'a bushpa pra barsha ni bha ba sv'a h'a /
K12D0686_H0689:220a-38: me tog gi gsang sngags te /
K12D0686_H0689:220a-40: aom bi bi dha la ta pushp'a pa kunthi ta
K12D0686_H0689:220b-0: ba na spa ti aa ha ra sam @220b p'u
K12D0686_H0689:220b-2: me tog gtor ba'i gsang sngags te /
K12D0686_H0689:220b-4: aom ma h'a dhu pa me gha pa ta la sanytsa d'a ya /
K12D0686_H0689:220b-7: lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzla'o //
K12D0686_H0689:220b-8: aom aa tha ra pa ni dzva la dzva la de ba mu khe sv'a h'a /
K12D0686_H0689:220b-11: aom bhi bi dha ma ni kan ka ratno dzva
K12D0686_H0689:220b-12: la pushmi ma ni aa mo gha ma ni sv'a
K12D0686_H0689:220b-13: h'a / cha zhing rgyan pa'i gsang sngags te /
K12D0686_H0689:220b-15: aom padma ka re bi ma lan kha /
K12D0686_H0689:220b-17: sa ma sa ma sarbba ta th'a ga ta aa dhishthi te sv'a h'a /
K12D0686_H0689:220b-18: thal mo sbyar ba'i gsang sngags te /
K12D0686_H0689:220b-19: lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzla'o //
K12D0686_H0689:220b-20: aom sarba gu na pra na ta /
K12D0686_H0689:220b-21: shi ro bandha n'a ya na maska ro mi /
K12D0686_H0689:220b-22: mi li mi li tu ri ni sv'a h'a /
K12D0686_H0689:220b-23: phyag bgyi ba'i gsang sngags te /
K12D0686_H0689:220b-25: aom da sha di sha aa bhi bandha na pra sa ra hu h'um/
K12D0686_H0689:220b-27: lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzla'o //
K12D0686_H0689:220b-28: aom bi bi dha yu dha dzva li ta pa ni /
K12D0686_H0689:220b-29: pra dzva la pra sphu ra h'um/
K12D0686_H0689:220b-31: lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzla'o //
K12D0686_H0689:220b-32: aom di bya aa mo gha bi pu la sva
K12D0686_H0689:220b-33: re ma dhu ra ni ra gho sha ru te
K12D0686_H0689:220b-34: na ra na ra na h'um/
K12D0686_H0689:220b-37: yang na brgya rtsa brgyad do //
K12D0686_H0689:220b-38: aom rashmi dzva la sa mante na /
K12D0686_H0689:220b-39: aa ba bhva sa ya ma h'a ma ni ratna shi khe sv'a h'a /
K12D0686_H0689:221a-0: aom dhu ru dhu ru aa pa ha ya sh'i gha dza be h'um dgug pa'i @221a *//
K12D0686_H0689:221a-2: gu gul gyi bdug pa la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzla'o //
K12D0686_H0689:221a-3: aom dushtha sa do bi bo dha ni /
K12D0686_H0689:221a-4: sa ma sa ma ya ba re sv'ah'a /
K12D0686_H0689:221a-5: dam tshig gi gsang sngags te /
K12D0686_H0689:221a-6: lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzla'o //
K12D0686_H0689:221a-7: aom bi tsi tra ma ni bi bu la brta ni h'um//
K12D0686_H0689:221a-8: bgrang phreng gi gsang sngags te /
K12D0686_H0689:221a-10: aom bi tsi tra ra dzva lo di bya //
K12D0686_H0689:221a-11: ku su ma ba re pushpa ra ti sv'ah'a /
K12D0686_H0689:221a-12: me tog phreng ba'i gsang sngags te /
K12D0686_H0689:221a-14: aom di bya lo tsa ne aa mo gha pra ba re /
K12D0686_H0689:221a-15: sarba di bya aa dhi shthi ta /
K12D0686_H0689:221a-16: siddhi sho dhe bi lo ki te sv'ah'a /
K12D0686_H0689:221a-18: lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzla'o //
K12D0686_H0689:221a-19: aom aa mo gha padme sa manta /
K12D0686_H0689:221a-20: shu bha ne ta ra ta ra gatstsha sva bha ba na ma sv'ah'a /
K12D0686_H0689:221a-21: slar gshegs su gsol ba'i gsang sngags te /
K12D0686_H0689:221a-22: lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzla'o //
K12D0686_H0689:221a-23: aom di bya sam p'u ra ni n'a gabi lo ki na h'um/
K12D0686_H0689:221a-24: mkhar gsil gyi gsang sngags te /
K12D0686_H0689:221a-25: lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzla'o //
K12D0686_H0689:221a-26: aom badta spu ra ni spu ra ya /
K12D0686_H0689:221a-27: aa mo gha bi ta sa manta pra bhe sv'ah'a /
K12D0686_H0689:221a-28: lhung bzed kyi gsang sngags te /
K12D0686_H0689:221a-29: lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzla'o //
K12D0686_H0689:221a-30: aom dur bha sam stha ra biddhya aa tishthi ta pra sa ra su ra su ra /
K12D0686_H0689:221a-31: ri ship'u dzi te sv'a h'a /
K12D0686_H0689:221a-32: rtsa gding ba'i gsang sngags te /
K12D0686_H0689:221a-33: lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzla'o //
K12D0686_H0689:221a-34: aom dzva la du ma dzva la shi khi rashmi garbhe sv'ah'a /
K12D0686_H0689:221a-35: sbyin sreg gi gsang sngags te /
K12D0686_H0689:221a-36: lan brgya rtsa rtsa brgyad bzla'o //
K12D0686_H0689:221b-0: aom padme ni padma @221b sa ne ba re n'a ga bhu ba ne sv'a h'a /
K12D0686_H0689:221b-4: aom kha ga tsa ri ni /
K12D0686_H0689:221b-5: ga ma ga ma ya pa da pra tsa ri ni h'um/
K12D0686_H0689:221b-8: aom sarba tra aa mo gha bhi shi ka ma
K12D0686_H0689:221b-9: h'a ts'u da bi ma le aa bhi shinytsi tu
K12D0686_H0689:221b-10: ma / pra ba ra p'a ni bhu dze padme dha dze sv'a h'a /
K12D0686_H0689:221b-11: dbang bskur ba'i gsang sngags te /
K12D0686_H0689:221b-12: lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzla'o //
K12D0686_H0689:221b-13: rig sngags 'chang gis gsang sngags 'di dag thams cad
K12D0686_H0689:221b-14: so sor cho ga zhib mo'i sgrub pa ji lta
K12D0686_H0689:221b-15: ba bzhin du thams cad so sor sbyar nas cho
K12D0686_H0689:221b-16: ga bsgrubs na / dgos pa rgya chen po'i 'byor pa'i mthu 'di dag dang /
K12D0686_H0689:221b-22: rin po che'i snod sna tshogs dang /
K12D0686_H0689:221b-23: nor bu sna tshogs kyi gzhal med khang rgya chen po 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:221b-26: ba dan sna tshogs 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:221b-27: ro brgya dang ldan pa'i kha zas kyi mchog dang /
K12D0686_H0689:221b-28: ro sna tshogs kyi mchog rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:221b-29: gtor ma bzang po rnams pa sna tshogs 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:221b-30: ji tsam de bzhin gshegs pa la 'os pa'i gzhal med khang dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:221b-31: byang chub sems dpa'i gzhal med khang ji lta ba de lta bu dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:221b-32: lha rnams kyi gzhal med khang ji lta ba de lta bu dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:222a-6: lto 'phye chen po rnams la so so'i gzhal med
K12D0686_H0689:222a-7: khang ji lta ba de lta bu dag 'byung bar
K12D0686_H0689:222a-8: 'gyur ro // mi rnams kyi khang pa ji lta ba dang /
K12D0686_H0689:222a-9: kha zas kyi mchog ji lta bu dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:222a-11: dgos pa'i rnam pa thams cad bgyi ba dang /
K12D0686_H0689:222a-12: de kho na nyid sgrub pa'i ji skad gsungs pa'i cho ga zhib mo dang /
K12D0686_H0689:222a-14: gsang sngags sgrub pa rnams bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:222a-15: de nas rig sngags 'chang gis grub pa bla na med pa thams cad 'thob par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:222a-16: gal te rig sngags 'chang gis las yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ste /
K12D0686_H0689:222a-17: don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po 'di brjod pa
K12D0686_H0689:222a-18: tsam gyis rig sngags 'chang gi mdun du bdag rang
K12D0686_H0689:222a-19: gi gzugs kyis nye bar mchis nas bsam pa dang
K12D0686_H0689:222a-20: / re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:222a-24: yongs su dag pa'i lha chen po ltar lus dag par bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:222a-30: don yod pa'i zhags pa'i rgyal po'i rnam par thar
K12D0686_H0689:222a-31: pa'i dkyil 'khor grub pa'i mchog thams cad stsal bar
K12D0686_H0689:222b-0: bgyi'o // rig @222b sngags 'chang 'khor los bsgyur ba chen po'i dbang bskur bas dbang bskur 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:222b-1: de kho na nyid yang dag par sgrub pa'i grub pa stsol bar bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:222b-2: don yod pa'i zhags pa'i 'jig rten pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:222b-3: 'jig rten las 'das pa sgrub pa'i grub pa chen po stsal bar bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:222b-4: shin tu rgya che zhing bag tshad ba ma mchis pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:222b-6: bkur sti chen po 'jig rten thams cad kyi mchog
K12D0686_H0689:222b-7: khyad par du 'phags shing nor 'du ba'i bkra shis
K12D0686_H0689:222b-10: som nyi bskyed par mi bgyi zhing dngos po gzhan du yang yid la mi bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:222b-11: sems can thams cad la byams pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:222b-12: snying rje dang dga' ba dang /
K12D0686_H0689:222b-13: btang snyoms kyis brtse ba la mchog tu brtson par bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:222b-14: bu gcig pa bzhin du sems can du gyur pa thams cad la mchog tu brtse bar bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:222b-18: snying rje'i lhag par bsam pas dmigs nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po bzla bar bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:222b-19: bzlas brjod kyi cho ga bgyi zhing phyag rgya dang gsang sngags kyang bzla bar bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:222b-20: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du gtogs
K12D0686_H0689:222b-21: pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams yid la bgyis nas
K12D0686_H0689:222b-22: sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom par bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:223a-2: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:223a-3: 'phags pa mgon po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag bgyis nas mngon sum du bsgom par bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:223a-4: bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
K12D0686_H0689:223a-5: gi rim mo'i gzugs la phyag rgya bgyis te mdun
K12D0686_H0689:223a-6: du rtsva'i gding ba gting na skyil mo krung bcas
K12D0686_H0689:223a-7: te mchis nas gzhan mi smra bar bzlas pa bgyi
K12D0686_H0689:223a-9: gsang ba'i de kho na nyid sgrub pa'o //
K12D0686_H0689:223a-10: de nas phyag rgya dang gsang sngags brjod par bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:223a-11: dbang la don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i de kho na nyid grub par gyur cig /
K12D0686_H0689:223a-12: 'jig rten dbang phyug mgon po thugs rje can sems can la byams pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:223a-13: sems can dag pa lag na padma can /
K12D0686_H0689:223a-14: sems can thams cad la byams pa'i bdag nyid can gyi byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs pas //
K12D0686_H0689:223a-15: phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs kun dang /
K12D0686_H0689:223a-16: lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang /
K12D0686_H0689:223a-17: srin po lha min gsang ba pa /
K12D0686_H0689:223a-18: 'jig rten skyong dang tshangs pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:223a-19: drag po khyab 'jug gzhon nu sogs //
K12D0686_H0689:223a-20: gshin rje chu lha lus ngan dang /
K12D0686_H0689:223a-21: drang srong tshogs dang de bzhin du //
K12D0686_H0689:223a-22: zla nyi kun 'gyed gzhon nu dang //
K12D0686_H0689:223a-23: de bzhin dbang phyug dbang chen dang //
K12D0686_H0689:223a-24: phyag rgya bcings pa tsam gyis ni //
K12D0686_H0689:223b-1: de bzhin pha rol phyin bcu dang //
K12D0686_H0689:223b-2: mgrin sngon de bzhin gos dkar can //
K12D0686_H0689:223b-3: de bzhin padma gar gyi dbang //
K12D0686_H0689:223b-4: rgyal dang rnam rgyal nyid dang ni //
K12D0686_H0689:223b-5: lcags sgrog rdo rje lcags sgrog dang //
K12D0686_H0689:223b-6: lha mo khro gnyer m'a ma k'i //
K12D0686_H0689:223b-7: dpe med pho nya mo dang ni //
K12D0686_H0689:223b-8: 'jigs med dpal dang dbyangs can dang //
K12D0686_H0689:223b-10: padma'i so can de bzhin du //
K12D0686_H0689:223b-11: ti se yi ni rtse mo na //
K12D0686_H0689:223b-13: de bzhin lag na rdo rje bcu /
K12D0686_H0689:223b-14: mthu chen ji bzhin rig 'dzin dbang //
K12D0686_H0689:223b-15: rdo rje 'chang chen de bzhin du //
K12D0686_H0689:223b-16: bcu gsum lha dbang lhan cig dang //
K12D0686_H0689:223b-17: sum cu gnyis nas lha dag ni //
K12D0686_H0689:223b-18: gsang sngags phyag rgya bcings tsam gyis //
K12D0686_H0689:223b-20: phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rnam par gzigs shing ston par mdzad do //
K12D0686_H0689:223b-21: de'i mod la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis rnam
K12D0686_H0689:223b-22: par gzigs shing rtag tu mchog stsol bar 'gyur ro
K12D0686_H0689:223b-23: // rtag tu mgon po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug phyag stong spyan stong pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:223b-24: phyag rgya sna tshogs 'dzin pa la blta 'tshal bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:223b-25: phyag rgya bcings pa tsam gyis ni //
K12D0686_H0689:223b-26: bram ze'i cha lugs don yod zhags //
K12D0686_H0689:223b-27: mthong bar 'gyur te som nyi med //
K12D0686_H0689:223b-28: mgrin sngon dang ni rta mgrin dang //
K12D0686_H0689:223b-29: de bzhin rgya mtsho'i klong dang ni //
K12D0686_H0689:223b-30: mgon po'i zhal ni bcu gcig dag //
K12D0686_H0689:224a-3: de bzhin gzigs pa bsam mi khyab //
K12D0686_H0689:224a-4: rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs dang ni //
K12D0686_H0689:224a-6: phyag rgya bcings pa tsam gyis ni //
K12D0686_H0689:224a-7: mgon po thams cad ston par mdzad //
K12D0686_H0689:224a-8: bde ba can gyi 'jig rten khams //
K12D0686_H0689:224a-10: byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs bskor ba //
K12D0686_H0689:224a-11: mgon po mod la mthong bar 'gyur //
K12D0686_H0689:224a-12: gzhan yang sangs rgyas zhing ni stong dag gi /
K12D0686_H0689:224a-13: chu bo gangga'i bye ma dang mnyam pa'i //
K12D0686_H0689:224a-14: de bzhin gshegs 'bum bye ba brgya phrag stong //
K12D0686_H0689:224a-15: byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs bcas yongs bskor mgon //
K12D0686_H0689:224a-16: phyag rgya bcing pa tsam gyis mthong bar 'gyur //
K12D0686_H0689:224a-17: mthong ba chen po'i rnam par gzhan mthong ste /
K12D0686_H0689:224a-18: nyin gcig bzhin du byang chub snying po dang /
K12D0686_H0689:224a-19: chos kyi 'khro lo de bzhin rdo rje'i gdan //
K12D0686_H0689:224a-20: de dag rmi lam snang ba mthong 'gyur bas //
K12D0686_H0689:224a-21: de la yid gnyis som nyi the tshom med //
K12D0686_H0689:224a-22: sangs rgyas rnams kyis gshung ba'am mtshams med lnga //
K12D0686_H0689:224a-23: mgon po che la gdug sems nyid dang ni //
K12D0686_H0689:224a-24: byang chub sems dpa' bar chad 'phags pa la //
K12D0686_H0689:224a-25: kha zer nyid dang dam chos bslu ba dang /
K12D0686_H0689:224a-26: rgyal ba'i gsung spong mnar med gzhol ba dang /
K12D0686_H0689:224a-27: mi bzad dmyal ba bcu drug gnas pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:224b-0: bskal pa 'bum mo @224b thams cad skad cig grol //
K12D0686_H0689:224b-1: phyag rgyal gsang sngags bzlas pa tsam gyis sam //
K12D0686_H0689:224b-2: thos sam mthong ngam ming ni bzung bas kyang //
K12D0686_H0689:224b-3: sdig pa de kun 'jig 'gyur som nyi med //
K12D0686_H0689:224b-4: don yod zhags snying phyag rgya mthong ba yang //
K12D0686_H0689:224b-5: 'jig rten mgon dang mtshungs te khyad par 'phags //
K12D0686_H0689:224b-6: sangs rgyas 'bum phrag stong dang gangga yi /
K12D0686_H0689:224b-7: bye ma brgya stong dag ni mthong bar 'gyur //
K12D0686_H0689:224b-8: byang chub snying por gtogs pa thams cad dang //
K12D0686_H0689:224b-9: chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar mtshungs //
K12D0686_H0689:224b-10: don yod rgyal po'i snying po phyag rgya dang //
K12D0686_H0689:224b-11: gsang sngags mthong nas bsod nams phung chen gyis //
K12D0686_H0689:224b-12: bsod nams phung po 'di dag 'phel bar 'gyur //
K12D0686_H0689:224b-13: de yi tshe yang rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur //
K12D0686_H0689:224b-14: de ni dpag tu med par som nyi med //
K12D0686_H0689:224b-15: de nas rig sngags 'chang ba gtsang gyur nas //
K12D0686_H0689:224b-16: gtsang ma'i gos bgos nas ni thog mar yang //
K12D0686_H0689:224b-17: yo byad sgrub pa gtsang zhing spyod pa gtsang //
K12D0686_H0689:224b-18: rtag tu yan lag spos ni sna tshogs dang //
K12D0686_H0689:224b-19: sna tshogs bdug pas rab tu bdugs bgyis shing //
K12D0686_H0689:224b-20: dpung pa lag pa lha yi spos kyis byug /
K12D0686_H0689:224b-21: gtsang ma'i sa phyogs gtsang ma'i stan bshams par /
K12D0686_H0689:224b-22: skyil mo krung bcas nas ni byams sems dang /
K12D0686_H0689:224b-23: snying rje'i lhag bsam de nyid mnyam bzhag nas //
K12D0686_H0689:224b-24: phyogs bcu'i dus gsum gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas dang /
K12D0686_H0689:225a-0: rtag tu 'jig rten dbang la phyag bgyi @225a *//
K12D0686_H0689:225a-2: rtag tu bla ma mchod nas chos la brtson //
K12D0686_H0689:225a-3: shin tu rig pa tshig gzhan mi smra bar //
K12D0686_H0689:225a-4: shin ti rig pas srung ba'i cho ga bgyi //
K12D0686_H0689:225a-5: shin tu bkra shis bla ma de nyid gus //
K12D0686_H0689:225a-6: bden par smra zhing snyan par smra ba dang //
K12D0686_H0689:225a-7: sems can kun la snying rje'i bdag nyid can //
K12D0686_H0689:225a-8: lhan cig rjes mthun gyur nas de nas ni //
K12D0686_H0689:225a-9: phyag rgya 'di bcing bar bgyi ste /
K12D0686_H0689:225a-10: lag pa padma'i tshul du bzhag la sor mo rnams
K12D0686_H0689:225a-11: mnyam par bcings te mthe'u chung zla ba'i tshul du
K12D0686_H0689:225a-14: don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying po'i rtsa ba'i phyag rgya ste /
K12D0686_H0689:225a-15: byang chub kyi snying po'i bar du stsol bar bgyid do //
K12D0686_H0689:225a-16: mgon po 'jig rten dbang phyug dgug pa'i gsang sngags 'di brjod do //
K12D0686_H0689:225a-17: aom aa mo gha bi ku ra bi ta sa
K12D0686_H0689:225a-18: manta aa wa lo ka ya na mastree ya dhv'a
K12D0686_H0689:225a-19: / aa dhi shthi ta aa mo ghra pa padme /
K12D0686_H0689:225a-20: tsa ra bi tsa ra sanytsa h'um h'um/
K12D0686_H0689:225a-21: de ma thag tu dus gsum la rnam par blta
K12D0686_H0689:225a-22: ba don yod pa'i rgyal po padma 'bar ba gsal
K12D0686_H0689:225a-23: ba'i cho 'phrul dang bcas pa'i phyag rgya'i rgyal pos
K12D0686_H0689:225a-24: shin tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i dus gsum
K12D0686_H0689:225a-25: du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mang po mtha'
K12D0686_H0689:225a-27: dus gsum du gshegs shing bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom
K12D0686_H0689:225a-28: ldan 'das de dag gi sku las 'od zer sna
K12D0686_H0689:225b-0: tshogs 'bum @225b phrag brgya stong du ma dag byung
K12D0686_H0689:225b-1: nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad rab
K12D0686_H0689:225b-2: tu dgyes shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing la mdzad pa'i
K12D0686_H0689:225b-3: thugs rje chen pos phyag gsar gyi kha dog lta
K12D0686_H0689:225b-4: bu brkyangs nas rig sngags 'chang gi spyi bor 'jog
K12D0686_H0689:225b-5: par 'gyur ro // grub pa dam pa don yod
K12D0686_H0689:225b-6: pa'i rnam par 'phrul ba'i byin gyis rlabs kyis byin
K12D0686_H0689:225b-7: gyis brlabs pa stsol bar 'gyur ro /
K12D0686_H0689:225b-16: kun 'gyed gzhon nu la sogs pa lha rnams srung ba dang /
K12D0686_H0689:225b-19: phyag rgya bcings pa tsam gyi mod la sdig pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:225b-22: chad pa thams cad las yongs su thar par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:225b-23: de'i grub pa yid du mchi bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:225b-24: las thams cad bgyid pa'i phyag rgya thams cad du mchog lags par grags pa lags so //
K12D0686_H0689:225b-25: don yod dam tshig mchog grags pa //
K12D0686_H0689:225b-26: padma rgyas pa'i phyag rgya bcing //
K12D0686_H0689:225b-27: mdzub mo gung mo rnams padma lcags kyu'i tshul du
K12D0686_H0689:225b-28: bgyid la sen mo mnyam par bzhag pa'i phyag rgya
K12D0686_H0689:225b-29: 'di bstan te rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor rtse
K12D0686_H0689:225b-30: ba'i phyag rgya 'dzin pa'i gsang sngags 'di brjod do
K12D0686_H0689:225b-31: // aom aa mo gha padmam ku sha sa man y'a na /
K12D0686_H0689:226a-2: bcings ma thag tu'am bzlas pa tsam gyis dus gsum
K12D0686_H0689:226a-3: du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad
K12D0686_H0689:226a-4: kyis legs so // zhes bgyi ba stsol bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:226a-5: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad dgyes pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:226a-9: thugs dgyes pa skye bar 'gyur zhing /
K12D0686_H0689:226a-10: rig sngags 'chang la thugs rje chen po rgyas pa'i
K12D0686_H0689:226a-11: snying po grub pa dam pa stsol bar 'gyur zhing
K12D0686_H0689:226a-12: // yang nas yang du mthong ba stsol bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:226a-13: mchog thams cad stsol bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:226a-14: don yod pa'i dam tshig grub pa stsol bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:226a-15: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhib mo phyag rgya dang /
K12D0686_H0689:226a-16: gsang sngags 'dzin pa rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor
K12D0686_H0689:226a-17: bzung ba tsam gyis dam tshig gi rjes su 'jug
K12D0686_H0689:226a-18: par 'gyur ro // thams cad du 'phags pa spyan
K12D0686_H0689:226a-19: ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi
K12D0686_H0689:226a-20: cho ga zhib mo phyag rgya dang /
K12D0686_H0689:226a-22: thams cad du dgos pa'i gsang sngags grub par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:226a-23: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mchog sbyin pa rtag tu blta 'tshal bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:226a-24: lag mthil padma ltar bgyis la mdzub mo gung mo
K12D0686_H0689:226b-0: rdo rje ltar @226b bgyi zhing mthe'u chung brkyang pa'i
K12D0686_H0689:226b-1: phyag rgya ni / padma 'chang la bdug pa dang //
K12D0686_H0689:226b-2: me tog la sogs dri rnams dang //
K12D0686_H0689:226b-3: phreng ba byug pa phye ma dang //
K12D0686_H0689:226b-4: ba dan gos dang rgyan dang ni //
K12D0686_H0689:226b-5: gtor ma mchod yon rab tu dbul //
K12D0686_H0689:226b-6: bum pa gang ba'i dri sogs dang //
K12D0686_H0689:226b-7: tshon skud sna lnga tshon phye 'o //
K12D0686_H0689:226b-8: gzhan yang zas ni sna tshogs la //
K12D0686_H0689:226b-9: phyag rgya 'di ni kun la mchog /
K12D0686_H0689:226b-10: 'di ni dngul ba'i phyag rgyar gsungs //
K12D0686_H0689:226b-11: thams cad du ni don yod mchog /
K12D0686_H0689:226b-12: go bar bgyid pa'i phyag rgya ni //
K12D0686_H0689:226b-13: padma'i phyag gis byin gyis brlabs //
K12D0686_H0689:226b-14: gung mor nor bu dkris pa lta bu'i phyag rgya
K12D0686_H0689:226b-15: 'di ni; bag tsha ba med pa'i padma rin po
K12D0686_H0689:226b-18: grub pa dam pa lags so //
K12D0686_H0689:226b-19: spyan drang ba'i gsang sngags ni /
K12D0686_H0689:226b-20: aom aa mo gha padma ma h'a satva aa ya tu mi ha manda le /
K12D0686_H0689:226b-21: bi ri bi ri padma bhu dze sv'a h'a /
K12D0686_H0689:226b-22: dus gsum gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams //
K12D0686_H0689:226b-23: gsol ba gdab pa'i gsang sngags te //
K12D0686_H0689:226b-24: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang //
K12D0686_H0689:226b-25: phyag na padma gsol gdab dgug /
K12D0686_H0689:226b-26: lha rnams kun dang de bzhin du //
K12D0686_H0689:226b-27: dkyil 'khor gyi ni lha rnams dgug /
K12D0686_H0689:226b-28: phyag rgya 'di ni bcings pa yis //
K12D0686_H0689:226b-29: phyogs bcu kun gyi sangs rgyas dang //
K12D0686_H0689:226b-30: de bzhin byang chub sems dpa'ang 'du //
K12D0686_H0689:226b-31: lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang //
K12D0686_H0689:226b-32: dri za lha min de bzhin du //
K12D0686_H0689:226b-33: nam mkha' lding dang mi'am ci //
K12D0686_H0689:226b-34: lto 'phye chen po nyid dag ste //
K12D0686_H0689:227a-2: bsrung ba'i phyir ni som nyi med //
K12D0686_H0689:227a-3: lag pa rdo rje'i tshul du bzhag la lag pa'i mthe'u chung rnams padma'i mtshams su bya ste /
K12D0686_H0689:227a-4: gung mo rnams yid tsam bskums pa'i phyag rgya bcings pa ni /
K12D0686_H0689:227a-5: grub ldan 'di ni phyogs bcings dang //
K12D0686_H0689:227a-6: dkyil 'khor bcing bar bgyi ba yi //
K12D0686_H0689:227a-7: srung ba'i las la bag tsha med //
K12D0686_H0689:227a-8: phyag rgya 'di ni bcings tsam dang //
K12D0686_H0689:227a-9: gsang sngags stong ni bzlas tsam gyis //
K12D0686_H0689:227a-10: dpag tshad bdun ni khor yug tu //
K12D0686_H0689:227a-11: mtshams bcings dkyil 'khor bcings pa dang //
K12D0686_H0689:227a-12: srung ba'i las ni bgyis par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:227a-13: aom aa mo gha badzra dri dha padma bandha sa mante na ma h'a sa manta raksha tnu mam/
K12D0686_H0689:227a-14: tsu ru tsu ru h'um phat/
K12D0686_H0689:227a-15: de nas don yod phyag rgya ste /
K12D0686_H0689:227a-16: grub ldan sems can kun smra na //
K12D0686_H0689:227a-17: don yod pa yi phyag rgya ni /
K12D0686_H0689:227a-18: khyad par 'phags pa gzhan yang bstan //
K12D0686_H0689:227a-19: rdo rje thal mo sbyar nas sor mo rnams mnyam
K12D0686_H0689:227a-20: par bzhag ste srin lag kha gdengs la sor mo
K12D0686_H0689:227a-21: rnams yid tsam bskums pa ni /
K12D0686_H0689:227a-22: don yod sna tshogs rgyal po yi //
K12D0686_H0689:227a-23: padma'i phyag rgya chen por bsgrags //
K12D0686_H0689:227a-24: phyag rgya 'di ni las kun dang //
K12D0686_H0689:227a-25: 'jug pa'i las kun sbyar ba dang //
K12D0686_H0689:227a-26: dkyil 'khor phyag rgya mchog kun gsungs //
K12D0686_H0689:227a-27: phyag rgya 'di ni bzung tsam dang /
K12D0686_H0689:227a-28: gsang sngags dam pa bsrungs bgyis na //
K12D0686_H0689:227b-0: @227b dus gsum gshegs pa rnam thar pa'i //
K12D0686_H0689:227b-3: aa dhi shthi te padmo bi shva r'u pa dha re /
K12D0686_H0689:227b-5: pra be sha tu stree ya dho nu ga ta na dha ri tu ti sv'a h'a /
K12D0686_H0689:227b-6: phyag rgya 'di ni bcings tsam gyis //
K12D0686_H0689:227b-7: de nyid grub pas phyogs bcu yi //
K12D0686_H0689:227b-8: sangs rgyas zhing ni rnam drug tu //
K12D0686_H0689:227b-9: g-yo bar 'gyur bar so ma nyi med //
K12D0686_H0689:227b-13: rtag tu blta shing mdun na mchos //
K12D0686_H0689:227b-14: sangs rgyas kyi ni zhing kun dang /
K12D0686_H0689:227b-16: sum cu rtsa gnyis gnas rnams na //
K12D0686_H0689:227b-17: gnas pa'i lha rnams sgo 'byed cing //
K12D0686_H0689:227b-18: sum cu rtsa gsum gnas sgo na /
K12D0686_H0689:227b-19: gnas pa thams cad sgo 'byed do //
K12D0686_H0689:227b-20: bde chen 'jig rten khams dag ni //
K12D0686_H0689:227b-21: sgo na gnas pa sgo 'byed do //
K12D0686_H0689:227b-22: phyag rgya 'di ni bcings tsam gyis //
K12D0686_H0689:227b-24: phyag rgya sdig pa thams cad 'phrog /
K12D0686_H0689:227b-25: nye ba'i nyon mongs thams cad 'joms //
K12D0686_H0689:227b-26: sdug bsngal kun las rnam par gro //
K12D0686_H0689:227b-27: gnod pa thams cad 'jigs par bgyid //
K12D0686_H0689:227b-28: dmyal ba bcu drug rnams las thar //
K12D0686_H0689:227b-29: phyag rgya bcings pa tsam gyis ni /
K12D0686_H0689:227b-30: mi bzad 'jigs pa brgyad rnams dang /
K12D0686_H0689:227b-31: nyes byas thams cad 'jig par bgyid //
K12D0686_H0689:227b-32: dmyal ba'i sgo ni bcad par 'gyur //
K12D0686_H0689:228a-2: mtshams med lnga ni bgyis pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:228a-3: sdig pa kun las rnam par thar //
K12D0686_H0689:228a-4: sems can kun la rtag tu sdug /
K12D0686_H0689:228a-5: de bzhin gshegs kun byin gyis rlob //
K12D0686_H0689:228a-6: phyag rgya 'di nyid mthe bo'i rtse mo cung zad
K12D0686_H0689:228a-7: bkug la bzung ste gung mo padma'i ral ba'i tshul
K12D0686_H0689:228a-8: du bgyis te spyi bo'i ral ba sa la bzhag
K12D0686_H0689:228a-9: pa ni; padma'i ral ba'i phyag rgya lags te /
K12D0686_H0689:228a-11: don yod pa'i zhags pa zhes bsgrags te /
K12D0686_H0689:228a-12: sems can thams cad la sman pa'i slad du gsang sngags 'di brjod par bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:228a-13: aom aa mo gha padmo dza le bi sho dha
K12D0686_H0689:228a-14: ya h'um bi ri bi ri bi ma le sv'a
K12D0686_H0689:228a-15: h'a / phyag rgya spyi bor bzhag nas chab dag gis /
K12D0686_H0689:228a-16: bkrus nas gtsang mas gsang sngags 'di //
K12D0686_H0689:228a-17: brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas nas su //
K12D0686_H0689:228a-18: phyag rgya gsang sngags dogs med pas /
K12D0686_H0689:228a-19: rtag tu bkrus pa'i mod tsam gyis //
K12D0686_H0689:228a-20: mi gtsang ba ni gtsang bar 'gyur //
K12D0686_H0689:228a-21: mi gtsang spyod pa gzang ba dang /
K12D0686_H0689:228a-22: tshangs spyod ma yin tshangs spyod 'gyur //
K12D0686_H0689:228a-23: mi thub pa ni thub par 'gyur //
K12D0686_H0689:228a-24: bsod nams phung po lha bzhin 'bar //
K12D0686_H0689:228a-25: zla ba nyi ma bzhin du mdzes //
K12D0686_H0689:228a-26: 'jig rten kun snying rtag tu sdug /
K12D0686_H0689:228a-27: gsang sngags bla na med pa 'grub //
K12D0686_H0689:228a-28: grub pa don yod zhags pa yi //
K12D0686_H0689:228b-0: bsrung ba'i phyir ni so ma nyi @228b med; ;mgon po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs //
K12D0686_H0689:228b-1: sems dpa' mchog sbyin dag pa po //
K12D0686_H0689:228b-2: mchog sbyin rgyun du thams cad du //
K12D0686_H0689:228b-3: nyi ma re re mthong 'gyur zhing //
K12D0686_H0689:228b-5: de bzhin mgu dang rgyas par 'gyur //
K12D0686_H0689:228b-6: thams cad du ni las 'grub ste //
K12D0686_H0689:228b-7: gnod pa kun las rnam par grol //
K12D0686_H0689:228b-8: sdig pa kun las rnam par thar //
K12D0686_H0689:228b-9: thams cad du ni bkra shis mchog /
K12D0686_H0689:228b-10: khrus kyi rnam pa 'di dag no //
K12D0686_H0689:228b-11: don yod khrus kyi mchog yin no //
K12D0686_H0689:228b-12: lag gnyis bsdams la 'og tu bstan //
K12D0686_H0689:228b-13: srin lag gnyis yid tsam bskums pa ni /
K12D0686_H0689:228b-14: padma'i nor bu phyag rgya lags te /
K12D0686_H0689:228b-15: kun nas kyang ni mnyam par bzhag /
K12D0686_H0689:228b-17: skyil mo krung bcas mchis nas su //
K12D0686_H0689:228b-18: phyag rgya 'di dag bcings bgyis shing //
K12D0686_H0689:228b-19: mnyam par bzhag nas gsang sngags bzlas //
K12D0686_H0689:228b-20: bcings pa tsam gyi mod nas ni //
K12D0686_H0689:228b-21: skyil krung rdo rje lhun mnyam 'gyur //
K12D0686_H0689:228b-22: kun nas go char gyur nas ni //
K12D0686_H0689:228b-23: bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad dang //
K12D0686_H0689:228b-24: gnod sbyin srin po 'byung por bcas //
K12D0686_H0689:228b-25: lha min mkha' lding gis mi mthong //
K12D0686_H0689:228b-26: phyogs dang phyogs mtshams rnams dag tu //

K12D0686_H0689:243b-27: na / de dag thams cad dran pa tsam gyis 'thab pa dang /
