K12D0686_H0689:244a-6: mi mdza' ba thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:244a-11: mu ge'i dgon pa'i 'jigs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:244a-12: ha cang char che ba dang /
K12D0686_H0689:244a-13: dus ma lags pa'i char dang /
K12D0686_H0689:244a-16: tsha ba mi bzad pa'i 'jigs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:244a-17: dpag chad brgya stong khor yug tu mtshams chen po bcings pa bgyis par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:244a-18: ji lta ji ltar yid la bsam pa de lta
K12D0686_H0689:244a-19: de ltar thams cad 'grub par 'gyur pas don yod
K12D0686_H0689:244a-20: rgyal po mchod par bgyi zhing bzlas brjod bgyi /
K12D0686_H0689:244a-23: gsol ba bgyis pa tsam gyi mod la thams cad phun sum tshogs par 'gyur te /
K12D0686_H0689:244a-25: so ma nyi bskyed par mi bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:244a-26: cho ga zhib mo las ji skad gsum pa bzhin
K12D0686_H0689:244a-27: las bgyid pa rnams kyis cho ga de bzhin du
K12D0686_H0689:244a-28: bsgrub par bgyi'o // de nas skad cig de'i mod la thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:244a-33: sems can thams cad la mchog tu brtse bar bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:244b-0: 'phags pa spyan ras @244b gzigs dbang phyug la mchod par bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:244b-1: dkon mchog gsum la gus par bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:244b-2: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la gus pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:244b-3: bla mar yid la bsgom par bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:244b-4: mi gtsang ba spyod pa gtsang bar bgyi zhing yongs
K12D0686_H0689:244b-5: su dag pa'i ngang tshul can du bsgom par bgyi'o
K12D0686_H0689:244b-6: // don yod pa'i zhags pa de kho na nyid
K12D0686_H0689:244b-7: kyi cho ga sgrub pa yid bzhin gyi nor bu
K12D0686_H0689:244b-9: de nas zhags pa'i 'khor lo'i cho ga sgrub pa bshad par bgyi ste /
K12D0686_H0689:244b-10: rig sngags 'chang de kho na nyid sgrub pas phug
K12D0686_H0689:244b-11: tu 'jug pa'i sgrub pa thams cad kyi mchog phug
K12D0686_H0689:244b-13: lha ma yin gyi gnas su 'jug pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:244b-14: mi 'am ci'i gnas su 'jug pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:244b-15: dri za'i gnas su 'jug pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:244b-17: nam mkha' la rgyu ba dang /
K12D0686_H0689:244b-18: sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i gnas su 'jug pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:244b-19: 'og min gyi gnas kyi bar du 'jug pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:244b-20: klu'i rgyal po'i gnas su 'jug pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:244b-22: nyi ma'i gnas su 'jug pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:244b-23: zla ba'i gnas su 'jug pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:244b-24: skar ma'i gnas su 'jug pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:244b-25: rgyu skar gyi gnas su 'jug pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:244b-29: ji lta ji ltar yid la bsam pa de lta de ltar 'jig rten pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:245a-0: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga sgrub pa tshegs @245a *//
K12D0686_H0689:245a-2: rtsol ba chung ngus 'grub par 'gyur te /
K12D0686_H0689:245a-4: som nyi bskyed par mi bya'o //
K12D0686_H0689:245a-5: rig sngags 'chang gtsang mar gyur pas legs par khrus
K12D0686_H0689:245a-6: bgyis te gos gtsang ma bgos nas zas dkar gsum
K12D0686_H0689:245a-7: 'tshal la / gtsang ma de kho na nyid la
K12D0686_H0689:245a-8: gus pas sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom par
K12D0686_H0689:245a-9: 'tshal la / bgyi'o // byams pa'i sems la mnyam
K12D0686_H0689:245a-10: par bzhag nas snying rje'i bsam pa dag pa'i yid
K12D0686_H0689:245a-11: kyis tshes bcu gsum nas brtsams te zla ba nya
K12D0686_H0689:245a-12: ba'i bar du gsal ba shin tu bkra shis pa
K12D0686_H0689:245a-13: la dus gsum du ci 'byor ba'i rnam pa rnams
K12D0686_H0689:245a-15: rtag tu brgya rtsa brgyad pa yi //
K12D0686_H0689:245a-16: dus gsum rgyun du bzlas brjod bgyi //
K12D0686_H0689:245a-17: nyin par dus gsum lan gsum ste //
K12D0686_H0689:245a-18: mtshan mo'i dus su lan gsum bgyi //
K12D0686_H0689:245a-20: skud pa gsum las bsgrub bgyi ste //
K12D0686_H0689:245a-21: ras skud padma'i skud pa dang //
K12D0686_H0689:245a-23: de ni legs par tshad bzhin du //
K12D0686_H0689:245a-24: khru ni sum cu rtsa drug bgyi //
K12D0686_H0689:245a-25: 'khor lo rnam pa gsum las bgyi //
K12D0686_H0689:245a-26: rgyar ni sor bzhi'i chad lags te /
K12D0686_H0689:245a-27: snying por bcas shing mu khyud bcas //
K12D0686_H0689:245a-28: kun nas rtsibs dang ldan pa dag /
K12D0686_H0689:245a-29: gser dang dngul dang zangs las bgyi //
K12D0686_H0689:245a-30: chos bstan legs par brgyan pa yi //
K12D0686_H0689:245b-0: bzang po'i stan la gzhag par @245b bgyi; ;spos kyi dkyil 'khor me tog gi /
K12D0686_H0689:245b-1: sil ma bkram nas bum pa dgod //
K12D0686_H0689:245b-2: de bzhin mchod yon snod kyang bsham //
K12D0686_H0689:245b-3: ri mo'i gzugs kyi mdun du chos kyi stan bshams
K12D0686_H0689:245b-4: par bgyis pa'i steng du 'khor lo'i zhags pa bzhag
K12D0686_H0689:245b-5: ste mchod pa bgyis la bsam pa ji lta ba
K12D0686_H0689:245b-6: bzhin du dus gsum du lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas
K12D0686_H0689:245b-7: brjod bgyi'o // de nas tshes bco lnga'i zla ba
K12D0686_H0689:245b-8: nya ba la nyin zhag gcig mchis par 'gyur pas
K12D0686_H0689:245b-9: tshig gzhan mi smra bar 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
K12D0686_H0689:245b-10: dbang phyug gi ri mo'i gzugs la mchod pa bgyi
K12D0686_H0689:245b-11: zhing bdug pa rnam pa gsum po aa ga ru
K12D0686_H0689:245b-13: gu gul rnams dbul bar bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:245b-14: ri mo'i gzugs kyi mdun du chos kyi stan mchis
K12D0686_H0689:245b-15: pa la mngon du phyogs te mchis nas don yod
K12D0686_H0689:245b-16: pa'i zhags pa'i snying po stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod
K12D0686_H0689:245b-17: bgyis te yungs kar re re la bzlas brjod bgyis
K12D0686_H0689:245b-18: pas zhags pa'i steng du gtor bar bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:245b-19: stong rtsa brgyad tshang nas zhags pa 'bar zhing 'khor
K12D0686_H0689:245b-20: lo nam mkha' la mchis nas 'bar zhing lding bar
K12D0686_H0689:245b-21: 'gyur ro // rig sngags 'chang gi lus kyi stod dang /
K12D0686_H0689:245b-22: spyi bo nas 'od zer 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:245b-23: ri mo'i gzugs las legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byin par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:246a-0: de nas rig sngags 'chang gis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i 'khor la zhags @246a *//
K12D0686_H0689:246a-1: pa'i cho ga rgya chen po 'di grub par 'tshal bar bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:246a-2: de nas rig sngags 'chang gis mchod pa chen po
K12D0686_H0689:246a-3: bgyis la don yod khro bo'i rgyal po lan stong
K12D0686_H0689:246a-4: rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi ste /
K12D0686_H0689:246a-5: de'i 'og tu rig sngags 'chang gis zhags pa blang bar bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:246a-6: lag pa g-yon pa 'khor lo'i phyag rgya'i tshul du bcing bar bgyi zhing /
K12D0686_H0689:246a-7: g-yas pa zhags pa'i phyag rgya dang 'khor lo'i tshul
K12D0686_H0689:246a-8: la brten nas blangs te don yod pa'i zhags pa'i
K12D0686_H0689:246a-9: snying po brjod nas phyogs bzhir 'phang bar bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:246a-10: de nas phyogs bcur khro bo'i rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:246a-11: de nas bdag nyid kyi lus la dbang bskur ba'i tshul du lan bdun du bskor bar bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:246a-12: de nas phyag rgya'i tshul du bskor ba tsam gyi
K12D0686_H0689:246a-13: mod la rig sngags 'chang 'khor los bsgyur ba'i dbang
K12D0686_H0689:246a-15: dam pa chen po 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:246a-16: 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po chen po legs mthong
K12D0686_H0689:246a-17: rang gi gzugs kyi mdun na mchis nas rig sngags
K12D0686_H0689:246a-18: 'chang gi rkang pa spyi bos blangs nas 'di skad
K12D0686_H0689:246a-20: rig sngags 'chang gis ci bka' stsal pa de bgyi'o
K12D0686_H0689:246a-21: zhes ci bsgo ba'i don de dang de thams cad
K12D0686_H0689:246a-23: bran gyi rang bzhin gyis thams cad du las bgyid par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:246b-0: de nas rig sngags 'chang gi @246b gnas su 'jug
K12D0686_H0689:246b-1: par 'tshal bas 'di ltar nub gsum du mchis par
K12D0686_H0689:246b-2: gyur pas zhags pa'i phyag rgya lag pas blang bar
K12D0686_H0689:246b-3: bgyi'o // phug gi sgo gang lags pa der zhags pa lan gsum du bskor bar bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:246b-4: don yod pa'i rgyal po bzlas brjod bgyis te zhags pa gdab par bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:246b-5: zhags pa btab pa tsam gyi mod la gnas kyi phug gi sgo thams cad phye bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:246b-14: lam mi bde ba thams cad bsal ba dang /
K12D0686_H0689:246b-20: lcags sgrog rnams dum bu dum bur chad cing gyes par 'gyur /
K12D0686_H0689:246b-24: shin tu dri ma med pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:246b-25: shin tu rgya che ba'i gzhal med khang 'byor ba rnam par 'phrul pa dag mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:246b-26: rin po che sna tshogs kyis bkra ba /
K12D0686_H0689:246b-27: rin po che sna bdun gyis brgyan pa'i gnas //
K12D0686_H0689:246b-28: rin po che sna tshogs kyi ljon shing gis brgyan
K12D0686_H0689:246b-29: pa'i gzhal med khang mthong bar 'gyur ro; ;me tog
K12D0686_H0689:246b-30: sna tshogs kyi ra ba shin tu dri zhim pa'i
K12D0686_H0689:246b-31: gzhal med khang mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:246b-32: de nas rig sngags 'chang gis lag pa'i zhags pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:247a-1: tshul mngon sum du bgyis nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po bzlas te 'jug par bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:247a-2: rig sngags 'chang gnas su zhugs pa tsam kho nas
K12D0686_H0689:247a-3: gnas mchog de yang rnam pa drug tu 'gul ba
K12D0686_H0689:247a-7: lha'i 'od zer gyi snang ba chen pos snang bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:247a-8: de nas rig sngags 'chang 'jug par bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:247a-9: de nas don yod pa rnam par dag pa dri
K12D0686_H0689:247a-10: ma med pa zhes bgyi ba'i sman bud med kyi
K12D0686_H0689:247a-11: gzugs lha'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa /
K12D0686_H0689:247a-12: lha'i gos kyi rgyan gyis klubs pa /
K12D0686_H0689:247a-13: kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa /
K12D0686_H0689:247a-15: b'i dza p'u ra thogs pa mchi bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:247a-16: sman bud med kyi gzugs 'chang ba de mthong ba
K12D0686_H0689:247a-17: tsam kho nas dpag tshad gang tsam nas gzi brjid
K12D0686_H0689:247a-18: thams cad dang / stobs thams cad nye bar sgrub par bgyid do //
K12D0686_H0689:247a-19: de nas rig sngags 'chang gis don yod pa'i 'khor lo'i zhags pa mdun du bcing bar bgyi ste /
K12D0686_H0689:247a-20: mthong ba tsam gyi mod la de'i stobs dang /
K12D0686_H0689:247a-24: de nas bud med de dgod pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:247a-25: aom zhes bgyi bas mnan par bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:247a-26: khro bo'i rgyal po bzla bar bgyi ste /
K12D0686_H0689:247a-27: kha bub tu 'gyel nas chab 'byung bar 'gyur te /
K12D0686_H0689:247b-0: chab de la reg par mi @247b bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:247b-1: don yod rgyal po bzla bar bgyi ste /
K12D0686_H0689:247b-2: de nas mig tshugs kyis blta bar bgyid na /
K12D0686_H0689:247b-3: rig sngags 'chang gis zhags pas bzhu bar bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:247b-4: de'i 'og tu bdud rtsi'i chab 'byung ste /
K12D0686_H0689:247b-7: kun tu byugs pa tsam gyis nam mkha' la mchi bar 'gyur te /
K12D0686_H0689:247b-8: thog mar rlung gi phung po nas 'dzeg par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:247b-10: phyogs bcu thams cad du gtogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs

K12D0686_H0689:247b-14: gnas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:247b-15: gang dag bzhugs shing bzhes la 'tsho ba dag ji
K12D0686_H0689:247b-16: ltar lag mthil na mchis pa de bzhin du mthong
K12D0686_H0689:247b-17: bar 'gyur ro // gang dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:247b-19: gang dag ma byon pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:247b-20: gang dag da ltar byung ba dang /
K12D0686_H0689:247b-22: gang dag ring bsrel snying po'i mchod rten chen po'i srog shing gi tshogs can dag dang /
K12D0686_H0689:247b-23: de bzhin du ji ltar 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi
K12D0686_H0689:247b-24: khang pa de dag thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro
K12D0686_H0689:247b-25: // bdag nyid la kun nas byugs te /

K12D0686_H0689:247b-27: skra sngo la cung zad 'khyil bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:248a-0: mig lha'i autpa la sngon po mchog 'dra bar 'gyur @248a *//
K12D0686_H0689:248a-1: ro; ;tshe lha'i bskal pa brgya stong du 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:248a-2: rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los bsgyur ba 'bum phrag

K12D0686_H0689:248a-6: rig sngags 'chang gi bu mo gangg'a'i klung gi bye

K12D0686_H0689:248a-9: yid la brnag pa tsam gyis lha'i zas kyi mchog
K12D0686_H0689:248a-10: ro brgya dang ldan pa dag mdun du 'byung bar
K12D0686_H0689:248a-11: 'gyur ro // lha'i btung ba chen po bdud rtsi'i ro bro ba dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro //

K12D0686_H0689:248a-14: mdun nas rgyug par bgyid do //
K12D0686_H0689:248a-17: log 'dren thams cad bcom pa dang /

K12D0686_H0689:248a-25: gang du bcing pa de yang rin po che sna bdun du 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:248a-26: gang du zhugs pa thams cad mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:248a-27: de la lha thams cad gnas 'cha' bar 'gyur ro //

K12D0686_H0689:248b-2: 'khor de thams cad byang chub kyi snying po la
K12D0686_H0689:248b-3: thug gi bar du de'i phyi bzhin rjes su 'brang

K12D0686_H0689:249a-44: snying rje chen po yid la bgyid pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:249b-0: sangs @249b rgyas yid la bgyis pas 'phags pa spyan
K12D0686_H0689:249b-1: ras gzigs dbang phyug don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cha
K12D0686_H0689:249b-3: mchog tu brtse ba yid la bgyid pas tshig gzhan
K12D0686_H0689:249b-4: mi smra bar dbugs dbyung bar bgyi zhing lam drang
K12D0686_H0689:249b-6: sengge'i khri la mngon du mchis nas don yod pa'i
K12D0686_H0689:249b-7: 'khor lo'i zhags pa thog mar sengge'i khri'i steng du
K12D0686_H0689:249b-8: gzhag par bgyi'o // 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal bo //
K12D0686_H0689:249b-10: de'i 'og tu rig sngags 'chang rang nyid mchis nas
K12D0686_H0689:249b-11: steng du gtogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
K12D0686_H0689:249b-12: la phyag bgyi zhing 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
K12D0686_H0689:249b-13: phyug mchog sbyin pa la yang phyag bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:249b-14: des dgra thams cad pham bar bgyis par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:249b-15: gal te 'og tu phyogs nas phyag bgyis na /
K12D0686_H0689:249b-16: de nas 'khor los rig snags 'chang gi phyir rgol ba rnams mgo bcad par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:249b-17: rig sngags 'chang mchis ma thag tu gnas rnam pa
K12D0686_H0689:249b-18: drug tu g-yos nas sgra chen po 'byung bar 'gyur
K12D0686_H0689:249b-19: ro // ca co'i sgra chen po 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:249b-20: lha'i rol mo'i cha byad yan lag lnga dang ldan pa dag 'dun par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:249b-21: nam mkha'i lha rnams kyis kyang gzhal med khang chen
K12D0686_H0689:249b-22: po nas dbu rgyan dang cod pan gyis rig sngags
K12D0686_H0689:249b-23: 'chang gi mgo bo la dbang bskur bar bgyid do
K12D0686_H0689:250a-0: // @250a *// dbang bskur ba tsam gyi mod la rin po che sna bdun gyi char 'bab par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:250a-5: lha'i me tog bkra ba sna tshogs kyi char dang /
K12D0686_H0689:250a-6: lha'i rgyan gyi char 'bab par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:250a-7: de nas lha'i bu mos rin po che sna bdun
K12D0686_H0689:250a-8: gyi snod du bdud rtsi'i bcud 'tshal te mchis nas
K12D0686_H0689:250a-10: rig sngags 'chang gis blangs nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po bzla bar bgyi'o /
K12D0686_H0689:250a-11: de nas rig sngags 'chang gis reg par bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:250a-12: rig sngags 'chang gis reg pa tsam gyi mod la
K12D0686_H0689:250a-13: lha'i lus rnam par dag pa thob nas bags pa'i
K12D0686_H0689:250a-15: skra lhag par sngo ba dang /
K12D0686_H0689:250a-16: mig autpa la sngon po ltar lha'i mig yongs su dag par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:250a-17: tshe'i tshad lha'i bskal ba 'bum phrag brgya stong du 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:250a-18: gal te phyir mi ldog par 'tshal na /
K12D0686_H0689:250a-19: de'i bcud kyis len mchog las ji tsam 'tshal ba
K12D0686_H0689:250a-20: blangs te lha'i chab tsandan gyi dri dang ldan pa'i
K12D0686_H0689:250a-21: nang du zhugs nas khrus bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:250a-22: khrus bgyis pa tsam gyi mod la phug gi sgo rang 'bye bar 'gyur zhing //
K12D0686_H0689:250a-23: ji ltar dbang phyug chen po'i gzugs 'dra bar mthong na ni /
K12D0686_H0689:250a-24: 'jig rten thams cad kyi mchod gnas kyi gtso bo gcig pur 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:250b-0: ji @250b ltar 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
K12D0686_H0689:250b-1: bzhin du rig sngags 'chang 'di yang mchod pa dang
K12D0686_H0689:250b-3: bla mas bla mar bgyi ba de lta bur 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:250b-4: gang du bcud kyis len mchog 'dis reg na /
K12D0686_H0689:250b-5: 'dzam bu chu bo gser yongs su dag par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:250b-14: de dag thams cad 'dzam bu'i gser yongs su dag
K12D0686_H0689:250b-15: par 'gyur ba nas dgos pa'i bar du 'gyur ro
K12D0686_H0689:250b-16: / de nas rig sngags 'chang klu mo'am /
K12D0686_H0689:250b-19: rig sngags 'chang de gos gtsang ma bgos nas legs par khrus bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:250b-22: bco lnga la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
K12D0686_H0689:250b-23: gi ri mo'i gzugs la mchod pa bgyis nas nyin
K12D0686_H0689:250b-25: 'khor lo'i zhags pa chen po 'di chos kyi stan
K12D0686_H0689:250b-26: legs par brgyan pa'i stan bzang po'i steng du gzhag
K12D0686_H0689:250b-27: par bgyi zhing mchod pa chen po bgyi ste /
K12D0686_H0689:250b-28: de nyid kyi mdun du tshig gzhan mi smra bar
K12D0686_H0689:250b-29: lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te yungs kar re re
K12D0686_H0689:250b-30: nas bzlas brjod bgyis pa zhags pa'i steng du gtor
K12D0686_H0689:250b-31: bar bgyi'o // lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang /
K12D0686_H0689:251a-0: zhags pa de yang sbrul bzhin du yongs su 'khyil la 'khor tlo'i gdengs ka'i tshul du @251a *//
K12D0686_H0689:251a-2: de nas rig sngags 'chang gis zhags pa blangs te klu gnas pa'i mtsho'am /
K12D0686_H0689:251a-4: lha mo gnas pa'i mtsho 'gram du mchis nas don
K12D0686_H0689:251a-5: yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po bzlas te gnas kyi
K12D0686_H0689:251a-6: nang du zhags pa 'phang par bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:251a-7: 'phangs ma thag kho nar slar yang dran par bgyi
K12D0686_H0689:251a-8: ste; ji lta bu'i don yid la bsam pa'i don
K12D0686_H0689:251a-9: de zhags pas bcings nas ji ltar bsam pa de
K12D0686_H0689:251a-11: gzhan yang ji ltar yid la bsam pa'i nor ram /
K12D0686_H0689:251a-24: gzhan yang gzhal med khang ji lta bur 'byor ba can dag don du gnyer na /
K12D0686_H0689:251a-26: de thams cad 'dren par bgyid do //
K12D0686_H0689:251a-27: gang dang gang du 'phangs pa de dang der ji
K12D0686_H0689:251a-28: ltar yid la bsam pa de nyid shin tu gsal
K12D0686_H0689:251a-29: bar yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:251a-30: dngos po gzhan du mi 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:251a-34: rje'u rigs kyis ci dang ci bsam pa 'grub par bgyid do //
K12D0686_H0689:251b-0: bu mo'i ming nas brjod @251b de zhags pa 'phangs
K12D0686_H0689:251b-1: pa tsam gyi mod la zhags pas bcings nas 'dren
K12D0686_H0689:251b-2: par 'gyur ro // tha na ri dvags dang /
K12D0686_H0689:251b-7: ma he yang 'dren par bgyid do //
K12D0686_H0689:251b-8: gang gi mid nas brjod de g-yul 'gyed pa'i nang du 'phangs na /
K12D0686_H0689:251b-9: de yang zhags pas bcings nas mdun du mchis te
K12D0686_H0689:251b-10: ji ltar yid la bsam pa de bzhin du thams
K12D0686_H0689:251b-12: zla ba dang nyi ma dbab par 'tshal na /
K12D0686_H0689:251b-13: zla ba dang nyi ma'i mdun du mchis nas don
K12D0686_H0689:251b-14: yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan bdun bzlas te
K12D0686_H0689:251b-15: zla ba dang nyi ma'i mngon sum du zhags pa
K12D0686_H0689:251b-16: 'phangs nas slar yang drang bar bgyi ste /
K12D0686_H0689:251b-17: zla ba dang nyi ma zhags pas bcings nas drangs par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:251b-18: nam mkha' las babs nas rig sngags 'chang gi mdun
K12D0686_H0689:251b-19: du mchis te ji ltar yid la bsam pa bzhin
K12D0686_H0689:251b-20: dgos pa thams cad sgrub par bgyid do //
K12D0686_H0689:251b-21: 'on te zla ba dang nyi ma'i gnas su mchi bar 'tshal na /
K12D0686_H0689:251b-22: zhags pa'i phyag rgya bcings pa lag pas blangs te
K12D0686_H0689:251b-23: don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying po bzlas pa dang
K12D0686_H0689:251b-24: / rig sngags 'chang nam mkha' la 'phur nas nyi
K12D0686_H0689:251b-25: ma dang zla ba'i stan la ji srid du 'tshal
K12D0686_H0689:251b-26: bar longs spyod par 'gyur zhing slar bde ba dang
K12D0686_H0689:252a-0: gtsang ma legs par khrus bgyis pas gos gtsang @252a *//
K12D0686_H0689:252a-1: bgo bar bgyi zhing nags khung gi sgor lan nyi
K12D0686_H0689:252a-2: shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis te zhags pa 'phang
K12D0686_H0689:252a-3: bar bgyi'o // lag pas zhags pa 'phangs pa tsam
K12D0686_H0689:252a-4: gyis nags khung gi gnas kyi gzhal med khang gi
K12D0686_H0689:252a-5: klu thams cad bcings nas thams cad rig sngags 'chang
K12D0686_H0689:252a-6: gi mdun na mchis par 'gyur zhing /
K12D0686_H0689:252a-7: rig sngags 'chang la phyag bgyis nas rig sngags 'chang /
K12D0686_H0689:252a-8: khyod gnas chen po mchog tu zhugs shig ces smra bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:252a-9: de nas rig sngags 'chang gis don yod pa'i rgyal
K12D0686_H0689:252a-10: po'i snying po bzlas te lag pa zhags pa'i phyag
K12D0686_H0689:252a-11: rgyas nags khung du 'jug par bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:252a-12: zhugs pa tsam kho nas nags kyi gnas rnam par
K12D0686_H0689:252a-13: drug tu g-yo bar 'gyur zhing dbus kyi nags kyi
K12D0686_H0689:252a-14: mtha' na rin po che sna bdun gyi rdzing lha'i
K12D0686_H0689:252a-15: chab dvangs shing rnyog pa ma mchis pa /
K12D0686_H0689:252a-17: lha'i tsandan gyi dri dang ldan pa /
K12D0686_H0689:252a-22: bdud rtsi'i bcud can mchis te 'di ltar don yod
K12D0686_H0689:252a-23: pa'i rgyal po'i snying po yungs kar la lan nyi
K12D0686_H0689:252a-24: shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis nas rdzing gi dbus
K12D0686_H0689:252a-26: 'phangs pa tsam gyi mod la bud med rin po
K12D0686_H0689:252a-27: che'i gzugs 'dra ba'i lha'i bu mo'i lus phyed byung
K12D0686_H0689:252b-0: nas lha'i @252b me tog rnam pa sna tshogs kyis
K12D0686_H0689:252b-2: rin po che sna bdun gyi bum pa gang ba
K12D0686_H0689:252b-3: thogs to rig sngags 'chang la dbul zhing spyi bo
K12D0686_H0689:252b-4: smad de 'dzum pa dang bcas pas rig sngags 'chang
K12D0686_H0689:252b-5: la smras pa / rje btsun rig sngags 'chang /
K12D0686_H0689:252b-6: khyod ma bzhengs par gnas su zhugs shig /
K12D0686_H0689:252b-7: rig sngags 'chang gis grub pa'i tshig gsum brjod par bgyi ste; 'jig rten pha rol gyi don dang /
K12D0686_H0689:252b-9: 'jig rten pa'i dngos grub grub ste /
K12D0686_H0689:252b-12: mngag gzhug ma zhes gar bde bar brjod la de'i
K12D0686_H0689:252b-13: 'og tu rig sngags 'chang gis smra bar bgyi ste
K12D0686_H0689:252b-15: kho bo la 'jig rten pha rol gyi don byin cig ces 'jug par bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:252b-17: khyod rang gi gnas su snoms te zhugs shig ces smra bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:252b-18: de nas rig sngags 'chang gis lag pa zhags pa'i phyag rgyas 'jug par bgyi zhing /
K12D0686_H0689:252b-19: don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying po bzlas so //
K12D0686_H0689:252b-20: de nas gnas chen po mchog rin po che sna
K12D0686_H0689:252b-21: bdun gyi gzhal med khang lha'i dril bu g-yer ka'i
K12D0686_H0689:252b-23: gos dbyangs pa dar gyi chun 'phyang rab tu dpyangs
K12D0686_H0689:252b-24: par gda' ba nas bu mo de yang nor bu
K12D0686_H0689:252b-25: rin po che chen po thogs te /
K12D0686_H0689:253a-0: 'jig rten pha rol gyi don du rin po che chen po bzhes shig ces dbul bar @253a *//
K12D0686_H0689:253a-2: de nas rig sngags 'chang gis stan bshams pa'i steng
K12D0686_H0689:253a-3: du zhags pa legs par yongs su bskyil te stan
K12D0686_H0689:253a-4: du bting la nor bu rin po che chen po
K12D0686_H0689:253a-5: de zhags pa'i steng du bzhag cing me tog dang
K12D0686_H0689:253a-7: don yod rgyal po'i snying po bzla bar bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:253a-8: bzlas pa tsam gyi mod la zhags pa nor bu
K12D0686_H0689:253a-9: rin po che dang bcas te 'bar bar 'gyur ro
K12D0686_H0689:253a-10: // nor bu rin po che chen po de las kyang 'o ma'i chab 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:253a-11: rig sngags 'chang gis 'o ma'i chab de las blangs la skyor chu lan bdun du reg par bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:253a-12: 'o ma'i chab kyis reg pa tsam gyi mod la
K12D0686_H0689:253a-13: lus thams cad dri ma dang bral zhing yongs su
K12D0686_H0689:253a-15: don yod snang ba nor bu gzhal med khang gi
K12D0686_H0689:253a-16: dkyil 'khor gyi 'od zer gyi dra ba 'od zer
K12D0686_H0689:253a-17: zhes bgyi ba thob nas sa bcu la gnas te
K12D0686_H0689:253a-19: bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi lam thob par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:253a-20: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ting nge
K12D0686_H0689:253a-21: 'dzin sgyu ma lta bur rnam par 'phrul pa thob
K12D0686_H0689:253a-22: par 'gyur shing / shin tu yongs su dag pa'i
K12D0686_H0689:253a-23: bdag nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis don yod pa'i zhags
K12D0686_H0689:253a-24: pa'i cha lugs 'chang ba rig sngags 'chang gi mdun
K12D0686_H0689:253a-25: du mchis nas lag pa g-yas pa spyi bor bzhag
K12D0686_H0689:253b-0: ste nga'i rig @253b sngags 'chang gi bu thu bo
K12D0686_H0689:253b-1: khyod kyis grol ba chen po'i dkyil 'khor sangs rgyas
K12D0686_H0689:253b-2: kyi sku yongs su dag pa 'thob bo //
K12D0686_H0689:253b-4: phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mthong nas thams
K12D0686_H0689:253b-5: cad kyis legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byin par
K12D0686_H0689:253b-6: 'gyur te / sems dpa' chen po legs so legs //
K12D0686_H0689:253b-7: khyod ni byang chub lam du zhugs //
K12D0686_H0689:253b-8: khyod kyis sangs rgyas nyid 'thob ste //
K12D0686_H0689:253b-9: sgrol ba'i lam zhes bya ba bsgrubs //
K12D0686_H0689:253b-10: 'on te rig sngags 'chang nyid don du gnyer na /
K12D0686_H0689:253b-11: de'i tshe gser gyi me tog stsol bar 'gyur te /
K12D0686_H0689:253b-12: blangs la bu mo de nyid kyi spyi bor bzhag nas aom zhes bgyi bas mnan par bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:253b-13: aom zhes bgyi ba'i sgra brjod nas spyi bor bzhag
K12D0686_H0689:253b-14: pa tsam gyi mod la bu mo de'i mig mchog
K12D0686_H0689:253b-15: gnyis nas mchi ma 'dzag par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:253b-16: de nas rig sngags 'chang gis blangs te nye reg
K12D0686_H0689:253b-17: bgyis pa tsam gyi mod la rig sngags 'chang gi
K12D0686_H0689:253b-19: sgra cung zad 'khyil cing lag pa na 'khor lo'i
K12D0686_H0689:253b-20: zhags pa thogs te nam mkha' la mchi bar 'gyur
K12D0686_H0689:253b-21: ro // rig sngags 'chang bye ba 'bum phrag bco
K12D0686_H0689:253b-22: brgyad kyis yongs su bskor bar 'gyur ro; ;tshe lo
K12D0686_H0689:253b-23: drug khri nyis stong du 'gyur zhing skye ba bdun
K12D0686_H0689:253b-24: stong rjes su dran par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:253b-25: 'on te gsang sngags 'chang 'jig rten pa'i dngos grub kyi cho ga s'ong na /
K12D0686_H0689:254a-2: rig sngags 'chang gis bdag gi skra 'di sdoms shig
K12D0686_H0689:254a-3: ces de'i tshe bud med des skra'i ral pa bton
K12D0686_H0689:254a-4: nas rig sngags 'chang la 'bul pa na skra thams
K12D0686_H0689:254a-5: cad blangs te dum bu gsum du bkug nas srad
K12D0686_H0689:254a-6: bu la nyi shu rtsa gcig bkal te mgo la
K12D0686_H0689:254a-7: btags pas ni / ji ltar yid la bsam pa de bzhin du mig 'phrul ston par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:254a-8: 'bras bu dang me tog 'tshal ba thams cad ston par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:254a-9: bden pa ji ltar 'tshal ba bzhin ston par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:254a-11: mi gda' bar gyur nas gnod sbyin dang /
K12D0686_H0689:254a-17: mi ma yin pa rnams dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro; ;dpral ba la btags pas ni /
K12D0686_H0689:254a-18: lha dang klu thams cad dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:254a-19: dpung pa g-yas pa la btags pas ni /
K12D0686_H0689:254a-20: glang po che bcu'i stobs dang ldan par 'gyur te /
K12D0686_H0689:254a-23: gdug pa thams cad kyis mi tshugs pas stobs kyis 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:254a-24: dpung pa g-yon pa la btags pas ni /
K12D0686_H0689:254a-25: rigs bzhi'i 'jig rten dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:254a-26: lag pa g-yon pa la btags pas ni /
K12D0686_H0689:254b-0: gang la reg pa de dbang du 'gyur zhing @254b bdag gi nor du 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:254b-1: lag pa g-yas pa la btags pas ni /
K12D0686_H0689:254b-2: grong khyer gyi shar phyogs kyi sgo nas rgyal po'i sgo la thal mo lan gsum brdabs na /
K12D0686_H0689:254b-3: rgyal po'i btsun mo 'khor dang bcas pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:254b-10: bu mo dang bcas pa bdag nyid dam /
K12D0686_H0689:254b-11: nor dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:254b-12: tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gtogs pa bya dang /
K12D0686_H0689:254b-16: gzhan yang gdug pa dang bcas pa'i srog chags rnams dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:254b-17: bral g-yas pa la btags pas ni /
K12D0686_H0689:254b-23: bsti gnas gang du zhugs te zhugs pa tsam gyi mod la nor thams cad dang /
K12D0686_H0689:254b-25: lha thams cad rang gi gzugs su mngon nas mchis par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:254b-27: rkang pa g-yas pa la btags pas ni /
K12D0686_H0689:254b-28: rgya mtsho chen po'i pha mthar yang rgal bar 'gyur na /
K12D0686_H0689:254b-29: chu klung chen po'i chab kyis byin pa nub tsam du 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci 'tshal /
K12D0686_H0689:254b-30: byin pa g-yon pa la btags bas ni /
K12D0686_H0689:254b-31: nyi ma re re zhing dpag tshad brgyar phyin nas
K12D0686_H0689:254b-32: dub pa ma mchis par slar yang ldog par 'gyur
K12D0686_H0689:255a-0: ro // brla g-yon pa la btags nas dur khrod @255a *//
K12D0686_H0689:255a-2: dur khrod thams cad na gnas pa'i gcer bu pa

K12D0686_H0689:255a-4: // de nas rig sngags 'chang gnas de nyid na

K12D0686_H0689:255a-8: // 'jug par bgyi'o // gnas mchog de'i dbus na

K12D0686_H0689:255a-10: // 'jug par bgyi'o // / rdzing der gnyis ka khrus bgyi zhing chab kyis nye reg bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:255a-11: bkrus shing lag pa tsam kho nas 'khor lo rig sngags 'chang zhags pa dang /

K12D0686_H0689:255a-26: dngul yongs su grub par bgyid do //
K12D0686_H0689:255a-27: srong mo zhes bgyi bas ni /

K12D0686_H0689:255b-1: nyi ma re re zhing rgyan thams cad kyis klubs pa'i lha'i bu mo khrid de mchi bar 'gyur //
K12D0686_H0689:255b-2: lha'i gzhal med khang 'byor pa stobs par bgyid //
K12D0686_H0689:255b-4: gzhal med khang stob par bgyid do //
K12D0686_H0689:255b-5: mngag gzhug ma zhes bgyi bas ni /
K12D0686_H0689:255b-6: gang dang gang du mngags pa de dang der mchi bar 'gyur te /
K12D0686_H0689:255b-12: gzhan yang mngag gzhug pa'i sgrub pa rnam pa sna tshogs yid la bsam pa bzhin du bgyid do //
K12D0686_H0689:255b-14: de nas rig sngags 'chang thang la rgyu bar 'tshal na /
K12D0686_H0689:255b-15: gtsang ma khrus bgyis pas gos gtsang ma bgo bar bgyi /
K12D0686_H0689:255b-16: gnas dben pa gtsang ma'i sa phyogs su dkyil 'khor gru bzhir bgyis la dri sna tshogs kyis byug /
K12D0686_H0689:255b-17: ro sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i gtor ma bshams la
K12D0686_H0689:255b-18: aa ga ru'i bdug pa bsregs te nub gsum du
K12D0686_H0689:255b-19: mchis nas 'khor lo zhags pa'i lag pa'i phyag rgyas
K12D0686_H0689:255b-20: don yod rgyal po'i snying po'i bzlas brjod stong rtsa
K12D0686_H0689:255b-21: brgyad bgyis te lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang
K12D0686_H0689:255b-22: / dkyil 'khor gyi dbus nas du ba 'byung bar
K12D0686_H0689:255b-23: 'gyur; khro bo'i rgyal po lan bdun bzla bar bgyi'o
K12D0686_H0689:255b-24: / // de nas dkyil 'khor gyi dbus nas skyes pa nag po chen po'i tshul mi sdug pa /
K12D0686_H0689:256a-5: dpung pa mkhrang zhing brtan pa /
K12D0686_H0689:256a-6: gsus pa 'phyangs po mchod phyir thogs pa dang ldan pa /
K12D0686_H0689:256a-9: stag gi sham thabs bgos pa /
K12D0686_H0689:256a-11: dril bu thogs pa zhig lus phyed tsam byung nas phyogs bcur lta bar bgyid do //
K12D0686_H0689:256a-12: de nas rig sngags 'chang gis skrag par mi bgyi ste /
K12D0686_H0689:256a-13: brtan par bgyi la khro bo'i rgyal po bzlas nas
K12D0686_H0689:256a-14: 'khor lo'i zhags pa 'phangs te mgo bcad la khrag
K12D0686_H0689:256a-16: rig sngags 'chang gis khrag des lus thams cad byug par bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:256a-17: byugs pa tsam gyi mod la bdag nyid lus mi chod pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:256a-18: mi shigs pas rdo rjer byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:256a-19: mig gnyis phyung la rang gi mig phyis nas mig la bskus na /
K12D0686_H0689:256a-22: tshe bskal pa bcur 'gyur zhing thos pa bsags pa'i rgya mtshor 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:256a-23: bskal pa brgya stong gi skye ba'i skye ba dang /
K12D0686_H0689:256a-27: khrag gis snying gar thig le bgyis na mi gda' bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:256a-29: ral grir gyur nas dgra thams cad bklag par bgyid do //
K12D0686_H0689:256a-30: gal te thang la rgyu bar 'tshal na /
K12D0686_H0689:256b-0: de'i tshe @256b khro bo'i rgyal po lan brgya rtsa
K12D0686_H0689:256b-1: brgyad zhags pa dang 'khor lo la bzlas brjod bgyi'o
K12D0686_H0689:256b-2: // 'khor los zhags pa gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i tshul gyis thal mo sa la brdab par bgyi ste /
K12D0686_H0689:256b-3: lan gsum du thal mo brdabs pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:256b-4: de'i 'og tu thang gi sgo dbye bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:256b-5: ji ltar rang gi khyim bzhin du 'jug par 'gyur te /
K12D0686_H0689:256b-6: zhugs nas slar yang mchi zhing dgos pa gzhan thams cad bgyid pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:256b-7: thang thams cad la gnas pa thams cad dbang du gyur nas gnas par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:256b-8: 'on te nam mkha' la mchi 'tshal na /
K12D0686_H0689:256b-9: gyen du bltas nas don yod rgyal po'i snying po yungs mar la stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te /
K12D0686_H0689:256b-10: lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas nas bdag nyid la byugs
K12D0686_H0689:256b-11: te lag pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgyas nam mkha' la
K12D0686_H0689:256b-12: mchi bar 'gyur zhing nam mkha' go 'byed par 'gyur
K12D0686_H0689:256b-13: ro // lha'i gnas su mchi bar 'tshal na /
K12D0686_H0689:256b-14: lha'i khyim du mchis nas zhags pas lha'i mgul nas
K12D0686_H0689:256b-15: bcing bar bgyi zhing don yod rgyal po'i snying po
K12D0686_H0689:256b-16: lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas nas lha bcings pa gang
K12D0686_H0689:256b-17: lags pa de'i ming nas brjod na /
K12D0686_H0689:256b-18: lha de babs nas rig sngags 'chang gi mdun na mchis par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:256b-21: dbang phyug chen po rig sngags 'chang la rig sngags 'chang /
K12D0686_H0689:256b-22: ci zhig don du gnyer ba de snoms shig ces smra bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:256b-23: rig sngags 'chang gis lha'i gnas su 'gro'o //
K12D0686_H0689:257a-2: gal te gzhan bsam pa zhig mchis na /
K12D0686_H0689:257a-3: mchog thams cad stsol bar bgyid do //
K12D0686_H0689:257a-4: de nas lha'i gnas nas mchi ba na lha'i gnas
K12D0686_H0689:257a-5: lha'i rdzu 'phrul gyis lag pa na thogs te nam
K12D0686_H0689:257a-7: ji srid 'tshal bar lha'i gzhal med khang chen por longs spyod par 'gyur zhing /
K12D0686_H0689:257a-9: lha'i gnas nas slar yang 'bebs par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:257a-10: gzhan ji ltar rang gi blo gros dang /
K12D0686_H0689:257a-11: yid la bsam pa'i dgos pa thams cad bgyid par 'gyur zhing thams cad grub par 'gyur te /
K12D0686_H0689:257a-13: yid gnyis bskyed par mi bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:257a-14: 'khor lo'i zhags pa sgrub pa'i cho ga'o ////
K12D0686_H0689:257a-15: de nas rig sngags 'chang padma'i zhags pa sgrub par
K12D0686_H0689:257a-16: 'tshal pas rig sngags 'chang de gtsang ma legs par
K12D0686_H0689:257a-17: bkrus te gos gtsang ma bgo bar bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:257a-20: nub gcig mchis nas rig sngags 'chang gis zhags pa'i skud pa bsgrub par bgyi ste /
K12D0686_H0689:257a-21: ras kyi skud pa'am padma'i skud pa bee d'urya'i kha
K12D0686_H0689:257a-22: dog lta bur tshon gyis kha bsgyur bar bgyi zhing
K12D0686_H0689:257a-23: khru nyi shu rtsa gcig bkal te /
K12D0686_H0689:257a-24: de la yang padma bgyis te rin po che sna
K12D0686_H0689:257a-25: bdun gyi 'dab ma kha phye ba sor bzhi pa'i
K12D0686_H0689:257a-26: tshad kyis padma gser gyi 'dab ma dang /
K12D0686_H0689:257b-3: rin po che ka ti ka las bgyi zhing mu tig gis bskor ba bgyi ste /
K12D0686_H0689:257b-4: de nas zhags pa la gdags par bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:257b-5: zhags pa'i thor to gcig la ni /
K12D0686_H0689:257b-6: padma'i phyag rgya gdags par bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:257b-7: de nas legs par brgyan pa'i chos kyi stan bzang po bsham par bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:257b-8: ba'i lci bas dkyil 'khor bgyis la dkyil 'khor gyi
K12D0686_H0689:257b-9: steng du dri'i padma bsam par bgyi zhing dkyil 'khor
K12D0686_H0689:257b-10: gyi steng du chos kyi gdan bshams la bum pa
K12D0686_H0689:257b-12: me tog gi sil ma bkram zhing aa ga ru dang /
K12D0686_H0689:257b-14: du ru ka'i bdug pa dbul bar bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:257b-15: mchod yon dang zhabs bsil gyi snod kyang gzhag par bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:257b-16: padma'i zhags pa de yang chos kyi stan gyi steng du gzhag par bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:257b-17: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du
K12D0686_H0689:257b-18: rig sngags 'chang gis skyil mo krung bcas nas don
K12D0686_H0689:257b-19: yod zhags pa'i snying po lan khri bzlas te bzlas
K12D0686_H0689:257b-20: pa'i yungs kar re re nas de'i steng du gtor
K12D0686_H0689:257b-21: bar bgyi'o // lan khri rdzogs nas de nas tshes
K12D0686_H0689:257b-22: bco lnga'i zla ba nya'i nub mo mchis nas 'phags
K12D0686_H0689:257b-23: pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod par bgyi'o
K12D0686_H0689:257b-24: bar bgyi'o // // zhags pa de la yang mchod par bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:257b-25: don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya bcings nas don
K12D0686_H0689:257b-26: yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying po lan brgya rtsa brgyad
K12D0686_H0689:258a-0: bzla'o // de nas khro bo'i rgyal po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas @258a *//
K12D0686_H0689:258a-1: te nyin mtshan dus gsum du bzlas brjod dang /
K12D0686_H0689:258a-3: de nas padma'i zhags pa 'bar zhing kha dog sna tshogs kyi 'od zer 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:258a-4: legs so legs so zhes bgyi ba'i tshig 'byin par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:258a-5: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi lus la
K12D0686_H0689:258a-6: kha dog sna tshogs kyi 'od zer 'byung bar 'gyur
K12D0686_H0689:258a-7: ro // de nas rig sngags 'chang phyag rgya'i skyil
K12D0686_H0689:258a-8: mo krung gis mchis nas mig mi 'dzum zhing bzhin
K12D0686_H0689:258a-9: 'dzum pas snying rje chen po yid la bsgom par
K12D0686_H0689:258a-10: ro // bgyi'o // 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
K12D0686_H0689:258a-11: phyug gi gdong du bltas te don yod pa'i zhags
K12D0686_H0689:258a-12: pa'i snying po lan sum stong bzla bar bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:258a-13: de'i 'og tu 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
K12D0686_H0689:258a-14: bdag nyid kyi lha'i rang bzhin mdun du mchis nas
K12D0686_H0689:258a-15: lag pa g-yas pa brkyang ste rig sngags 'chang gi
K12D0686_H0689:258a-16: spyi bor bzhag nas legs so zhes bgyi ba stsol
K12D0686_H0689:258a-17: bar 'gyur zhing / 'di skad ces kyang dbugs 'byin par bgyid do //
K12D0686_H0689:258a-19: nga'i bu snying las skyes pa'i thu bo bzlas brjod kyi cho ga chen po dang /
K12D0686_H0689:258a-20: mchod pa'i cho ga chen po 'dis nga la mchod pa'i mchog byas pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:258a-23: khyod kyis don yod rgyal po'i snying po grub cing /
K12D0686_H0689:258a-24: khyod kyis padma'i zhags pa chen po grub kyi /
K12D0686_H0689:258b-0: ji @258b ltar yid la bsam [?] pa bzhin du mchog khyer cig /
K12D0686_H0689:258b-1: khyod yid kyi brnag pa thams cad ni /
K12D0686_H0689:258b-3: khyod 'khor ba'i 'jigs pa rgyu ba las ni /
K12D0686_H0689:258b-8: 'chi ba'i mya ngan mi bzad pa'i 'jigs pa las thar na /
K12D0686_H0689:258b-9: khyod dmyal ba chen po mi bzad pa bcu drug las ni /
K12D0686_H0689:258b-11: 'jigs pa chen po mi bzad pa'i sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba brgyad las ni /
K12D0686_H0689:258b-13: 'di nas phyi ma'i skye ba'i mngal du gnas nas sdug bsngal mi bzad pa las shi 'phos te /
K12D0686_H0689:258b-15: khyod byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar
K12D0686_H0689:258b-16: du 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du padma
K12D0686_H0689:258b-17: las brdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:258b-18: khyod kyis gangg'a'i klung 'bum phrag stong brgyad cu rtsa
K12D0686_H0689:258b-19: bzhi'i snyed kyi bye ma dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin
K12D0686_H0689:258b-20: gshegs pa rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba cher bskyed
K12D0686_H0689:258b-21: pa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs chen po dang ni /
K12D0686_H0689:258b-24: khyod kyis lhag par bya ba mang po ni /
K12D0686_H0689:258b-25: byas; khyod rig sngags 'chang chen por ni /
K12D0686_H0689:258b-27: dmyal ba dang sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pa mi bzad pa thams cad las ni /
K12D0686_H0689:258b-29: ji ltar yid la bsam pa bzhin mchog khyer cig /
K12D0686_H0689:258b-30: de nas rig sngags 'chang gis ji ltar yid la
K12D0686_H0689:258b-31: bsam pa bzhin de'i tshe mchog thob par 'gyur ro
K12D0686_H0689:259a-0: // de nas rig sngags 'chang gis padma'i zhags pa de blangs te gnas @259a *//
K12D0686_H0689:259a-1: gtsang mar gus pas mchod pa rgya cher bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:259a-2: nam dgos pa de'i zhags pa blang par bgyid de /
K12D0686_H0689:259a-3: las thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:259a-5: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi lag pa
K12D0686_H0689:259a-6: g-yon par bzhag la lag pa g-yas pas zhags pa
K12D0686_H0689:259a-7: bzung ste don yod rgyal po'i snying po lan brgya
K12D0686_H0689:259a-8: rtsa brgyad bzlas nas sems can nam lha gang gi
K12D0686_H0689:259a-9: ming nas brjod de bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad tshang
K12D0686_H0689:259a-10: ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' mdun du mchis
K12D0686_H0689:259a-11: nas 'dod pa'i mchog thams cad stsol par 'gyur ro;
K12D0686_H0689:259a-12: ;de nas rig sngags 'chang byang chub tu lung bstan
K12D0686_H0689:259a-13: pa don du gnyer bar 'tshal na /
K12D0686_H0689:259a-14: rig sngags 'chang gtsang mas legs par khrus bgyis te
K12D0686_H0689:259a-15: gos gtsang ma bgos pas nyin zhag gcig mchis par
K12D0686_H0689:259a-16: gyur pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa
K12D0686_H0689:259a-17: la mchod pa rgya chen po bgyis nas padma'i zhags
K12D0686_H0689:259a-18: pa de yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag
K12D0686_H0689:259a-20: zhags pa'i thor to ya gcig gis ni /
K12D0686_H0689:259a-21: rang gi mgul du btags la /
K12D0686_H0689:259a-22: don yod rgyal po'i snying po lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang bar bzlas brjod bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:259a-23: stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang /
K12D0686_H0689:259a-24: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku gser gyi mdog can
K12D0686_H0689:259a-25: rig sngags 'chang gi mdun du bzhugs nas rig sngags
K12D0686_H0689:259b-0: 'chang gi spyi bor @259b phyag bzhag ste dbugs 'byin
K12D0686_H0689:259b-1: par mdzad / lung ston par mdzad /
K12D0686_H0689:259b-2: yid kyi brnag pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par mdzad par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:259b-4: sdig pa che rabs stong du bsags pa thams cad gtugs par 'gyur /
K12D0686_H0689:259b-5: lhag ma ma lus par gtugs par gyur nas lus yongs su dag par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:259b-6: dri ma dang bral zhing phrag dog dang /
K12D0686_H0689:259b-8: de nas ma 'ongs pa'i skye ba'i mngal du gnas
K12D0686_H0689:259b-9: nas lha dang mi'i dpal nyams su myong bar bgyis
K12D0686_H0689:259b-10: nas sems can thams cad kyi bla ma gcig pur
K12D0686_H0689:259b-12: bla ma'i gnas su yang 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:259b-13: nad rnams dang bral bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:259b-14: skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:259b-15: 'gum pa'i dus su phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dgongs par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:259b-17: legs pa'i lam ston par mdzad par yang 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:259b-18: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mdun na mchis
K12D0686_H0689:259b-19: nas dbugs 'byin par bgyid cing lag pa g-yas pa
K12D0686_H0689:259b-21: de bde bas shin tu dran pa nye bar bzhag nas lus 'dor bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:259b-22: bor ba tsam gyi mod la skal pa mnyam pa
K12D0686_H0689:259b-23: bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skye
K12D0686_H0689:259b-24: bar 'gyur te / rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
K12D0686_H0689:260a-0: mtshan dang dpe byad kyis spras @260a *//
K12D0686_H0689:260a-1: pa'i lus padma las brdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:260a-3: bskal pa brgya stong gi skye ba'i tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:260a-4: don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po rnam par grol
K12D0686_H0689:260a-5: ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya rim par phye ba'i
K12D0686_H0689:260a-6: cho ga zhib mo 'di mtha' dag rdzogs par g-yar
K12D0686_H0689:260a-7: ton du bgyis nas sa bcu la gnas shing phyin
K12D0686_H0689:260a-8: ci log tu ma gyur pas phyir mi ldog par

K12D0686_H0689:265b-0: khyod shi 'phos nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du @265b song zhig /

K12D0686_H0689:265b-2: ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la 'os pa'i lha rdzas kyis mchod par 'tshal lam /
K12D0686_H0689:265b-3: de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i sprin gyis mchod par 'tshal lam /
K12D0686_H0689:265b-16: gos kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod par bgyi bar 'tshal na /
K12D0686_H0689:265b-17: rig sngags 'chang des spyi bo'i gtsug tu dri'i dkyil 'khor bgyis la me tog dang /
K12D0686_H0689:265b-18: bdug pa yang dbul bar bya /
K12D0686_H0689:265b-19: yid bzhin gyi nor bu chen po don yod zhags pa'i mchog 'di lag pa g-yon pas mnan la /
K12D0686_H0689:265b-20: lag pa g-yas pas don yod yid bzhin nor bu'i
K12D0686_H0689:265b-21: mchog bzung nas pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa
K12D0686_H0689:265b-22: la btsugs te 'di lta bu'i yid la bgyid pa
K12D0686_H0689:265b-23: chen po 'di lta bu'i bsam pa yid la bgyid
K12D0686_H0689:265b-24: pa de lta bu yang bsam nas don yod rgyal
K12D0686_H0689:265b-25: po'i snying po lan bdun bzlas te phyag bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:265b-26: yid bzhin gyi nor bu chen po rgya chen don
K12D0686_H0689:265b-27: yod pa 'di bzlas nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
K12D0686_H0689:265b-28: dbang phyug gi snying po 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad
K12D0686_H0689:265b-29: bzlas brjod bgyi'o // byams pa chen po dang /
K12D0686_H0689:266a-0: snying rje chen pos yongs su gdungs pa'i snying gis sems can thams cad la mchog tu @266a *//
K12D0686_H0689:266a-1: brtse bar bgyis nas gsang sngags bzlas brjod bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:266a-2: 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po /
K12D0686_H0689:266a-4: dus gsum du gshegs shing bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang /
K12D0686_H0689:266a-5: byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12D0686_H0689:266a-7: 'phags pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun 'das pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:266a-9: da ltar byung ba thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12D0686_H0689:266a-10: yang dag par song ba dang /
K12D0686_H0689:266a-11: yang dag par zhugs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12D0686_H0689:266a-12: blo gros chen po sh'a radva ti'i bu la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12D0686_H0689:266a-13: gnas kyi mchog dga' ldan na 'phags pa byams pa
K12D0686_H0689:266a-14: la sogs pa tshogs dang bcas pa'i mchog la phyag
K12D0686_H0689:266a-15: 'tshal lo // bde ba can gyi dkyil 'khor na
K12D0686_H0689:266a-16: bzhugs pa de bzhin gshegs pa 'phags pa 'od dpag
K12D0686_H0689:266a-18: dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12D0686_H0689:266a-19: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje
K12D0686_H0689:266a-20: chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
K12D0686_H0689:266a-21: dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo; ;tshangs pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:266a-24: dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa'i lha'i bu gzugs
K12D0686_H0689:266a-25: sna tshogs mnga' ba spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshal
K12D0686_H0689:266b-1: aom ma h'a padma tsandra ma ni ma ni//
K12D0686_H0689:266b-2: aa mo gha ma ni su ma ni/
K12D0686_H0689:266b-4: sarba ta th'a ga ta aa lam k'a ra /
K12D0686_H0689:266b-5: ma h'a aa mo gha ma ni /
K12D0686_H0689:266b-6: tsa ra tsa ra sanytsa ra /
K12D0686_H0689:266b-7: ni sha tsa tsa ra shva ra ma h'a /
K12D0686_H0689:266b-8: padma bhu dza ba ra da /
K12D0686_H0689:266b-9: ma h'a k'a ru ni ka ma h'a bi shva r'u pa dha ra /
K12D0686_H0689:266b-10: phra ba ra ma h'a bo dhi satva padma dha ra padma sa na padma ku ta /
K12D0686_H0689:266b-13: padma aa lam kri ta ta nu /
K12D0686_H0689:266b-14: sa ha sra bhu dza sa ha sra ne tre n'a n'ad bhu ta /
K12D0686_H0689:266b-16: mu dra bi bhu shi t'a sa ha sra bhu dza /
K12D0686_H0689:266b-18: sha ta sa ha sra rashmi pra ti mandi ta sh'a r'a ri /
K12D0686_H0689:266b-21: a'a bha ra na dha ra /
K12D0686_H0689:266b-25: aindra n'i la padma r'a ga bhu shi t'a sh'a r'i ra /
K12D0686_H0689:266b-29: ma h'a bo dhi satva ba ra da pra hma /
K12D0686_H0689:266b-30: bishtu ma he shva ra r'u pa dha ra /
K12D0686_H0689:266b-32: lo ke shva ra; ya mante shva ra /
K12D0686_H0689:266b-37: se n'a pa ti bo sh'a dha ra /
K12D0686_H0689:266b-41: ma h'a bhu ta ba sh'a dha ra /
K12D0686_H0689:266b-42: sarba ta th'a ga t'a bhi she kta sa ma ya ma nu sma ra bha ga wan /
K12D0686_H0689:266b-43: p'u ra ya ma a'a t'a sh'anta ta ra ya p'u ra sh'a ya ya satva na /
K12D0686_H0689:266b-46: m'a ra ya tri dva sha m'a lam/
K12D0686_H0689:266b-47: sa ra sa ra p'a pam/
K12D0686_H0689:266b-51: ma h'a tsi nat'a ma ni /
K12D0686_H0689:266b-52: aa mo gha p'a sha dha ra /
K12D0686_H0689:266b-53: s'a dha ya s'a dha ya /
K12D0686_H0689:266b-55: ma ma tri bhu ba ni de by'a pra yatstsha /
K12D0686_H0689:266b-56: ma h'a k'a ru ni ka /
K12D0686_H0689:266b-58: bo dha ya bo dha ya /
K12D0686_H0689:267a-1: bo dha ya sam bo dha ya /
K12D0686_H0689:267a-2: ma h'a pa shu pa ti p'a sha dha ra /
K12D0686_H0689:267a-3: aa na nta bi kurb'a na /
K12D0686_H0689:267a-7: ga ga ne bi pu la bi m'a na /
K12D0686_H0689:267a-9: na mo stu te bi bu la pu n+ya /
K12D0686_H0689:267a-11: ma h'a aa mo gha siddhi h'um h'um/
K12D0686_H0689:267a-12: aa bhi shi nytsa tu m'am/
K12D0686_H0689:267a-13: pi pu la k'i rti ka re sv'ah'a /
K12D0686_H0689:267a-16: aa mo gha bi pu le sv'ah'a /
K12D0686_H0689:267a-17: ma h'a tsinta ma ni siddhe sv'ah'a /
K12D0686_H0689:267a-18: ma h'a tsint'a ma ni siddhe ba ra de sv'ah'a /
K12D0686_H0689:267a-19: sarba siddhe ba ra de sv'ah'a /
K12D0686_H0689:267a-20: aom bi pu le shva ra /
K12D0686_H0689:267a-23: ma h'a aa mo gha siddhe h'um phat sv'ah'a /
K12D0686_H0689:267a-24: don yod nor bu'i zhags pa chen po 'di lan
K12D0686_H0689:267a-25: brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas ma thag tu rig sngags 'chang
K12D0686_H0689:267a-26: gi lus thams cad 'bar bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:267a-27: don yod pa'i zhags pa lag pas mnan na /
K12D0686_H0689:267a-28: nam mkha'i ngos la rdzu 'phrul gyis mchi bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:267a-29: sgyu ma lta bu'i ting 'dzin dang 'dra ba'i rdzu
K12D0686_H0689:267a-30: 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul chen po ston par 'gyur ro
K12D0686_H0689:267a-31: // 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:267a-32: de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyang tshogs dang bcas /
K12D0686_H0689:267a-34: byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i dkyil 'khor dang /
K12D0686_H0689:267a-35: gzhal med khang mchog dang bcas pa rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:267a-36: bde ba can gyi gnas mtha' dag tu mchod pa'i
K12D0686_H0689:267b-0: char gyi sprin @267b chen po 'byung bar 'gyur zhing
K12D0686_H0689:267b-1: / de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med kyi mthus mchod pa'i sprin chen por gnas par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:267b-2: bde ba can na gnas pa de dag thams cad
K12D0686_H0689:267b-3: de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med des rig sngags
K12D0686_H0689:267b-4: 'chang la legs so zhes bgyi ba stsol bar 'gyur
K12D0686_H0689:267b-5: ro // rig sngags 'chang des kyang sgra de dag
K12D0686_H0689:267b-6: thams cad thos par 'gyur zhing mchod pa'i char chen
K12D0686_H0689:267b-8: gal te rig sngags 'chang nam mkha' las chu 'bebs par 'tshal na /
K12D0686_H0689:267b-9: de'i tshe bsam pa tsam gyis 'bebs par 'gyur ro; ;'on te mi 'tshal na /
K12D0686_H0689:267b-10: nam mkha' de nyid na nam mkha' la grub pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:267b-11: rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi mchog don rgya chen
K12D0686_H0689:267b-12: grub pa yid bzhin nor bu lag pa zhes bya
K12D0686_H0689:267b-14: dpag tu ma mchis pa'i 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rig sngags 'chang gis yongs su bskor bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:267b-15: tshe pa skal pa chen po brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa gnyis su 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:267b-18: 'jig rten dbang phyug dang 'dra bar mchod pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:267b-19: gus pa cher bgyid par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:267b-20: 'jig rten thams cad kyi gtso bo gcig pur 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:267b-21: lha rnams kyang babs nas rig sngags 'chang de la
K12D0686_H0689:267b-22: mchod pa'i mchog rgya chen po dag bgyid par 'gyur
K12D0686_H0689:268a-1: can thams cad la bu gcig pa bzhin du mngon par dga' bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:268a-3: lha thams cad kyis kyang kun tu srung zhing phyag bgyi ba'i 'os su 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:268a-4: thos pa bsags pa'i rgya mtsho chen por 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:268a-5: gal te rig sngags 'chang phyogs bcu dus gsum thams
K12D0686_H0689:268a-6: cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa'i
K12D0686_H0689:268a-7: tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba dang bcas pa /
K12D0686_H0689:268a-9: 'phags pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun thams cad dang /
K12D0686_H0689:268a-17: lto 'phye chen po sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la
K12D0686_H0689:268a-18: mngon par dad pa dang bcas pa la mchod pa
K12D0686_H0689:268a-20: phyogs bcu dus gsum du gtogs pa thams cad kyi
K12D0686_H0689:268a-21: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bsod nams kyi phung
K12D0686_H0689:268a-22: po chen po yongs su rdzogs par 'tshal ba'am /
K12D0686_H0689:268a-23: dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po bskyed par 'tshal ba'am /
K12D0686_H0689:268a-24: lha'i zas kyi mchog ro bro ba'i mchog dang ldan pa'i bza' ba dang /
K12D0686_H0689:268a-25: lha'i bcud kyis len gyi mchog gis de bzhin gshegs pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:268b-0: 'phags pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun thams @268b cad la bstabs par 'tshal ba'am /
K12D0686_H0689:268b-3: nyin re zhing mchod pa'i sprin bgyid par 'tshal na /
K12D0686_H0689:268b-4: rig sngags 'chang des legs par bkrus te gtsang mas
K12D0686_H0689:268b-5: gos gtsang ma bgos nas ci 'byor bas dkyil 'khor
K12D0686_H0689:268b-7: bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du me tog dang /
K12D0686_H0689:268b-8: bdug pa yang dbul bar bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:268b-9: pus mo btsugs te thal mo sbyar nas zhags pa
K12D0686_H0689:268b-10: bzung ste de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yid la
K12D0686_H0689:268b-11: bgyi'o // yid bzhin nor bu chen po rgya chen don yod 'di yang mchod par bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:268b-12: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gyi snying po lan bdun bzla bar bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:268b-13: yid la bgyid pa yangs pa rgya chen po mchod pa'i sprin chen po dang /
K12D0686_H0689:268b-32: rin po che'i ljon shing dang /
K12D0686_H0689:268b-34: me tog gi ljon shing dang /
K12D0686_H0689:268b-36: dpag bsam gyi ljon shing yid la bgyi ste /
K12D0686_H0689:269a-1: bzlas nas ji ltar yid la bsam zhing don du gnyer ba bzhin phyogs bcur 'phangs na /
K12D0686_H0689:269a-2: de'i tshe phyogs bcu dus gsum du gshegs pa dkyil
K12D0686_H0689:269a-3: 'khor mtha' dag tu gtogs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor
K12D0686_H0689:269a-4: du mkho ba'i yo byad thams cad ma tshang ba
K12D0686_H0689:269a-5: ma mchis par ci bsam pa de bzhin gshegs pa
K12D0686_H0689:269a-6: thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi spyan sngar
K12D0686_H0689:269a-7: mchod pa'i char gyi sprin chen po 'byung bar 'gyur
K12D0686_H0689:269a-8: ro // de bzhin du mkho ba'i yo byad thams
K12D0686_H0689:269a-9: cad kyi mchod pa chen po ma tshang ba ma
K12D0686_H0689:269a-11: de bzhin du mthu chen po'i nor bu rgya chen
K12D0686_H0689:269a-12: don yod la mchod pa'i gzungs bzlas shing 'phags pa
K12D0686_H0689:269a-13: spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po'i gzungs 'di
K12D0686_H0689:269a-14: yang nyin gcig bzhin du thun gsum du lan gsum
K12D0686_H0689:269a-16: des na rig sngags 'chang gis dus gsum du gshegs
K12D0686_H0689:269a-17: pa 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa de dag
K12D0686_H0689:269a-21: bsod nams kyi phung po'i tshogs chen po dang /
K12D0686_H0689:269a-22: dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po bskyed par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:269a-23: dus gsum du gtogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor
K12D0686_H0689:269a-24: gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa de dag thams cad
K12D0686_H0689:269b-0: kyi rig @269b sngags 'chang la dran pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:269b-4: gzi brjid stsol bar mdzad do //
K12D0686_H0689:269b-5: nyin gcig bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:269b-6: rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis dgongs par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:269b-7: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rtag tu rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:269b-8: rtag tu mchog sbyin pa mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:269b-9: mthong ba'i chos la 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal 'jigs pa 'jigs su rung ba dang /
K12D0686_H0689:269b-11: sdang ba rnams rnam par zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:269b-12: nad kyis kyang gnod par mi 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:269b-20: lus la ser ba 'bab par mi 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:269b-22: pha rol gyi dpung gi 'jigs pas ma lags /
K12D0686_H0689:269b-23: pha rol gyi sde'i 'jigs pas ma lags /
K12D0686_H0689:269b-24: phas kyi rgol ba dang mi mdza' ba'i 'jigs pas ma lags /
K12D0686_H0689:270a-0: sbyor ba mo'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur @270a *//
K12D0686_H0689:270a-1: ro; ;dpag tshad gcig gi nang tshun chad gzung bar
K12D0686_H0689:270a-2: mi nus shing rgyang ring por 'bros par 'gyur te
K12D0686_H0689:270a-3: / de la bgegs bgyid par mi 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:270a-4: gang dag mnar med par gnas par 'gyur ba'i sems can nam /
K12D0686_H0689:270a-5: mtshams med pa lnga bgyid pa'am /
K12D0686_H0689:270a-8: bskal pa bye bar bsags pa'i las kyi sgrib pas
K12D0686_H0689:270a-9: lus yongs su dkris pa gang lags pa de yang
K12D0686_H0689:270a-10: mthong ba'i chos la thams cad lhag ma ma lus
K12D0686_H0689:270a-11: par yongs su gdugs par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:270a-13: gal te tshig gzhan mi smra bar lan stong rtsa
K12D0686_H0689:270a-14: brgyad bzlas brjod bgyid cing smyung ba lan gcig bgyis
K12D0686_H0689:270a-16: de bskal pa bye ba brgya stong du 'khor bar skye ba las phyir ldog par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:270a-17: gzungs kyi bzlas brjod kyis las kyi sgrib pa snga ma rnams kyang 'byang bar 'gyur zhing /
K12D0686_H0689:270a-18: bskal pa stong du bsags pa'i sdig pa rnams nyams par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:270a-19: 'khor ba'i nyes pas phyir yang gos par mi 'gyur te /
K12D0686_H0689:270a-20: sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad kyis padma bzhin du gos par mi 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:270a-21: mthong ba'i chos la sa lnga pa thob par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:270a-23: cho ga'i bzlas brjod la nges par gnas na /
K12D0686_H0689:270b-0: phyir mi @270b ldog pa'i gnas 'thob par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:270b-1: dran pa tsam gyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:270b-2: pha rol tu phyin pa bcu'i rjes su mchi bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:270b-3: nyin gcig bzhin du lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis na /
K12D0686_H0689:270b-4: mthong ba'i chos la kun tu bzang po nyid 'thob par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:270b-8: phyag rgya thams cad kyi rjes su zhugs pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:270b-9: dam tshig thams cad la zhugs par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:270b-10: yang dag par bskyed pa thams cad kyi rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:270b-11: rig sngags 'chang mthong ba tsam gyis mnar med par
K12D0686_H0689:270b-12: gnas pa rnams kyi sdig pa rnam par 'jig par
K12D0686_H0689:270b-13: 'gyur ro // chung ngu na rig sngags 'chang dur khrod du zhugs nas gum pa'i rus pa'am /
K12D0686_H0689:270b-16: chung ngu na gum pa'i gos bor ba'am /
K12D0686_H0689:270b-17: rtsig pa'i ri mo la rig sngags 'chang de'i grib mas phog par gyur na /
K12D0686_H0689:270b-18: sems can gang gang gang gis dmyal bar gzhol bar
K12D0686_H0689:270b-19: gyur pa de dang de nas mod la thar nas
K12D0686_H0689:270b-20: 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar
K12D0686_H0689:270b-21: 'gyur te / de la yid gnyis sam som nyi bskyed par mi bgyi na /
K12D0686_H0689:270b-22: gang dag ches mang du lhag par bgyid par 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci 'tshal /
K12D0686_H0689:271a-2: dge bsnyen ma dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba 'ga' zhig gzungs 'di 'chad bar bgyid /
K12D0686_H0689:271a-11: de nges par bla na med pa yang dag par
K12D0686_H0689:271a-12: rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur
K12D0686_H0689:271a-13: ro // mthong ba'i chos la yon tan chen po brgya stong mang po 'thob par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:271a-15: mthong ba'i chos la dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs thams cad dang /

K12D0686_H0689:278b-7: 'brus yongs su skyong bar bgyid do //

K12D0686_H0689:278b-13: dgos pa thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro //

K12D0686_H0689:281a-28: khung brkos de la padma'i tshul //
K12D0686_H0689:281a-29: padma rtag tu bri bar bgyi //
K12D0686_H0689:281a-30: cho ga ji bzhin khung nang gi /
K12D0686_H0689:281a-31: padma la ni ge sar bgyi //
K12D0686_H0689:281b-0: gru bzhi 'am ni zlum po @281b ste; ;de lta bur ni brko bar bgyi //
K12D0686_H0689:281b-1: legs par byugs shing shin tu nag /
K12D0686_H0689:281b-2: shin tu sbas shing tshad la dbab //
K12D0686_H0689:281b-3: tshes grangs rgyu skar nyid dag dang //
K12D0686_H0689:281b-4: shin tu bkra shis dag la bgyi //
K12D0686_H0689:281b-5: bkra shis phyag rgya chen po ste //
K12D0686_H0689:281b-6: bzang pos gtor ma'i las bgyi 'o //
K12D0686_H0689:281b-7: gdug pa me tog la sogs pa //
K12D0686_H0689:281b-8: bzang po dag ni 'khor bar dgod //
K12D0686_H0689:281b-9: thog mar me lha bkug nas ni //
K12D0686_H0689:281b-10: de nas sbyin sreg las rnams bgyi //
K12D0686_H0689:281b-11: rig sngags 'chang ba gtsang gyur pa //
K12D0686_H0689:281b-12: legs bkrus gtsang ma'i gos bgos nas //
K12D0686_H0689:281b-13: gsang sngags bzlas pa'i cho ga bgyi //
K12D0686_H0689:281b-14: de la mtshams kyang bcing bar bgyi //
K12D0686_H0689:281b-15: bdag srung gtsug tor bcing ba dang //
K12D0686_H0689:281b-16: gzhan srung dkyil 'khor bcing ba dang //
K12D0686_H0689:281b-17: de bzhin grogs bgyid srung ba dang /
K12D0686_H0689:281b-18: rgyun du aa ka'i shing sbyar te //
K12D0686_H0689:281b-19: dri yi shing rnams nyid dag dang //
K12D0686_H0689:281b-20: mar dang yungs kar 'bras yos dag /
K12D0686_H0689:281b-21: nyi shu gcig dbul me ston bgyi //
K12D0686_H0689:281b-22: de nas me yi lha dgug go /
K12D0686_H0689:281b-23: aom na mo aagni dzv'a la /
K12D0686_H0689:281b-25: dzyod snra pra bha manda la /
K12D0686_H0689:281b-26: sarbba bde a'a hu ti rakti ni rata tushna dzv'a la /
K12D0686_H0689:281b-28: aa tsi sh'a mu kha trishna /
K12D0686_H0689:281b-29: ra shmid pa aagni shtsa bi tu tashttsa h'u ta sha na mu khan te /
K12D0686_H0689:281b-31: sarbba yaksha ma h'a birya ma h'a dza ya /
K12D0686_H0689:281b-34: sarbba da ha na pra pu la a'a ka sha
K12D0686_H0689:281b-35: sa mu gad ka shtsa aa pa pra sad k'a
K12D0686_H0689:281b-36: shan / manda la p'u dzi to /
K12D0686_H0689:281b-37: ma ni ta sarbba tra di pa bya r'u pa
K12D0686_H0689:281b-38: bi sh'a ra da a'a b'a h'a na sarbba ta
K12D0686_H0689:281b-39: tra g'a na / de ba hu ta /
K12D0686_H0689:282a-1: hu tra shanta ma si bi dha ma kan /
K12D0686_H0689:282a-3: mukta ra shmi ma pri yam ku gandha pha l'a ha ra /
K12D0686_H0689:282a-6: s'ukshma su t'i kshna shtsa mri ti sa na dzi bi na /
K12D0686_H0689:282a-7: pri yo ba shma pushpa bhasma pa stra tsa bha smra ba stra ni /
K12D0686_H0689:282a-9: bhasma sanytsa dha ni tyandhu ma m'a ku la /
K12D0686_H0689:282a-11: ba ka siddha ra sa dha ra sa gr'a tsa ra sarba tra pra dha ba ri sh'a /
K12D0686_H0689:282a-12: sarba tri ni ra ma ri sha no //
K12D0686_H0689:282a-13: ni tya sprishta dhashta na mun tsa si /
K12D0686_H0689:282a-14: dv'a trid sha bha ban de pa aagni mu kha de b'a ta /
K12D0686_H0689:282a-15: ae ru tsi ru dz'a ba la ba da ka ma h'a na ta /
K12D0686_H0689:282a-19: aa y'antu s'a dha shi ghram ka ra ma s'a dha ya tad tva ta /
K12D0686_H0689:282a-22: hu ru hu ru h'um phat sv'h'a /
K12D0686_H0689:282a-23: gsang sngags 'dis ni lan bdun du //
K12D0686_H0689:282a-24: bzlas nas me ni dgug par bgyi //
K12D0686_H0689:282a-25: gu gul yungs kar mar sbyar la; ;spar bdun spar bas me la dbul //
K12D0686_H0689:282a-26: mchod yon snod rnams dbul pa yang //
K12D0686_H0689:282a-27: de bzhin sbar ba'i sbar bas so //
K12D0686_H0689:282a-28: dri rnams dang ni byug pa dang //
K12D0686_H0689:282a-29: bdug pa rgya chen dbul bar bgyi //
K12D0686_H0689:282a-30: de bzhin 'bras bu sbar bar dbul //
K12D0686_H0689:282a-31: de nas chab kyis gsang ba bgyi //
K12D0686_H0689:282a-32: ji ltar lha rnams rim bzhin du //
K12D0686_H0689:282a-33: nye reg dag kyang dbul bar bgyi //
K12D0686_H0689:282a-34: de nas rig sngags 'chang gis su //
K12D0686_H0689:282a-35: sbyin sreg las ni yang dag brtsam //
K12D0686_H0689:282a-36: dri zhim shin tu dag pa dang //
K12D0686_H0689:282a-37: blag sha au dum ba ra dang //
K12D0686_H0689:282a-38: sna ma'i me tog tsam pa dang //
K12D0686_H0689:282a-39: kar ni ka ra nyid dag dang /
K12D0686_H0689:282b-1: de bzhin dri bda'i tsandan dang //
K12D0686_H0689:282b-2: byang chub ljon shing shing dag dang //
K12D0686_H0689:282b-3: de bzhin gzhan yang dri bda'i shing //
K12D0686_H0689:282b-5: sha mi shi ba'i las lagss pas //
K12D0686_H0689:282b-6: mchod yon de bzhin rtsa dag ste //
K12D0686_H0689:282b-7: de dag gis ni me spar nas //
K12D0686_H0689:282b-8: sbyin sreg gi ni las bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:282b-10: aa ga ru dang du ru ska //
K12D0686_H0689:282b-11: kun tu ru la sogs pa dang //
K12D0686_H0689:282b-12: du ru skar bcas spri ka dang //
K12D0686_H0689:282b-13: spang spos pri yang ku blangs te //
K12D0686_H0689:282b-14: de dag lhan cig sbyar bsres shing //
K12D0686_H0689:282b-15: mar ram mar gsar lan cig brdzi //
K12D0686_H0689:282b-16: don yod rgyal po'i gsang sngags ni /
K12D0686_H0689:282b-17: brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas me la dbul //
K12D0686_H0689:282b-18: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du lan stong rtsa brgyad kyi sbyin sreg bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:282b-19: lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang /
K12D0686_H0689:282b-20: nam phyed na me lha rang gi gzugs 'bar bar
K12D0686_H0689:282b-21: shin tu gnas pa langs nas phyogs bcur lta zhing
K12D0686_H0689:282b-22: kun tu brtags nas rig sngags 'chang la legs so
K12D0686_H0689:282b-23: zhes bgyi ba stsol bar 'gyur te /
K12D0686_H0689:282b-26: bdag tshim par byas pas rig sngags 'chang /
K12D0686_H0689:282b-27: khyod kyis sbyin sreg gi cho ga grub kyi /
K12D0686_H0689:282b-28: mchog slongs shig dang thams cad sbyin no //
K12D0686_H0689:282b-29: de nas rig sngags 'chang gis ji lta bu'i 'dod pa'i mchog rnams bslang bar bgyi ste /
K12D0686_H0689:282b-30: ji ltar bslangs pa bzhin thams cad stsol bar bgyid do //
K12D0686_H0689:283a-1: gis mchod yon gyi snod dag 'bul zhing gtor ma dbul ba'i las bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:283a-2: de nas rig sngags 'chang gis mar dang bsres pa'i
K12D0686_H0689:283a-3: gong bu chen po dag gis sbyin sreg bgyi zhing
K12D0686_H0689:283a-4: 'bras bu'i shing sbar nas don yod zhags pa'i snying
K12D0686_H0689:283a-5: po lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:283a-6: stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang /
K12D0686_H0689:283a-7: thab kyi dbus nas skyes pa zhig lus phyed tsam
K12D0686_H0689:283a-8: phyud nas dngul gyi gzhong pa kha zas kyis bkang
K12D0686_H0689:283a-9: ste pus mo nub tsam du dbul bar bgyid do
K12D0686_H0689:283a-10: // rig sngags 'chang gis blang bar bgyi ste /
K12D0686_H0689:283a-11: blangs pa tsam gyis nam mkha' la 'phur bar 'gyur
K12D0686_H0689:283a-12: zhing rig sngags 'chang gi lus la me 'bar ba'i
K12D0686_H0689:283a-14: de 'tshal na tshe lo khrir 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:283a-15: nam mkha'i rig sngags kyi 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:283a-16: bskal pa bcu tshun chad kyi sngon gyi skye ba dran par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:283a-17: don yod rgyal po'i cho ga zhib mo rnam par
K12D0686_H0689:283a-18: grol ba'i dkyil 'khor kha ton du gnas par 'gyur
K12D0686_H0689:283a-19: ro // gal te snod mi len na de'i tshe
K12D0686_H0689:283a-20: yang lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sbyin sreg bgyis na
K12D0686_H0689:283a-22: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs kyi mdun du mchis na /
K12D0686_H0689:283a-23: rig sngags 'chang la dbugs 'byin par bgyid de /
K12D0686_H0689:283b-0: khyod kyi sbyin sreg gi cho ga de @283b bsgrubs zin gyi /
K12D0686_H0689:283b-1: mchog slongs shig dang sbyin no //
K12D0686_H0689:283b-2: zhes de'i tshe rig sngags 'chang gis /
K12D0686_H0689:283b-3: ci bsam pa'i mchog smras pa de'i tshe thams cad stsol bar bgyid do //
K12D0686_H0689:283b-4: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis skyes pa
K12D0686_H0689:283b-5: de las snod blangs te rang gi lag nas rig
K12D0686_H0689:283b-6: sngags 'chang la stsol bar bgyid do //
K12D0686_H0689:283b-7: rig sngags 'chang gis blangs nas zas kyi gong bu de bza' bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:283b-8: 'tshal pa tsam gyi mod la nam mkha' la rdzu 'phrul gyis mchi bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:283b-9: lus las me'i snying po 'bar ba'i kha dog sna tshogs 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:283b-10: don yod rgyal po'i rig sngags 'dzin 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:283b-11: 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po /
K12D0686_H0689:283b-13: gangg'a'i klung bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dgu bcu
K12D0686_H0689:283b-14: rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma dang mnyam pa'i rig sngags
K12D0686_H0689:283b-15: 'chang ba'i 'khor los bsgyur ba rnams kyi rig sngags
K12D0686_H0689:283b-16: 'chang gis yongs su bskor bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:283b-17: gangg'a'i klung bye ba khri phrag brgya stong dgu bcu
K12D0686_H0689:283b-18: rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma dang mnyam pa'i gnas kyi
K12D0686_H0689:283b-19: gzhal med khang don yod pa'i rab tu gnas pa
K12D0686_H0689:283b-21: rin po che sna bdun gyi gzhal med khang ri dang /
K12D0686_H0689:283b-23: nags tshal dang bcas pa me tog dang /
K12D0686_H0689:283b-24: 'bras bu'i shing rnam pa sna tshogs yal ga dang /
K12D0686_H0689:283b-28: myu gur bcas pa kha cig ni /
K12D0686_H0689:284a-5: rin po che sna bdun las byung ba'i me tog dag go /
K12D0686_H0689:284a-6: gzhan yang lha'i me tog rnam pa sna tshogs dag dang /
K12D0686_H0689:284a-7: ta ma la dang tsam ba ka dang /
K12D0686_H0689:284a-14: kub pya ka'i me tog dag dang /
K12D0686_H0689:284a-17: skyed mos tshal dga' bar 'gyur ba'i gnas kyi gzhal
K12D0686_H0689:284a-18: med khang gis mdzes par bgyis pa'i gzhal med khang
K12D0686_H0689:284a-21: yid du mchis par 'gyur ro; ;lha'i chu klung dang /
K12D0686_H0689:284a-24: rdzing lha'i tsandan gyi dri chab kyis yongs su gang
K12D0686_H0689:284a-25: ba de la rin po che sna bdun las byung
K12D0686_H0689:284a-30: padma dkar pos legs par brgyan pa'i char gser gyi
K12D0686_H0689:284a-31: bye ma legs par bdal ba'i gzhal med khang dag
K12D0686_H0689:284a-35: dri za'i tshogs kyis dga' bar bgyis pa /
K12D0686_H0689:284a-41: mi 'am ci'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing lha'i
K12D0686_H0689:284a-42: 'byor pa gzhal med khang legs par bstabs pa'i gnas
K12D0686_H0689:284a-43: na thams cad du rtse bar bgyid /
K12D0686_H0689:284b-0: byang chub kyi snying po la @284b thug pa nas byang chub la mchis kyi bar du /
K12D0686_H0689:284b-1: chos kyi 'khor los bskor ba nas yongs su mya
K12D0686_H0689:284b-2: ngan 'das pa'i bar du tshe'i tshad gcig tsam du
K12D0686_H0689:284b-4: de bzhin du grub pa bla na med pa chen
K12D0686_H0689:284b-5: po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug nyid byang
K12D0686_H0689:284b-6: chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du rtag
K12D0686_H0689:284b-8: de ltar zas kyi gong bu sgrub pa'i cho ga shin tu rnyed par dka' lags so //
K12D0686_H0689:284b-9: phogs bcu mtha' dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams
K12D0686_H0689:284b-10: cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang lhan
K12D0686_H0689:284b-12: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad las mngon sum du chos nyan pa thos par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:284b-13: de'i 'od zer 'bar ba'i snying pos stong gsum gyi
K12D0686_H0689:284b-14: stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams snang bar 'gyur
K12D0686_H0689:284b-15: ro; ;don yod pa'i zhags pa 'phags pa spyan ras
K12D0686_H0689:284b-16: gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po byang chub sems dpa'
K12D0686_H0689:284b-17: thams cad kyis phyag bgyis pa /
K12D0686_H0689:284b-18: rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi gsang sngags dang
K12D0686_H0689:284b-19: phyag rgya rim par phye ba'i cho ga zhib mo
K12D0686_H0689:284b-20: mtha' dag rdzogs par sgrub pa'i cho ga thams cad
K12D0686_H0689:284b-21: dang / chog zhib mo'i rgya chen po mtha' dag
K12D0686_H0689:284b-22: gi dkyil 'khor 'di kho na nyid du gnas par
K12D0686_H0689:284b-23: dang / 'gyur lags so // klu'i rgyal po bye
K12D0686_H0689:284b-24: ba phrag brgya stong rnams de'i dbang du gyur nas
K12D0686_H0689:284b-25: rtag par rgyun du mchi bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:285a-3: lto 'phye chen po thams cad dbang du gyur nas mchi bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:285a-4: 'og min gyi gnas kyi lha rnams kyi rig sngags
K12D0686_H0689:285a-5: 'chang de'i phyi bzhin rtag tu 'brang zhing rtag par
K12D0686_H0689:285a-6: rgyun du yongs su bskor bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:285a-7: lha'i ro bro ba'i mchog dang ldan ba'i bza' ba dang /
K12D0686_H0689:285a-9: gzhal med khang rnam pa sna tshogs dag lhun gyis grub par 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:285a-12: rgyan sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i gzhal med khang dag 'byung bar 'gyur te /
K12D0686_H0689:285a-13: de la sogs pa sbyin sreg gi cho ga don
K12D0686_H0689:285a-14: yod pa sgrub pa dag par 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i
K12D0686_H0689:285a-16: 'on te skal pa chung ba sangs rgyas dang byang
K12D0686_H0689:285a-17: chub sems dpa'i sa bon ma mchis pa zhig mchis
K12D0686_H0689:285a-18: la des snod de blangs pa tsam gyi mod la
K12D0686_H0689:285a-19: rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug 'thob par 'gyur te /
K12D0686_H0689:285a-20: lha dang mi'i dpal nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:285a-21: reg pa tsam gyi mod la tshe lha'i lo brgya khri bzhi stong thub par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:285a-22: de la phyis kyang nad 'byung bar mi 'gyur te /
K12D0686_H0689:285a-24: sgrib pa thams cad kyis nyon mongs par mi 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:285a-28: rab tu gdug pa thams cad nub par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:285b-2: yi dvags kyi yul thams cad las yongs su grol par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:285b-3: sems can thams cad kyi mchod gnas gcig bur 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:285b-8: sems can thams cad lta 'tshal bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:285b-9: thams cad du rgyal bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:285b-10: tshig btsan zhing don yod pa thob par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:285b-11: 'gum pa'i dus su de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gzigs pa bzhed par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:285b-12: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:285b-13: dran pa shin tu nye bar bzhag nas dus bgyid par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:285b-14: dus bgyis nas skal pa mnyam pa 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur te /
K12D0686_H0689:285b-15: padma las brdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhing skye ba dran par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:285b-16: lan 'ga' yang phyir ngan song du mchi bar mi 'gyur te /
K12D0686_H0689:285b-17: phyis ma'i mngal du skye bar mi 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:285b-18: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad blta ba dang /
K12D0686_H0689:285b-19: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad blta ba'i phyir sangs
K12D0686_H0689:285b-20: rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du rtag
K12D0686_H0689:285b-22: dpral bar thig le bgyis na /
K12D0686_H0689:285b-23: thams cad du mi gda' bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:285b-24: me lha rtag par rgyun du dran par bgyis pa
K12D0686_H0689:285b-25: tsam gyis rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis nas
K12D0686_H0689:285b-26: mchog thams cad stsol bar bgyid do //
K12D0686_H0689:286a-2: de nas don yod bsgongs pa sgrub par 'tshal na /
K12D0686_H0689:286a-3: rig sngags 'chang des 'bras dang sran ma ma shar bsres te bsgril la bsgongs nas mar dang /
K12D0686_H0689:286a-6: sbrang rtsi lhan cig brdzis nas bil ba'i tshad tsam du bgyis te /
K12D0686_H0689:286a-7: des 'og tu shing k'a ra b'i ra'i me sbar
K12D0686_H0689:286a-8: nas bsgongs pa re re la lan bdun bzlas brjod
K12D0686_H0689:286a-9: bgyis nas me'i nang na sbyin sreg bgyi ste /
K12D0686_H0689:286a-10: nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:286a-11: de nas rig sngags 'chang yungs kar dang /
K12D0686_H0689:286a-12: me tog ci snyed pa dang bsres te lan nyi
K12D0686_H0689:286a-13: shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis nas me'i dbus su
K12D0686_H0689:286a-16: khro bo'i rgyal po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas gtor bar bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:286a-17: de nas me'i dbus nas me lha lus phyed tsam
K12D0686_H0689:286a-18: phyung nas rin po che sna bdun las bgyis pa'i
K12D0686_H0689:286a-19: snod zas bsgongs pas bkang nas rig sngags 'chang la

K12D0686_H0689:292a-4: 'phel ba smra bar 'gyur ba nas bskal ba las 'das pa'i 'das pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:292a-6: da ltar byung ba'i bar du smra bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:292a-7: de nas rig sngags 'chang gis chab kyi khar stsal la la du blangs na /
K12D0686_H0689:292a-9: la du la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis nas rgyal po'i sgor bsnun na /
K12D0686_H0689:292a-10: rgyal po'i btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa bdag nyid dam /
K12D0686_H0689:292a-11: nor dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:292a-12: grong khyer gyi sgor bsnun na /
K12D0686_H0689:292a-13: grong khyer na gnas pa'i skyes pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:292a-16: bu mo thams cad dbang du gyur nas mchis par

K12D0686_H0689:292a-18: par 'gyur ro // mchod pa'i gnas chen por 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:292a-19: la du la lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis te dpal lha mo chen me'i lag par stsal na /
K12D0686_H0689:292a-20: dpal lha mo chen mo dbang du gyur nas nor
K12D0686_H0689:292a-21: chen po stsol cing ji srid 'tsho'i bar du mchis
K12D0686_H0689:292a-22: par 'gyur ro // la du la lan brgya rtsa
K12D0686_H0689:292a-23: brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas khug ma'i nang du stsal
K12D0686_H0689:292a-24: te mchan khung du bsrel bar bgyi ste /
K12D0686_H0689:292a-25: ji tsam du bsal ba de srid du mi gda'
K12D0686_H0689:292a-26: bar gyur nas gang du stsal ba der 'jug par
K12D0686_H0689:292b-0: 'gyur ro // gang na @292b shing gcig pa'am /
K12D0686_H0689:292b-1: 'bab chu gcig par la du la khro bo'i rgyal
K12D0686_H0689:292b-2: po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi ste dbang
K12D0686_H0689:292b-3: bskur nas shing gi drung du brdeg na /
K12D0686_H0689:292b-4: 'dod rgyur bsgyur ba dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:292b-5: ji ltar bsam pa'i 'dod pa thams cad nye bar mchis nas yongs su spyod pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:292b-6: ji srid 'tsho'i bar du mchis par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:292b-7: la du la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis te /
K12D0686_H0689:292b-8: ma mo'i gnas su nag po chen po'i spyi gtsug
K12D0686_H0689:292b-9: tu bzhag la khro bo'i rgyal po lan bdun bzlas
K12D0686_H0689:292b-10: te chab dang yungs kar gyis dbang bskur bar bgyis
K12D0686_H0689:292b-11: na / de nas sbyor ba mo thams cad dang /
K12D0686_H0689:292b-12: mkha' 'gro ma thams cad dbang du gyur nas mngag gzhug pa las thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:292b-13: la du la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te
K12D0686_H0689:292b-14: nag po chen po'i lte ba'i phyogs su bzhag na
K12D0686_H0689:292b-15: / ma mo'i tshogs thams cad rang gi gzugs kyis
K12D0686_H0689:292b-16: mdun du mchis nas mchog thams cad stsol bar 'gyur
K12D0686_H0689:292b-17: / ro // las thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:292b-18: la du la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis
K12D0686_H0689:292b-19: nas 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi lhung bzed kyi nang
K12D0686_H0689:292b-20: du stsal te khro bo'i rgyal pos dbang bskur bgyis
K12D0686_H0689:292b-21: na / ji srid du lhung bzed na la du
K12D0686_H0689:292b-22: mchis pa de srid du phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs
K12D0686_H0689:292b-23: pa thams cad kyi spyan sngar lha'i zhal zas ro
K12D0686_H0689:293a-0: sna tshogs kyi ro'i mchog dang ldan @293a *//
K12D0686_H0689:293a-2: nyan thos dang byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyi 'khor
K12D0686_H0689:293a-3: gyi dkyil 'khor chen po dang bcas pa tshim par
K12D0686_H0689:293a-5: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad dang /
K12D0686_H0689:293a-6: byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang /
K12D0686_H0689:293a-7: nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa de dag
K12D0686_H0689:293a-8: gi rig sngags 'chang de'i yon sbyong ba mdzad par
