K12D0686_H0689:293a-10: bzlas brjod bgyis te khro bo'i rgyal po'i dbang bskur
K12D0686_H0689:293a-11: la lcags kyu'i rgyal pos chab la bzlas brjod bgyis
K12D0686_H0689:293a-12: 'gyur ro // na / me thab kyi mtshams bcing bar bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:293a-13: de nas aarka'i yam sreg shing gis me sbar la
K12D0686_H0689:293a-14: la du de med thab kyi dbus su bzhag ste
K12D0686_H0689:293a-17: sbrang rtsi bsres pas lan brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:293a-18: lan brgya rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang /
K12D0686_H0689:293a-19: me lha me'i rang bzhin gyi gzugs kyis byung nas rig sngags 'chang la smras pa /
K12D0686_H0689:293a-25: bdag gis mchog tu dga' ba thob kyi /
K12D0686_H0689:293a-26: rig sngags 'chang ji ltar yid la bsam zhing 'dod pa smros shig dang mchog sbyin no //
K12D0686_H0689:293a-27: rig sngags 'chang gis ji ltar yid la bsam pa bzhin mchog brjod par bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:293b-0: me lha des kyang @293b thams cad stsol cing dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:293b-1: las thams cad grub par stsol bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:293b-2: me'i phung po'i dbus su zhugs na /
K12D0686_H0689:293b-3: 'od zer stong 'phro ba rnams gangs bzhin du bsil bar 'gyur te chab nas byung ba bzhin no //
K12D0686_H0689:293b-4: lag pas me rnams tshugs par bgyid do //
K12D0686_H0689:293b-5: 'bar ba bzhin du klad pa'i spyi bor bzhag na /
K12D0686_H0689:293b-6: skra nyag ma gcig kyang 'tshig par mi bgyid do //
K12D0686_H0689:293b-7: me'i dbang du mchi bar mi 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:293b-8: 'bar bzhin du g-yar gyi nang du bsrel na /
K12D0686_H0689:293b-9: cung zad dro ba tsam du yang mi 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:293b-11: ji ltar tsandan bzhin du bsil zhing bde bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:293b-12: gzhan yang dgos pa sna tshogs bgyid par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:293b-13: gos kyi mtha' mar thum po bgyis na /
K12D0686_H0689:293b-15: chab kyi nang du stsal na /
K12D0686_H0689:293b-17: sbyin sreg thams cad kyi cho ga so so'i gzugs su mchis par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:293b-18: thams cad du dgos pa grub pa stsol bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:293b-19: dgos pa gang dang gang du bskos pa de dang
K12D0686_H0689:293b-20: der dgos pa thams cad grub pa stsol bar 'gyur
K12D0686_H0689:293b-21: ro // thams cad du gsang sngags dang /
K12D0686_H0689:293b-23: cho ga sgrub pa thams cad lung 'bogs par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:293b-26: me 'bar ba'i shugs kyis dpag tshad stong du mchis shing slar yang ldog par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:293b-27: dgos pa thams cad nye bar ston par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:294a-2: thams cad du grub pa stsol bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:294a-3: de nas don yod me 'bar ba //
K12D0686_H0689:294a-5: yid bzhin nor bu lta bu dang //
K12D0686_H0689:294a-6: gzi brjid nyi ma dang mnyam pas //
K12D0686_H0689:294a-7: phyogs bcu'i kho ra khor yug gi /
K12D0686_H0689:294a-8: kun nas su ni gsal bar bgyid //
K12D0686_H0689:294a-9: sgrub pa rnam pa sna tshogs dang //
K12D0686_H0689:294a-11: bcud kyi mchog ste dam pa lags //
K12D0686_H0689:294a-12: nor sgyur smra ba bla na med //
K12D0686_H0689:294a-13: gzhan yang 'tshed pa sna tshogs pa //
K12D0686_H0689:294a-14: sgrub pa bla na med pa lags //
K12D0686_H0689:294a-15: ji ltar nyin mtshan gda' bas na //
K12D0686_H0689:294a-16: nyin par gyi ni gdugs dang mtshungs //
K12D0686_H0689:294a-17: lan gcig dgos pa sgrub pa na //
K12D0686_H0689:294a-18: legs par las bgyis nor bu dang //
K12D0686_H0689:294a-19: rdzas bsres legs par bgyis pa la //
K12D0686_H0689:294a-20: gtsang mas bzlas pa'i las rnams dang //
K12D0686_H0689:294a-21: gtsang mas spyad pas sgrub pa dang //
K12D0686_H0689:294a-22: don yod chu dang me dang ni //
K12D0686_H0689:294a-23: me yi shing rnams brjod par bgyi //
K12D0686_H0689:294a-25: de dag thams cad gcig spungs pa'i //
K12D0686_H0689:294a-26: yam sreg cho ga bla na med //
K12D0686_H0689:294a-27: tsandan dang ni seng ldeng dang //
K12D0686_H0689:294a-28: pa tang k'a ra b'i ra dang //
K12D0686_H0689:294a-29: aarka sha mi smyug ma dang //
K12D0686_H0689:294a-30: shir sha k'a n'a ka ri ka /
K12D0686_H0689:294a-31: 'o ma'i shing dang byang chub shing //
K12D0686_H0689:294a-32: blag sha dang ni sna ma dang /
K12D0686_H0689:294a-34: rtsa ba dang ni lo mar bcas //
K12D0686_H0689:294a-35: padma dkar po ku mu da //
K12D0686_H0689:294a-36: autpal me tog lo ma rtsa //
K12D0686_H0689:294a-37: bi dza p'u ra bil ba shing //
K12D0686_H0689:294b-0: sin du ba ra tsam @294b pa ka /
K12D0686_H0689:294b-1: dre ka bi tsu marde tsa //
K12D0686_H0689:294b-2: sa ha ba la tsi dra ka /
K12D0686_H0689:294b-3: shing de kun ka bsdus pa yi //
K12D0686_H0689:294b-4: yam sreg shing gis las bgyis te //
K12D0686_H0689:294b-5: yungs kar mar dang zho dang ni //
K12D0686_H0689:294b-6: sbrang rtsi 'bras yos sbyin sreg bgyi //
K12D0686_H0689:294b-7: bzang po'i zangs las srang gsum dang //
K12D0686_H0689:294b-8: mtshal las gnyis 'gyur gang bskus kyang //
K12D0686_H0689:294b-9: srang gcig tsandan dkar po nyid //
K12D0686_H0689:294b-10: srang bcu ldong ros srang gcig ste //
K12D0686_H0689:294b-11: de dag bsres pa'i rdzas rnams dang //
K12D0686_H0689:294b-12: de bzhin yung ni nyis 'gyur dag /
K12D0686_H0689:294b-13: zhig ga dag ni bkang nas su //
K12D0686_H0689:294b-14: me thab dbus su gzhug par bgyi //
K12D0686_H0689:294b-15: sbyin sreg stong ni rtsa brgyad du //
K12D0686_H0689:294b-16: shin tu mnyam bzhag legs gsal ba //
K12D0686_H0689:294b-17: gtsang ma gtsang mar spyod pa yi //
K12D0686_H0689:294b-18: gos gtsang legs par khrus bgyis pa //
K12D0686_H0689:294b-19: dri zhim dri yis bsgo bar bgyi //
K12D0686_H0689:294b-20: ro sna tshogs pa'i gtor ma dang //
K12D0686_H0689:294b-21: me tog 'bras bu nyid kyang dgod //
K12D0686_H0689:294b-22: bzlas brjod kyi ni sbyin sreg nyid //
K12D0686_H0689:294b-23: stong rtsa brgyad ni tshangs ba dang /
K12D0686_H0689:294b-24: de nas lha bshos gtor ma dang //
K12D0686_H0689:294b-25: me tog bdug pa mchod yon snod //
K12D0686_H0689:294b-26: dbul ta 'o mas ma dag ma dgum //
K12D0686_H0689:294b-28: de nas rig sngags 'chang gis bzlas brjod stong rtsa brgyad bgyis nas yungs kar gyis snun par bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:294b-29: khro bo'i rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig tu dbang bskur bar bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:294b-31: de nas rig sngags 'chang gis zhi ga de la mchod par bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:294b-32: de nas zangs kyi sgrom bu'am //
K12D0686_H0689:295a-1: sgrom bur zhi ga nas nor bu blangs te sgrom bu der gzhag par bgyi ste /
K12D0686_H0689:295a-2: yid bzhin gyi nor bu ji lta ba bzhin du
K12D0686_H0689:295a-3: 'di yang don yod pa 'bar ba mthu chen po'i
K12D0686_H0689:295a-6: zla ba'i 'od bzhin du gda' bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:295a-8: nyi ma'i 'od bzhin du gda' bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:295a-9: nam 'tshed pa'i dus kyi tshe nor bu de bzhag na /
K12D0686_H0689:295a-10: 'tsho ba dang sred pa dang 'tshed pa thams cad grub par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:295a-11: nam hom bgyid pa de'i tshe thab kyi dbus su bzhag ste sreg blugs kyi sbyin sreg bgyis na /
K12D0686_H0689:295a-13: thams cad kyi thams cad du dgos pa rnams sgron mas gsal bar bgyis pa bzhin du 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:295a-14: g-yul ngo chen por g-yul 'gyed pa'i dbus su skyes pa dpa' bo legs par khrus bgyis pa /
K12D0686_H0689:295a-17: go char bsdams pas yid bzhin gyi nor bu chen
K12D0686_H0689:295a-18: po de'i spyi bo'i gtsug tu bzhag nas gcig pu
K12D0686_H0689:295a-19: g-yul gyi dbus su zhugs na /
K12D0686_H0689:295a-20: de nas skyes pa de me 'bar ba gcig pur 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:295a-21: de nas g-yul 'gyed pa'i pha rol gyi dpung rnams
K12D0686_H0689:295a-22: bam par gyur nas phyogs bcur 'khrugs nas 'byer bar
K12D0686_H0689:295a-23: 'gyur ro // phyi nas lan 'ga' yang pa rol gyi dpung dang /
K12D0686_H0689:295b-0: pha rol gyi dgra dang @295b mi mdza' ba'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:295b-1: lag pas nor bu bzung nas phug gi gnas su zhugs na /
K12D0686_H0689:295b-2: gnas kyi sgo thams cad 'bye bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:295b-3: gnas na gnas pa thams cad mdun du mchis par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:295b-4: klu'i gnas thams cad du mchis nas lag pas nor bu bzung ste gnas kyi nang du zhugs na /
K12D0686_H0689:295b-5: chab thams cad kyis phyir mi tshugs bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:295b-6: de nas klu thams cad mdun du mchis nas bden par dam bca' bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:295b-7: dbang du gyur nas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du las bgyid par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:295b-8: bsgo ba bzhin bgyid par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:295b-12: nags tshal thams cad bde bar 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:295b-13: snyan cing mdangs dang ldan pa dang mnyen par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:295b-14: gzi brjid dang ldan pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:295b-15: dran pa dang ldan pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:295b-16: mi bde ba chung bar yang 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:295b-17: sems can gang dag gis kyang lo tog dang /
K12D0686_H0689:295b-19: 'bras bu la longs spyod par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad dang /
K12D0686_H0689:295b-20: gzhan ches mang po dag gis dgos pa mang po bgyid par 'gyur ba ni /
K12D0686_H0689:295b-21: nor bu chen po don yod 'bar ba'i nor bu me 'bar ba chen po lags so //
K12D0686_H0689:295b-22: de nas don yod snang ba rnam par lta bas
K12D0686_H0689:295b-23: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bkug ste rang
K12D0686_H0689:295b-24: gi gzugs su sblta bar 'tshal na /
K12D0686_H0689:296a-1: sngags 'chang gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgo bar bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:296a-2: lus legs par bkrus te spos chab kyis byug par bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:296a-3: shing aarka'i yam sreg shing gis me sbar bar bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:296a-9: mar sbyar bas stong rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:296a-10: de nas don yod lcags kyu gu gul la lan
K12D0686_H0689:296a-11: nyi shu rtsa gcig gi sreg blugs kyi sbyin sreg
K12D0686_H0689:296a-12: bgyis na / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
K12D0686_H0689:296a-13: rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis nas mchog thams
K12D0686_H0689:296a-14: cad bsam pa bzhin yongs su rdzogs par bgyid do
K12D0686_H0689:296a-15: bgyis na / // ji ltar yid la bgyid cing bsam pa'i mchog stsol bar bgyid do //
K12D0686_H0689:296a-16: de nas rig sngags 'chang gis ji ltar yid la bgyis shing bsam pa'i mchog smras pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:296a-17: de'i 'og tu 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis thams cad stsol bar bgyid do //
K12D0686_H0689:296a-18: de nas mig sman sgrub par 'tshal na /
K12D0686_H0689:296a-19: rig sngags 'chang legs par bkrus te gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgo bar bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:296a-20: nub gcig smyung ba bgyis te /
K12D0686_H0689:296a-21: des zangs kyi za ma gtog bgyis la de nas
K12D0686_H0689:296a-22: mig sman so bi ra dang yung ba nyis 'gyur
K12D0686_H0689:296a-23: du bsres pas dgang bar bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:296a-24: de nas stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyid nas thab kyi dbus su gzhag par bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:296b-0: @296b de'i steng du au shi ra dang /
K12D0686_H0689:296b-5: mar bsres pas lan stong rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:296b-6: shing aarka'i me spar bar bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:296b-7: lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang /
K12D0686_H0689:296b-8: de nas mig sman blangs la gtun gyi steng du legs par zhib tu btags la /
K12D0686_H0689:296b-11: gla rtsi bsres nas slar yang don yod pa'i zhags
K12D0686_H0689:296b-12: pa'i snying po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis
K12D0686_H0689:296b-13: la don yod lcags kyu'i rig sngags rgyal po lan
K12D0686_H0689:296b-14: nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis pa ni /
K12D0686_H0689:296b-15: thams cad du mgul la legs par sbyar te /
K12D0686_H0689:296b-16: de nas don yod rgyal pos dbang bskur bar bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:296b-17: don yod zhags pa'i phyag rgyas lan bdun phyag rgya bcing ngo //
K12D0686_H0689:296b-18: de nas mig sman gyis byugs na /
K12D0686_H0689:296b-19: nam mkha' la 'phur nas rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi dpon por 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:296b-20: skra cung zad 'khyil bar yang 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:296b-22: dpral bar thig le bgyis na mi gda' bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:296b-23: mig la bskus te tshig gzhan mi smra bar rgyal po'i pho brang du zhugs na /
K12D0686_H0689:296b-24: rgyal po'i btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa dang dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:296b-25: mchod pa phal po ches cher mchod par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:296b-26: nor 'du ba grub pa chen po 'thob par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:296b-27: sgrub pa'i dus sam bzlas brjod kyi dus su mig la bskus na /
K12D0686_H0689:297a-2: bdud kyi ris kyi lha thams cad kyis mi mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:297a-3: phyis kyang bgegs byed par mi nus te /
K12D0686_H0689:297a-4: bar chad bgyid par mi 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:297a-5: bde ba sgrub pa'i mchog dang /
K12D0686_H0689:297a-6: bzlas brjod kyi cho ga 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:297a-7: mig la byugs te skye bo mang po'i nang du zhugs na /
K12D0686_H0689:297a-8: de dag thams cad dbang du 'gyur te /
K12D0686_H0689:297a-12: lhab lhub rgyan phal po che 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:297a-13: bud med kyang mig mi 'dzum par blta bzhin du bdag nyid dam /
K12D0686_H0689:297a-15: mig la byugs te dgon pa chen por zhugs na /
K12D0686_H0689:297a-22: sprul gyi dug gi 'jigs pa thams cad 'byung bar mi 'gyur te /
K12D0686_H0689:297a-23: bde legs su slar yang mchi bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:297a-26: 'gyed pa thams cad la mig sman /
K12D0686_H0689:297a-28: smra ba rnams kyi bla na med par 'gyur te /
K12D0686_H0689:297a-29: thams cad du rgyal bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:297a-30: g-yul der g-yul 'gyed pa'i nang du mchis nas mig la byugs na /
K12D0686_H0689:297a-31: thams cad las rgyal bar 'gyur zhing /
K12D0686_H0689:297a-32: 'jigs pa thams cad las bsgral bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:297a-33: gdug pas zin pa thams cad la mig la bskus na /
K12D0686_H0689:297a-34: gdug pa ma mchis par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:297b-3: rims zhag bzhi pa thams cad la mig la bskus na /
K12D0686_H0689:297b-4: rims nad thams cad las grol bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:297b-5: dug mi zad pa 'tshal ba la mig la bskus na /
K12D0686_H0689:297b-7: gdon thams cad kyis zin pa la mig la bskus na /
K12D0686_H0689:297b-8: gdon brgyad khri bzhi stod las thar par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:297b-9: mig bro 'tshal ba la bskus pa tsam gyi mod la byang bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:297b-10: klad pa cher bro 'tshal ba la yang mig la bskus pa tsam gyis byang bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:297b-11: tshangs pa'i srin po'i gdon dang /
K12D0686_H0689:297b-12: brjed byed kyi zin pa la mig la bskus pa tsam gyis thar bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:297b-13: rgyal po khros pas gsad par 'os pa gang su
K12D0686_H0689:297b-14: yang rung ba khrid pa la mig la bskus pa
K12D0686_H0689:297b-15: tsam gyis 'jigs pa thams cad spangs pa'i thar par
K12D0686_H0689:297b-16: 'gyur ro // nag po chen po'i mig la bskus na /
K12D0686_H0689:297b-17: rang gi gzugs kyis dus su mdun na mchis nas
K12D0686_H0689:297b-18: mchog thams cad stsol cing dgos pa thams cad bgyid
K12D0686_H0689:297b-19: par 'gyur ro // ma mo'i tshogs thams cad dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:297b-20: dpal lha mo'i mig la bskus te mig mi 'dzum
K12D0686_H0689:297b-21: par don yod rgyal po'i snying po lan bdun bzlas
K12D0686_H0689:297b-22: na / dpal lha mo chen mo mchis nas dgos pa thams cad dang /
K12D0686_H0689:297b-23: 'bru rab tu mang po stsol bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:297b-24: nyal ba'i tshe mig la bskus te nyal na /
K12D0686_H0689:298a-1: po mang zhing phal che ba mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:298a-2: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rang gi gzugs mthong ba stsol bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:298a-3: mchog thams cad stsol bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:298a-4: dran pa dang blo gros rgya chen por 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:298a-5: mig la bskus te tshogs kyi dbus su zhugs na /
K12D0686_H0689:298a-6: mchod pa chen po 'thob par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:298a-7: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs brnyan gyi mig la bskus na /
K12D0686_H0689:298a-8: rtag tu mchog stsol par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:298a-10: gi'u wang dang lhan cig sbyar te mig la bskus nas rgyal po'i pho brang du zhugs na /
K12D0686_H0689:298a-11: dbang phyug chen po 'thob par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:298a-12: longs spyod chen po phun sum tshogs par yang 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:298a-13: don chen po 'grub par yang 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:298a-16: 'khor thams cad dga' bar gyur nas thams cad dbang du gyur te mchis par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:298a-17: dpal lha mo chen mo'i gzugs brnyan gyi mig la bskus na /
K12D0686_H0689:298a-18: 'byung po thams cad kyi bdag por 'gyur zhing las
K12D0686_H0689:298a-19: bgyi ba ci mchis zhes thams cad dbang du gyur
K12D0686_H0689:298a-21: nag po chen po'i gzugs brnyan gyi dpral ba dang mig la bskus na /
K12D0686_H0689:298a-22: gnod sbyin thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:298a-23: mi ro'i mig la bskus na ldang bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:298b-2: byad kyis zin pa thams cad kyi mig la bskus na /
K12D0686_H0689:298b-5: gsang sngags thams cad bshig par 'gyur zhing /
K12D0686_H0689:298b-6: lan 'ga' yang slar zil gyis gnon par mi 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:298b-7: bkres pa'i mig la bskus te grong du zhugs na /
K12D0686_H0689:298b-9: btung ba'i ston mo lhun gyis 'grub cing 'thob par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:298b-10: bsod snyoms pa'i mig la bskus te bsod snyoms la mchis na /
K12D0686_H0689:298b-11: kha zas sna tshogs mang po dang /
K12D0686_H0689:298b-12: yon phal po che 'thob par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:298b-20: mig gi rdzi ma rdung ba dang /
K12D0686_H0689:298b-21: mig sle bo de dag thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:298b-22: mig nad thams cad las sos par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:298b-23: lha'i mig dag pa 'dab bzang dang mtshungs pa /
K12D0686_H0689:298b-24: 'dab bzang gi mthong ba thob nas thams cad kyi snying du sdug pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:298b-25: dbang du gyur nas nor rnyed pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:298b-26: don grub pa yang thob nas dbang phyug bla na med par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:298b-32: rgyan 'phyang thams cad dgug pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:298b-34: don yod me lha dgug pa'i sbyin sreg rgya chen po brjod par bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:298b-35: grub pa kun gyi bla na med //
K12D0686_H0689:298b-36: don kun grub pas mod la ni //
K12D0686_H0689:298b-37: mkhas rnams mchog tu dga' bar bgyid //
K12D0686_H0689:299a-3: the tshom du yang mi bgyi zhing //
K12D0686_H0689:299a-4: yid gnyis nyid kyang ma lags so //
K12D0686_H0689:299a-5: gtsang mas gtsang ma'i gos dag dang //
K12D0686_H0689:299a-6: legs par bkrus pas las sgrub bo //
K12D0686_H0689:299a-7: sbyin sreg bla na med 'phel ba //
K12D0686_H0689:299a-8: 'di ni rgya chen bsam mi khyab /
K12D0686_H0689:299a-9: ka ran rtsa ba sdong bur bcas //
K12D0686_H0689:299a-10: 'dab ma me tog 'bras bur bcas; ;aarka'i shing dang blag sha'i shing //
K12D0686_H0689:299a-11: yam sreg ngag gis me sbar la //
K12D0686_H0689:299a-12: sa bon bdun po 'bras dang bcas //
K12D0686_H0689:299a-13: 'bras yos til dang yungs kar dang //
K12D0686_H0689:299a-14: zho dang sbrang rtsi mar dang ni //
K12D0686_H0689:299a-15: yungs mar dag dang bskyes pa yi //
K12D0686_H0689:299a-16: sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad tshang bgyi //
K12D0686_H0689:299a-17: khro bo'i rgyal po lan stong rtsa brgyad kyis dbang bskur ba tshang ba dang /
K12D0686_H0689:299a-18: de nas don yod lcags kyu'i rig sngags kyi rgyal
K12D0686_H0689:299a-19: po 'di brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas gu gul dang
K12D0686_H0689:299a-21: mar du sbyar bas sbyin sreg bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:299a-22: dgos pa thams cad rdzogs pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:299a-40: byug pa rnams lhun gyis grub par 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:299b-0: dbang phyug gi 'byor @299b pa chen po 'thob par
K12D0686_H0689:299b-1: 'gyur zhing ji srid 'tsho'i bar du mchis par 'gyur
K12D0686_H0689:299b-2: ro // de nas zla ba yar gyi ngo'i tshes
K12D0686_H0689:299b-3: brgyad la nyin zhag gcig mchis nas mig la bskus
K12D0686_H0689:299b-4: te don yod zhags pa'i snying po lan dgu bcu
K12D0686_H0689:299b-5: bzlas brjod bgyis la khro bo'i rgyal pos dbang bskur
K12D0686_H0689:299b-6: nas don yod zhags pa'i phyag rgya bcings te /
K12D0686_H0689:299b-7: de nas mig la mig sman gyis bskus na /
K12D0686_H0689:299b-8: nam mkha' la rdzu 'phrul gyis mchis par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:299b-9: mig sman grub pa'i rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi
K12D0686_H0689:299b-10: gtso bo rgyal po 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur ro
K12D0686_H0689:299b-11: // sgra cung zad 'khyil bar yang 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:299b-13: mig sman 'dis mig la byugs na /
K12D0686_H0689:299b-14: nyin par ji lta ba bzhin du mtshan mo mthong bar 'gyur zhing mi gda' bar yang 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:299b-17: srin po'i gnas thams cad du zhugs na /
K12D0686_H0689:299b-18: thams cad kyi dpon por 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:299b-19: 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po //
K12D0686_H0689:299b-21: mig sman 'dis mig la byugs nas ma mo'i gnas su zhugs na /
K12D0686_H0689:299b-22: lha gtso bo de dag mig 'dzum par lta bar
K12D0686_H0689:299b-23: bgyid pa la khro bo'i rgyal po lan gcig bzla
K12D0686_H0689:299b-24: bar bgyi'o // de nas ma mo dang lha'i gtso
K12D0686_H0689:299b-25: bo thams cad mdun du mchis nas mchog thams cad
K12D0686_H0689:300a-0: ji srid 'tsho'i bar du las thams cad sgrub par bgyid pas @300a *//
K12D0686_H0689:300a-2: ma mo'i tshogs thams cad kyis yongs su bkur cing snying du sdug par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:300a-3: rtag par rgyun du bsrung ba dang /
K12D0686_H0689:300a-5: sba ba'i phyir gnas shing rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:300a-6: de nas gi'u wang sgrub pa'i sbyin sreg gi chog brjod par bgyi ste /
K12D0686_H0689:300a-7: don yod rgyal po grub pa yis //
K12D0686_H0689:300a-8: rig sngags 'chang ba bde myong zhing //
K12D0686_H0689:300a-9: lha dang lha min mchod pa dang //
K12D0686_H0689:300a-10: sgrub pa'i don kun 'grub pa dang //
K12D0686_H0689:300a-11: dbang du gyur pa dam pa dang //
K12D0686_H0689:300a-12: mkha' la mchi ba'i dam pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:300a-13: mi snang shin tu rnyed dka' dang //
K12D0686_H0689:300a-14: mod la phug tu 'jug pa dang //
K12D0686_H0689:300a-15: nags kyi nang du 'jug pa dang //
K12D0686_H0689:300a-16: ri sul dag tu 'jug pa dang //
K12D0686_H0689:300a-17: thang dag la ni rgyu ba dang //
K12D0686_H0689:300a-18: klu gnas mtshor ni 'jug pa dang //
K12D0686_H0689:300a-19: de bzhin chu klung che bsgral dang //
K12D0686_H0689:300a-20: rdzu 'phrul grub dang skyes pa dang //
K12D0686_H0689:300a-21: de bzhin 'jigs dang sgrib kun dang //
K12D0686_H0689:300a-22: nad kun zhi bar bgyid pa nyid //
K12D0686_H0689:300a-23: sdig pa thams cad nyams par bgyid //
K12D0686_H0689:300a-24: g-yul dor g-yul las rgyal bgyid de //
K12D0686_H0689:300a-25: rtag tu dgra kun brlag par bgyid //
K12D0686_H0689:300a-26: gdon rigs kun kyang tshar gcod cing //
K12D0686_H0689:300a-27: rims rnams thams cad zlog par bgyid //
K12D0686_H0689:300a-28: sngon gyi sgrib pa 'jig bgyid cing //
K12D0686_H0689:300a-29: sdig pa thams cad nyams par bgyid //
K12D0686_H0689:300a-30: dbang phyug stsol cing skal pa stsol //
K12D0686_H0689:300b-1: 'gyed pa rab tu zhi bar bgyid //
K12D0686_H0689:300b-2: bcing pa dang ni shing sgrog dang //
K12D0686_H0689:300b-3: khong sgril lcags sgrog phye mar rlog /
K12D0686_H0689:300b-4: rgyal po gdug pa khros pa yis //
K12D0686_H0689:300b-5: gsad par 'os pa sel bar bgyid //
K12D0686_H0689:300b-6: da lta 'di la brten pa na //
K12D0686_H0689:300b-7: mi bdag bu sdug bzhin smra zhing //
K12D0686_H0689:300b-8: mi bde kun las grol bar 'gyur //
K12D0686_H0689:300b-9: 'di ni kun tu sdug pa dang //
K12D0686_H0689:300b-10: gnas kun mchis par mchod par 'os //
K12D0686_H0689:300b-11: lus can snying du rtag tu sdug /
K12D0686_H0689:300b-12: rgyal po btsun mo 'khor bcas pa'i //
K12D0686_H0689:300b-13: rtag tu gnang chen dag tu 'gyur //
K12D0686_H0689:300b-14: dge sbyong bram ze nyid dang ni //
K12D0686_H0689:300b-15: rgyal rigs rje'u rigs dmangs rigs dang //
K12D0686_H0689:300b-16: bud med kun dang de bzhin du //
K12D0686_H0689:300b-17: skyes pa khye'u bu mo yi //
K12D0686_H0689:300b-18: rtag tu gnang chen dag tu 'gyur //
K12D0686_H0689:300b-19: gi'u wang bla na med pa po //
K12D0686_H0689:300b-20: 'di la gang dag rtag brten na //
K12D0686_H0689:300b-21: 'phags pa 'jig rten dbang phyug ste; ;mchog sbyin rtag tu mchod pa bgyid //
K12D0686_H0689:300b-22: tshangs pa khyab 'jug dbang phyug che //
K12D0686_H0689:300b-23: nyin dang mtshan du srung ba dang //
K12D0686_H0689:300b-24: rtag tu mchog stsol phyir mchis so //
K12D0686_H0689:300b-25: gzhan yang lha ni mang po dang //
K12D0686_H0689:300b-26: klu yi rgyal po mthu chen dang //
K12D0686_H0689:300b-27: 'byung po gnod sbyin srin po dang //
K12D0686_H0689:300b-28: grul bum mi min lto 'phye che //
K12D0686_H0689:300b-29: dri za lha min nyid dag dang //
K12D0686_H0689:300b-30: nam mkha' lding dbang mthu chen te //
K12D0686_H0689:300b-31: de dag thams cad srung ba yi //
K12D0686_H0689:300b-32: ched du nyin dang mtshan dag tu //
K12D0686_H0689:300b-33: rang dbang nyid kyis gnas par 'gyur //
K12D0686_H0689:300b-34: gi wang grub pa dam pa po //
K12D0686_H0689:300b-35: de ltar stobs dang ldan pa lags //
K12D0686_H0689:301a-1: ba yis; ;gtsang gyur legs par khrus bgyis nas //
K12D0686_H0689:301a-2: gtsang ma yi ni gos bgo ste //
K12D0686_H0689:301a-3: gi wang legs par bsgrubs nas su //
K12D0686_H0689:301a-4: dmar po chen po nyid dag dang //
K12D0686_H0689:301a-5: gur gum dag dang mnyam sbyar la //
K12D0686_H0689:301a-6: zangs kyi snod du bkang nas su //
K12D0686_H0689:301a-7: don yod zhags pa'i gzugs mdun du //
K12D0686_H0689:301a-8: stong rtsa brgyad ni tshang bzlas nas //
K12D0686_H0689:301a-9: rgya dar gyis ni kha dgum mo //
K12D0686_H0689:301a-10: de nas seng ldeng gi shing dang //
K12D0686_H0689:301a-11: aarka'i shing gi yam sreg shing gi me sbar la /
K12D0686_H0689:301a-17: zho dang sbrang rtsi mar du bsres te lan stong rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:301a-18: lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang /
K12D0686_H0689:301a-19: de nas me zhi zhing me mdag phra mo yang
K12D0686_H0689:301a-20: zhi ba dang thal ba blangs te snod kyi nang
K12D0686_H0689:301a-21: du stsal nas de nas slar yang lan brgya rtsa
K12D0686_H0689:301a-22: brgyad bzlas la / khro bo'i rgyal pos dbang bskur te phyag rgya'i phyag rgyas kyang dbang bskur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:301a-23: de nas dpral ba'i dbus su thig le bgyis nas
K12D0686_H0689:301a-24: nam mkha' la 'phur nas rig sngags 'chang chen po'i
K12D0686_H0689:301a-25: rgyal po 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:301a-26: rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi dpon por 'gyur zhing skra cung zad 'khyil bar yang 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:301a-27: lo dgu khri dgu stong du 'tsho bar 'gyur zhing
K12D0686_H0689:301a-28: gnas kyi sgo thams cad rtag tu 'byed par 'gyur
K12D0686_H0689:301a-29: ro // dpral ba la thig le bgyis na /
K12D0686_H0689:301a-30: mi gda' bar gyur nas gnas thams cad du zhugs
K12D0686_H0689:301b-0: na gnas thams cad kyi bdag @301b por 'gyur zhing
K12D0686_H0689:301b-3: srin po'i gnas kyi sgo thams cad 'byed par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:301b-6: srin po mthu dang ldan pa thams cad kyis yongs su bskor nas mchis par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:301b-7: ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bsgo ba bzhin bgyid par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:301b-9: ji ltar nyin bar bzhin du mtshan mo snang zhing
K12D0686_H0689:301b-10: thams cad du gter mthong bar 'gyur ro; ;sa'i phug
K12D0686_H0689:301b-11: dang / thang gi sgo phye ba mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:301b-12: thang gi gnas su zhugs nas thang gi dgos pa thams cad bgyi ste /
K12D0686_H0689:301b-14: chu klung chen po'i nang du zhugs na /
K12D0686_H0689:301b-15: khyim dang gzhal med khang ji lta ba bzhin du mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:301b-16: rin po che thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i gzhal med khang mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:301b-17: chab la gnas pa gang lags pa de dag thams
K12D0686_H0689:301b-18: cad du dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro
K12D0686_H0689:301b-19: // klu'i mtsho dang gnas su ji ltar rang gi khyim bzhin du 'jug cing 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:301b-20: lus mtha' dag byugs te g-yul ngor g-yul 'gyed pa'i nang du zhugs na /
K12D0686_H0689:301b-21: ya lad dang go cha bgos pa bzhin du mthong nas thams cad las rgyal bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:301b-22: khar bsrel te rgyal po'i pho brang du zhugs na /
K12D0686_H0689:301b-23: btsun mo 'khor dang bcas pa dbang phyug du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:301b-24: gang la tshig smras pa de dag thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:302a-0: gang la blangs pa de dag thams @302a *//
K12D0686_H0689:302a-2: gang la bsgo ba de thams cad bsgo ba bzhin bgyid par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:302a-3: khar 'chos nas gang dang gang du mchis pa de dang der skyes pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:302a-6: bu mo thams cad bdag nyid dam /
K12D0686_H0689:302a-7: nor dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:302a-8: lag pa g-yas pa la byugs na /
K12D0686_H0689:302a-9: su reg pa de dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:302a-17: mngag gzhug pa rnams dbang du gyur nas bsgo ba bzhin mchis par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:302a-18: mdzub mo g-yas pa la bskus nas ser ba dang /
K12D0686_H0689:302a-20: 'brug gi dus su sprin la mngon sum du bstan te bsdigs na /
K12D0686_H0689:302a-23: ser ba thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:302a-24: dpag tshad gcig khor khor yug tu zil gyis mnan par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:302a-26: lag pa g-yas pa sprin la mngon sum du bstan
K12D0686_H0689:302a-27: pas ha chang char che ba gcod par 'gyur ro
K12D0686_H0689:302a-28: // char mi 'bab pa'i dus su lag pa g-yas
K12D0686_H0689:302a-29: pa'i lag mthil la byugs nas klu gnas pa'i mtsho'i
K12D0686_H0689:302a-30: chu la thal mo lan gsum pa brdabs na /
K12D0686_H0689:302a-31: de'i mod la klu'i rgyal pos char gyi rgyun chen po gtong bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:302a-32: gal te mod la char pa mi 'bebs na /
K12D0686_H0689:302a-33: de'i tshe lan lnga brdeg pa dang //
K12D0686_H0689:302b-0: klu de dag thams cad kyis char gyi rgyun gtong @302b bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:302b-1: gang gi tshe char pa mi 'bebs pa de'i tshe
K12D0686_H0689:302b-2: klu thams cad la klad pa'i nad 'byung bar 'gyur
K12D0686_H0689:302b-3: ro // gal te lan bdun bsnun na /
K12D0686_H0689:302b-4: klu'i rgyal po thams cad la tshul ma yin pa'i sdug bsngal 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:302b-5: klu'i rgyal po thams cad kyi rig sngags phung bar bgyis par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:302b-6: gdon gyis zin pa thams cad kyi mig la bskus na /
K12D0686_H0689:302b-7: bskus pa tsam gyi mod la gdon brgyad khri bzhi stong rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:302b-8: rims kyis thebs pa rnams kyi dpral ba la thig le bgyis na /
K12D0686_H0689:302b-12: nyin bzhi pa'i rims thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:302b-13: nad kyis zin pa rnams la khrus bgyis na /
K12D0686_H0689:302b-14: mod la nad thams cad las thar par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:302b-20: 'brum bu rnams las thar par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:302b-25: 'brum bu phra mo mched pa la byugs pa tsam gyis thar par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:302b-26: gdug pas zin pa thams cad la byugs pa tsam gyis mi gdug par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:302b-27: dug gis myos par bgyis pa thams cad la 'tshal ba tsam gyi mod la thar par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:303a-6: rtug skam la bsros nas 'tshal ba tsam gyi mod la zhi bar 'gyur zhing /
K12D0686_H0689:303a-7: phyis lan 'ga' yang gnod pa bgyid par mi 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:303a-8: mtshogs mar gi wang gi ril bu bgyis te lug
K12D0686_H0689:303a-9: gi sgo dang nye bar mchis nas lag pa g-yas
K12D0686_H0689:303a-10: pa yang byugs te mgo la thal mo brdabs na
K12D0686_H0689:303a-11: / phug gi sgo rnams 'bye bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:303a-12: bag tsha ba ma mchis par 'jug ste /
K12D0686_H0689:303a-13: slar cung zad kyang bgegs bgyid par mi 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:303a-14: gnas de na gnas pa gang lags pa de dag
K12D0686_H0689:303a-15: thams cad dbang du gyur nas mdun na mchis par
K12D0686_H0689:303a-16: 'gyur ro // dgos pa sgrub pa chen po thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:303a-17: rkang pa gnyis la byugs te me 'bar ba'i nang du zhugs na /
K12D0686_H0689:303a-18: me lha rang gi gzugs kyis mdun du mchis nas
K12D0686_H0689:303a-19: lag pa nas bzung ste rig sngags 'chang la rig
K12D0686_H0689:303a-20: sngags 'chang / bdag gi gzhal med khang gi gnas su zhugs shig /
K12D0686_H0689:303a-21: rig sngags 'chang gis bsgo ba thams cad bsgrub par bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:303a-23: de'i tshe rig sngags 'chang gis bgyi ba ci mchis pa de bsgo bar bgyi ste /
K12D0686_H0689:303a-25: dpung pa gnyis la byugs na /
K12D0686_H0689:303a-26: glang po che bdun gyi stobs dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:303b-0: tshugs pa ma mchis pa'i gyang @303b du 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:303b-1: byin pa gnyis la byugs na /
K12D0686_H0689:303b-2: 'bab chu chen po pha rol tu rgal bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:303b-3: mgrin pa la byugs nas nags khung du zhugs na /
K12D0686_H0689:303b-4: nags khung gi gnas kyi sgo thams cad bye nas
K12D0686_H0689:303b-5: sman gyi rdzas thams cad rang gi gzugs kyis mdun
K12D0686_H0689:303b-7: ci 'tshal ba de blang bar bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:303b-8: gi wang gi ril bu bgyis te khar bsrel nas ri sul dang /
K12D0686_H0689:303b-10: skad drag po lan gsum gdon par bgyi ste /
K12D0686_H0689:303b-12: sman gshong gi gnas gsang ba'i sgo gang dag lags pa 'bye bar 'gyur zhing /
K12D0686_H0689:303b-13: de na gnas pa gang lags pa de dag thams
K12D0686_H0689:303b-14: cad rang rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis par
K12D0686_H0689:303b-15: 'gyur zhing las thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:303b-18: nags tshang tshing gi sman gyi rdzas gang lags pa
K12D0686_H0689:303b-19: dag rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis par 'gyur
K12D0686_H0689:303b-20: zhing / gang dag gi bcud kyi mchog de dag 'dzag la /
K12D0686_H0689:303b-21: bcud srung ba de dag kyang rang gi gzugs kyis
K12D0686_H0689:303b-22: mdun na mchis nas thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro
K12D0686_H0689:303b-23: // ji ltar 'tshal ba bag tsha ba ma mchis par dgos pa thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:303b-24: snying gar thig le bgyis nas snying la cung zad ci bsam pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:303b-25: yid la bsam zhing brnag pa'i dgos pa de dag thams cad mod la 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:303b-26: lto la thig le bgyis na /
K12D0686_H0689:304a-0: kha zas dang btung ba'i ston @304a *//
K12D0686_H0689:304a-1: mo 'dod rgu thams cad thob par 'gyur te /
K12D0686_H0689:304a-2: phun sum tshogs pa thams cad lhun gyis 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:304a-3: rtsib logs gnyis la byugs na /
K12D0686_H0689:304a-4: ji ltar bsam zhing don du gnyer ba'i gos rnams 'thob par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:304a-6: ji ltar yid la bsam pa'i mal dang /
K12D0686_H0689:304a-10: gnad thams cad kyi gnas su byugs na /
K12D0686_H0689:304a-11: ji ltar bsam pa'i rgyan dang /
K12D0686_H0689:304a-14: rta'i bzhon pa thob par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:304a-15: nyin bzhin nang par tshig gzhan mi smra bar gi
K12D0686_H0689:304a-16: wang gi ril bu re re la don yod rgyal
K12D0686_H0689:304a-17: po'i snying po bzlas nas 'tshal te /
K12D0686_H0689:304a-18: nyi ma dang po la tshigs su bcad pa stong bklags na 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:304a-19: nyin gcig bzhin nyis 'gyur du bgyis nas bklags pa na 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:304a-20: zhag bdun gyis thos pa mang por 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:304a-22: mi'am ci mo lta bu'i sgra dbyangs su 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:304a-23: zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig tu bgyis na /
K12D0686_H0689:304a-24: thos pa bsags pa'i rgya mtsho chen por 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:304a-25: ka la pingka'i dbyangs ltar mnyen zhing snyan la rna ba'i sgra dbyangs su 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:304a-26: bu'i ched du mar dang lhan cig stsal na /
K12D0686_H0689:304a-28: mo gsham rnams kyis kyang bu rnyed par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:304b-5: byugs pa tsam gyi mod la dum bu dum bur 'chag par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:304b-9: tshes bco lnga la don yod rgyal po'i snying po
K12D0686_H0689:304b-10: lan bdun bzlas la khro bo'i rgyal pos rang la
K12D0686_H0689:304b-11: dbang bskur nas gi'u wang gi ril bu dang spos
K12D0686_H0689:304b-13: khrus bgyis pa tsam gyi mod la sdig pa thams cad dang /
K12D0686_H0689:304b-14: sngon gyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:304b-15: nub gsum du khrus bgyis na /
K12D0686_H0689:304b-19: grub pa'i mchog thams cad thob par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:304b-23: sdig pa thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:304b-24: lan 'ga' yang thams cad kyi thams cad du 'jigs
K12D0686_H0689:304b-25: pa mi 'byung zhing yongs su thar par 'gyur ro
K12D0686_H0689:304b-26: // phyis lan 'ga' yang sdig pa'i dri mas gos par mi 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:304b-27: gi'u wang gi ril bu til mar dang bsres te
K12D0686_H0689:304b-28: kha gdong la byugs nas rgyal po'i mdun du mchis
K12D0686_H0689:304b-29: na / bu bzhin du phang du 'khyud nas dga' ba chen po 'thob pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:304b-30: rgyal po khro bo'i 'jigs pa thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:304b-31: lus thog thag tu byugs na /
K12D0686_H0689:304b-32: gsad par 'os pa'i lus la yang mtshon gyis phog par mi 'gyur te /
K12D0686_H0689:305a-3: lus la 'bab par mi 'gyur zhing gzhu 'chag par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:305a-4: gi'u wang gi ril bu mgul du btags nas 'brog dgon pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:305a-6: nags tshang tshing bgrod dka' bar zhugs na /
K12D0686_H0689:305a-16: dug gi 'jigs pa thams cad 'byung bar mi 'gyur te /
K12D0686_H0689:305a-18: dpung pa g-yas pa la btags na; thams cad du pha rol las rgyal bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:305a-19: thams cad du mchod gnas chen por yang 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:305a-20: thams cad du mthu dang brtson 'grus chen po rdzi
K12D0686_H0689:305a-21: ba med pas pha rol zil gyis gnon par 'gyur
K12D0686_H0689:305a-22: ro // dpung pa g-yon pa la btags na /
K12D0686_H0689:305a-26: bu mo thams cad kyi gnang chen du 'gyur te /
K12D0686_H0689:305a-29: dgos pa mang po 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:305a-30: byin pa g-yas pa la btags na /
K12D0686_H0689:305a-31: dub pa ma mchis par dpag tshad stong du mchis par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:305a-32: gi'u wang gi ril bu khar bsres la lag pa
K12D0686_H0689:305a-33: g-yas pas yungs kar gyis don yod lcags kyu bzlas
K12D0686_H0689:305b-0: nas drangs te tshig gzhan mi smra bar gnas @305b
K12D0686_H0689:305b-1: mthon por 'dzegs te phyogs gang du bsam pa'i skye
K12D0686_H0689:305b-4: bu mo mchis pa'i phyogs der yungs kar gyis gtor na /
K12D0686_H0689:305b-5: mod la bkug par 'gyur te; mchis par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:305b-6: gal te dpag tshad brgya tsam na gnas pa zhig
K12D0686_H0689:305b-7: na yang gang gdon mi 'tshal bar de zhag gsum
K12D0686_H0689:305b-11: lag pa g-yon pa la gi'u wang gi ril bu btags na /
K12D0686_H0689:305b-12: gang du reg par nor dang /
K12D0686_H0689:305b-22: lhab lhub de dag thams cad bkug nas mchi bar 'gyur te /
K12D0686_H0689:305b-23: ci 'tshal ba de mchi bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:305b-24: bya tshang du zhugs nas tshang mang gi sgor thal mo brdabs na /
K12D0686_H0689:305b-26: 'tshed pa'i kha zas de dag thams cad bkug nas mchis par 'gyur te /
K12D0686_H0689:305b-27: gang du 'tshal ba der mchi bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:305b-28: spos 'tshong gi tshong khang du mchis na /
K12D0686_H0689:305b-29: tshong khang gi yo byad thams cad mchi bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:305b-30: chang tshong gi sgor thal mo brdabs na /
K12D0686_H0689:305b-31: chang gi bum pa thams cad mchi bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:305b-32: bang ba'i sgor thal mo brdabs na /
K12D0686_H0689:305b-34: bcud 'byin pa'i khyim du zhugs nas 'khrul 'khor la reg par bgyid na /
K12D0686_H0689:305b-35: bu ram gyi khu ba dang /
K12D0686_H0689:306a-2: gang du 'tshal ba der mngags par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:306a-3: grong khyer gyi sgor mun tshab tshub na thal mo brdabs na /
K12D0686_H0689:306a-4: grong khyer na gnas pa thams cad gnyid dkrogs par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:306a-7: mtshon cha mkhan gyi khyim du 'phangs na /
K12D0686_H0689:306a-9: go cha rnams rengs pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:306a-14: sems can gdug pa thams cad bcings pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:306a-17: dung la byugs nas mthon por bus na /
K12D0686_H0689:306a-18: sgra gang du grags pa de dag tu 'thab pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:306a-25: nad las yongs su thar par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:306a-26: grong khyer gyi sgor bus na /
K12D0686_H0689:306a-29: mi ngas thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:306a-32: gang du 'tshal ba der mchi bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:306a-33: ra lug gi lhas su bus na /
K12D0686_H0689:306a-34: ra lug gi 'o ma 'phrog bar 'gyur te /
K12D0686_H0689:306a-35: gar 'tshal ba der mchi bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:306a-36: skye bo'i tshogs chen po'i dbus su bus na /
K12D0686_H0689:306a-37: thams cad sgren mor gyur nas gos thams cad bkug par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:306b-0: rdza rnga la byugs @306b te khyams mthon po'i steng du brdungs na /
K12D0686_H0689:306b-3: ser ba thams cad bcings pa dang bshig par 'gyur te /
K12D0686_H0689:306b-5: dpag tshad brgya khor khor yug tu ser ba bkag par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:306b-6: grong khyer ram yul 'khor mtha' dag tu bus na /
K12D0686_H0689:306b-10: 'tshe ba thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:306b-14: 'gyed pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:306b-16: mu ge'i 'jigs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:306b-17: gzhan yang dgos pa rnam pa sna tshogs brgya stong dag bgyid par 'gyur te /
K12D0686_H0689:306b-18: thams cad la sbyar bar bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:306b-19: de nas sems can thams cad dang thun mong ba zhi ba dang /
K12D0686_H0689:306b-20: rgyas pa nad thams cad zhi bar bgyid cing sdig pa thams cad 'jig par bgyid pa /
K12D0686_H0689:306b-22: gnod pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa /
K12D0686_H0689:306b-23: mu ge'i dgon pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa /
K12D0686_H0689:306b-28: brjed byed thams cad brlag par bgyid pa brjod par bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:306b-29: rig sngags 'chang gtsang mar gyur pas legs par khrus bgyis te spos dri zhim pos lus byugs la /
K12D0686_H0689:306b-30: gos gtsang ma bgos la spos dri zhim pos bsgos nas byams pa'i sems la mnyam par bzhag cing /
K12D0686_H0689:307a-1: cad la lhag par brtse ba dang /
K12D0686_H0689:307a-2: snying rje chen pos snying gdungs pas sbyin sreg gi las 'di bgyi ste /
K12D0686_H0689:307a-5: shing 'o ma can nam ji ltar yang byang chub kyi shing ste /
K12D0686_H0689:307a-6: de dag gi yam sreg shing gis me sbar la 'bras yos dang /
K12D0686_H0689:307a-13: mar dang bsres pas sbyin sreg bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:307a-14: don yod zhags pa'i snying po stong rtsa brgyad bzlas
K12D0686_H0689:307a-15: nas de nas don yod zhags pa khro bo'i rgyal
K12D0686_H0689:307a-17: don yod zhags pa'i phyag rgyas phyag rgya lan brgya rtsa brgyad bcing ngo //
K12D0686_H0689:307a-18: de nas sbyin sreg gi dgos pa rnams mthar phyin
K12D0686_H0689:307a-19: pa'i mod kho nar dpag tshad gcig khor yug tu
K12D0686_H0689:307a-24: mu ge'i dgon pa mi bzad pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:307a-26: gzhan gyi dpung gi 'jigs pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:307a-28: mi mdza' ba'i 'jigs pa thams cad dang /
K12D0686_H0689:307a-32: gcan gzan gdug pa can dang /
K12D0686_H0689:307a-35: gdug pa dang bcas pa'i srog chags kyi 'jigs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:307a-37: dpag tshad brgyar khor yug tu rims mi 'byung ste /
K12D0686_H0689:307b-5: gdon rnams kyis mi tshugs te /
K12D0686_H0689:307b-16: sdigs pa rnams kyis mi tshugs te /
K12D0686_H0689:307b-18: sems can thams cad bde bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:307b-19: shin tu lo legs shing mdangs dga' la skye bo dang /
K12D0686_H0689:307b-20: mi mang pos rab tu gang zhing me tog dang /
K12D0686_H0689:307b-21: 'bras bu phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:307b-24: lo tog rab tu mang po 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:307b-25: shin tu ro dang ldan pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:307b-34: 'bras bu bzang po yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:307b-35: phyir zhing ji srid 'tsho'i bar du yul de na
K12D0686_H0689:307b-36: yid du mi mchi ba'i reg pa myong bar mi
K12D0686_H0689:307b-37: 'gyur ro // yul de na dge sbyong dang /
K12D0686_H0689:307b-45: bu mo rnams rtag tu nad ma mchis par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:307b-47: yid la dga' zhing mgu bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:307b-49: snying rje'i sems kyis gnas par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:308a-5: lto 'phye chen po de dag thams cad kyang legs par bsrung ba'i phyir rtag tu srung ba dang /
K12D0686_H0689:308a-7: sba ba'i phyir dpag tshad brgya kho ra khor yug tu srung ba dang /
K12D0686_H0689:308a-10: bde legs su bgyid par 'gyur ro //

K12D0686_H0689:310b-0: @310b 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi dpral

K12D0686_H0689:312b-12: // na / rig sngags 'chang des spos chab des

K12D0686_H0689:312b-14: brjod bgyis te byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan

K12D0686_H0689:313b-1: g-yon na khro bo'i rgyal po gdong gyen du lta ba khro bo'i gzugs lag pa drug pa /
K12D0686_H0689:313b-2: 'od dpag med kyi dbu rgyan thogs pa /
K12D0686_H0689:313b-3: rgyan thams cad kyis klubs pa /
K12D0686_H0689:313b-4: thams cad ring bsrel dang bcas par bgyi ste /
K12D0686_H0689:313b-5: ri'i steng gi padma'i stan la mchis par bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:313b-6: gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos te dus gsum du
K12D0686_H0689:313b-7: khrus bgyis nas nyin zhag gcig mchis te rig sngags
K12D0686_H0689:313b-8: 'chang gis ba'i rnam lngas nye reg bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:313b-9: chab dang yungs kar gyi dbang bskur bas dbang bskur bar bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:313b-10: snying rje chen pos gdungs pa'i snying gis blta bar bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:313b-11: gal te 'di lta bu'i tshogs mi bgyid na /
K12D0686_H0689:313b-12: bklags pa tsam gyi mod la yang 'grub par 'gyur na /
K12D0686_H0689:313b-13: bzlas brjod kyi las kyi cho gas lta smos kyang ci 'tshal /
K12D0686_H0689:313b-14: yang rig sngags 'chang gang zhig gangg'a'i klung bye ba
K12D0686_H0689:313b-15: phrag brgyad cu rtsa brgyad kyi bye ma dang mnyam
K12D0686_H0689:313b-16: pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
K12D0686_H0689:313b-17: par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la mchod par 'tshal lam
K12D0686_H0689:313b-19: dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya chen po skyed par 'tshal lam /
K12D0686_H0689:313b-20: sems can thams cad dge ba'i rtsa ba la rab tu bzhag par 'tshal ba'am /
K12D0686_H0689:313b-21: thams cad kyi sgrib pa rnam par dag par bgyi bar 'tshal na /
K12D0686_H0689:313b-22: rig sngags 'chang des dge slong pha'am /
K12D0686_H0689:314a-3: gzhan su yang rung bas thams cad cho ga 'di bzhin bgyis te /
K12D0686_H0689:314a-4: des ci 'byor ba'i gser las don yod pa'i zhags pa'i gzugs brnyan bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:314a-5: de nas kha shar phyogs su bstan te bzhag la gur gum gyi dkyil 'khor bgyis te /
K12D0686_H0689:314a-6: gru bzhi cha 'byes par li khris thig gdab par bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:314a-7: dkyil 'khor dbus su padma'i phreng ba bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:314a-8: padma'i phreng ba'i dbus su ril ba spyi blugs dang /
K12D0686_H0689:314a-10: me tog sna tshogs kyis mdzes par bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:314a-11: spos chab kyis bkang ba'i bum pa me tog ci
K12D0686_H0689:314a-12: 'byor pas legs par brgyan pa bzhi gzhag par bgyi'o
K12D0686_H0689:314a-13: // mchod yon gyi snod lnga gzhag par bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:314a-14: pog phor lnga las aa ga ru'i bdug pas bdug par bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:314a-15: dris bsgos pa'i mar me bcu drug sbar bar bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:314a-16: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod par bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:314a-20: phreng ba yang dbul bar bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:314a-21: 'jig rten dbang phyug gi mdun du skyil mo krung
K12D0686_H0689:314a-22: bcas te mchis nas don yod zhags pa'i phyag rgya
K12D0686_H0689:314a-23: bcings te bdag nyid la dbang bskur bar bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:314a-24: khro bo'i rgyal po lan gcig bzla bar bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:314a-25: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la dmigs pa yid
K12D0686_H0689:314a-26: la bgyis nas phyogs bcur yid kyis mchod cing phyag
K12D0686_H0689:314b-0: @314b bgyi'o; ;bzlas brjod kyi phyag rgya bcings te bzlas
K12D0686_H0689:314b-1: brjod bgyi'o // bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad bgyis pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:314b-2: sa chen po g-yo bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:314b-3: bdag nyid dga' bar gyur nas 'bar bar mthong ngo //
K12D0686_H0689:314b-4: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyang zhal
K12D0686_H0689:314b-5: mngon sum du ston pa nye bar ston par 'gyur
K12D0686_H0689:314b-6: ro // 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ral pa'i gseb 'bar bar gyur nas legs so //
K12D0686_H0689:314b-7: zhes bgyi ba'i sgra 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:314b-8: lan brgya rtsa brgyad lan gnyis bzlas brjod bgyis na /
K12D0686_H0689:314b-9: grub pa chen po'i rtags ston par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:314b-10: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi phyag brkyang
K12D0686_H0689:314b-11: nas rig sngags 'chang gi spyi bor 'jog par 'gyur
K12D0686_H0689:314b-12: ro // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gzigs pa
K12D0686_H0689:314b-13: zhes bgyi ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro
K12D0686_H0689:314b-14: ro // // don yod zhags pa grub pa'i rig sngags 'chang bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:314b-15: nyi ma'i rtse na de bzhin gshegs pa de dag
K12D0686_H0689:314b-16: kyang mthong bar gyur nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams
K12D0686_H0689:314b-18: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:314b-19: brgya rtsa brgyad pa lan gsum bzlas na /
K12D0686_H0689:314b-20: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs skya
K12D0686_H0689:314b-21: rengs 'char ka'i dus su mdun du mchis nas padma
K12D0686_H0689:314b-22: dri ma med pa zhes bgyi bgyi ba'i zhags pa
K12D0686_H0689:315a-2: rgyal ba 'od dpag med kyang legs so //
K12D0686_H0689:315a-3: zhes bgyi ba stsol bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:315a-4: gang su yang rung bas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs mthong na /
K12D0686_H0689:315a-6: de bzhin gshegs pa drug khri la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:315a-7: de la lha thams cad dang /
K12D0686_H0689:315a-8: tshangs pa la sogs te dbang phyug dang /
K12D0686_H0689:315a-9: dbang phyug chen po'i lha'i bu rnams rtag tu lta 'tshal bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:315a-10: nad thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:315a-11: mchog thams cad yongs su rdzogs nas rtag tu rjes su 'brang zhing srung ba dang /
K12D0686_H0689:315a-14: sdig pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:315a-15: 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po /
K12D0686_H0689:315a-17: des ci 'byor ba'i gser la 'phags pa spyan ras
K12D0686_H0689:315a-18: gzigs dbang phyug don yod pa'i zhags pa byas la
K12D0686_H0689:315a-19: de nas zhal shar phyogs su bstan te bzhag la
K12D0686_H0689:315a-20: gur gum gyi dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa legs par
K12D0686_H0689:315a-21: 'byes pa byas te li khris thig btab la dkyil
K12D0686_H0689:315a-23: padma'i dbus su ril pa bhring ka ra dang /
K12D0686_H0689:315a-24: bgrang phreng bri; me tog sna tshogs bkam la bum
K12D0686_H0689:315a-25: pa spos chus bkang la me tog ci 'byor pas
K12D0686_H0689:315a-26: legs par brgyan pa bzhi gzhag mchod yon gyi snod
K12D0686_H0689:315b-0: pog phor @315b lnga nas aa ga ru'i bdug pas bdug par bya'o //
K12D0686_H0689:315b-1: spos sna bcu drug dang ldan pa'i til mar gyi
K12D0686_H0689:315b-2: mar me bltams te 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
K12D0686_H0689:315b-3: phyug la mchod pa bya zhing /
K12D0686_H0689:315b-7: phreng ba dag kyang dbul bar bya'o //
K12D0686_H0689:315b-8: 'jig rten dbang phyug la mngon du phyogs te skyil
K12D0686_H0689:315b-9: mo krung bcas la don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag
K12D0686_H0689:315b-10: rgya bcings la bdag nyid la dbang bskur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:315b-11: khro bo'i rgyal po lan gcig bzlas la phyogs bcu'i
K12D0686_H0689:315b-12: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yid la byas te
K12D0686_H0689:315b-14: lus kyis kyang phyag byas te bzlas brjod kyi phyag rgya bcings la bzlas brjod bya'o //
K12D0686_H0689:315b-15: brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pas sa chen po g-yo bar
K12D0686_H0689:315b-16: 'gyur zhing bdag nyid snying dga' la 'bar bar snang
K12D0686_H0689:315b-17: ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad zhal nye bar ston par mdzad do //
K12D0686_H0689:315b-18: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi dbu ral
K12D0686_H0689:315b-19: pa'i gseb 'bar zhing legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra
K12D0686_H0689:315b-20: 'byung ngo // brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pa gnyis pas ni /
K12D0686_H0689:315b-21: dngos grub chen po'i mtshan ma ston to //
K12D0686_H0689:315b-22: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi phyag brkyang
K12D0686_H0689:315b-23: ste rig sngags 'chang gi mgo'i spyi bor 'jog par
K12D0686_H0689:315b-24: 'gyur ro // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la
K12D0686_H0689:315b-25: rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
K12D0686_H0689:316a-0: rig sngags 'chang la don yod pa'i zhags @316a *//
K12D0686_H0689:316a-2: tho rangs de bzhin gshegs pa de dag zhal ston par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:316a-3: sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad ston par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:316a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:316a-5: bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad gsum pas ni /
K12D0686_H0689:316a-6: skya rengs shar ba'i dus kyi tshe 'phags pa spyan
K12D0686_H0689:316a-7: ras gzigs dbang phyug rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na
K12D0686_H0689:316a-8: bzhugs te / padma'i dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i zhags pa sbyin par mdzad cing /
K12D0686_H0689:316a-9: dngos grub thams cad sbyin par mdzad do //
K12D0686_H0689:316a-10: rgyal ba 'od dpag med legs so; ;zhes bya ba sbyin par mdzad do //
K12D0686_H0689:316a-11: gang la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi skur bstan pa ste /
K12D0686_H0689:316a-12: de bzhin gshegs pa stong phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:316a-14: tshangs pa la sogs pa dbang phyug dang /
K12D0686_H0689:316a-16: lha'i bu rnams rtag tu lus ston 'dod par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:316a-17: nad thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:316a-18: mchog thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:316a-19: rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang zhing srung ba dang /
K12D0686_H0689:316a-22: sdig pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:316a-23: de nas dngul las 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
K12D0686_H0689:316a-24: phyug don yod pa'i zhags pa'i gzugs snga ma bzhin
K12D0686_H0689:316b-0: du byas pa la tsandan @316b dkar po'i dkyil 'khor
K12D0686_H0689:316b-1: du tsandan dkar po'i dri chab kyis bkang ba gzhag
K12D0686_H0689:316b-2: par bya zhing mchod yon gyi snod lnga gzhag par
K12D0686_H0689:316b-3: bgyi'o // me tog sna tshogs bkram zhing tsandan dkar
K12D0686_H0689:316b-4: po'i bdug spos kyis bdugs te 'phags pa spyan ras
K12D0686_H0689:316b-5: gzigs dbang phyug la mchod par bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:316b-6: dri sna bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa'i til mar gyi mar me bltam par bya zhing /
K12D0686_H0689:316b-7: bdug spos kyi snod bzhi bcu gzhag par bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:316b-8: khro bo'i rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas
K12D0686_H0689:316b-9: brjod byas la rig sngags 'chang gtsang mas gos gtsang
K12D0686_H0689:316b-10: ma bgos te don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya
K12D0686_H0689:316b-12: bzlas brjod kyi phyag rgya byas te skyil mo krung
K12D0686_H0689:316b-13: du 'dug la lag pa g-yon pa'i mdzub mo brkyang
K12D0686_H0689:316b-14: pa padma'i tshul du byas la bzlas brjod lan brgya
K12D0686_H0689:316b-15: rtsa brgyad bya'o // lan brgya rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang /
K12D0686_H0689:316b-16: shar phyogs nas legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra grag par 'gyur zhing bdag nyid dga' bar snang ngo //
K12D0686_H0689:316b-17: rgyal po blon po dang btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas
K12D0686_H0689:316b-18: pa dbang du gyur te ming brjod pas dpag tshad
K12D0686_H0689:316b-20: thams cad kyis bgyi ba ci mchis zhes bran bzhin du 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:316b-21: gang bsgo ba de byed bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:316b-22: de nyid bla mar 'gyur zhing cher mchod par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:316b-23: brgya rtsa brgyad lan gnyis bzlas pas brgya byin dang /
K12D0686_H0689:317a-4: rlung lha la sogs pa dbang du 'gyur zhing bsgo ba bzhin byed par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:317a-5: gang bsgo ba byed par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:317a-6: rgyal po bzhi 'khor gnod sbyin gyi tshogs dang bcas pa rnams dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:317a-7: brgya rtsa brgyad lan gsum bzlas pas nyi ma dang
K12D0686_H0689:317a-8: zla ba nam mkha' las 'bab cing mdun na 'dug
K12D0686_H0689:317a-9: par 'gyur ro // mtshan mo'i lha dang nam mkha'i
K12D0686_H0689:317a-10: lha 'ongs nas mdun na 'dug par 'gyur zhing dbang
K12D0686_H0689:317a-11: par 'gyur ro // du 'gyur ro // thams cad
K12D0686_H0689:317a-12: ci bgyi zhes pa'i bya ba byed cing 'dug par
K12D0686_H0689:317a-14: // brgya rtsa brgyad lan bzhi bzlas pas klu thams
K12D0686_H0689:317a-15: cad dbang du byas par 'gyur te /
K12D0686_H0689:317a-16: rgya mtsho'i klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang /
K12D0686_H0689:317a-17: nye dga' bo la sogs pa'i bar thams cad dbang du byas par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:317a-18: zangs las byas pa'i 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
K12D0686_H0689:317a-19: phyug don yod pa'i zhags pa la tsandan dkar po'i
K12D0686_H0689:317a-21: me tog dmar po bkram la bdug spos kyi snod
K12D0686_H0689:317a-22: bzhi nas bdug par bya zhing mar gyi mar me
K12D0686_H0689:317a-23: lnga bcu rtsa gnyis bltam par bya'o //
K12D0686_H0689:317a-24: mchod yon gyi snod bzhi bzhag la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod par bya'o //
K12D0686_H0689:317a-25: khro bo'i rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig rjes su dran par bya'o //
K12D0686_H0689:317a-26: don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya bcing bar bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:317b-0: ras @317b la bris pa'i sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar
K12D0686_H0689:317b-1: skyil mo krung du 'dug ste sems can thams cad
K12D0686_H0689:317b-2: la dmigs pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yid
K12D0686_H0689:317b-3: la bya'o // phyogs bzhir byams pa'i lta bas blta bar bya'o //
K12D0686_H0689:317b-7: yi dvags kyi yul thams cad yid la bya'o //
K12D0686_H0689:317b-8: sems can dmyal ba chen po brgyad yid la bya zhing snying rje'i sems kyis blta bar bya'o //
K12D0686_H0689:317b-9: bzlas brjod kyi phyag rgya padma'i tshul du bcings te bzlas brjod bya'o //
K12D0686_H0689:317b-10: brgya rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang /
K12D0686_H0689:317b-11: phyogs bzhi g-yo zhing sgra grags par 'gyur la dmyal
K12D0686_H0689:317b-12: ba ba'i sems can de dag thams cad yongs su
K12D0686_H0689:317b-14: dmyal ba'i sgo thams cad bcad par 'gyur zhing bcom pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:317b-16: dmyal ba'i sems can de dag bde 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:317b-17: bdag nyid kyang byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar
K12D0686_H0689:317b-18: du dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba thams cad
K12D0686_H0689:317b-19: las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:317b-20: lus kyang mtshan bzang pos brgyan par 'gyur zhing /
K12D0686_H0689:317b-21: sems can gang dag gis mthong ba de dag thams cad phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:317b-22: brgya rtsa brgyad lan gnyis bzlas brjod byas pas ni /
K12D0686_H0689:317b-23: sa'i 'og gi sems can mun nag pa snang ba
K12D0686_H0689:317b-24: dang bral ba de dag don yod pa'i zhags pa'i
K12D0686_H0689:318a-1: nag dang bral bar 'gyur zhing 'od zer 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:318a-2: yongs su grol ba'i sems can de dag 'phags pa
K12D0686_H0689:318a-3: spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gnas su brdzus te
K12D0686_H0689:318a-5: dga' ba dang 'chi ba spangs par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:318a-6: byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar du kun nas
K12D0686_H0689:318a-7: mthu 'phags pa dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i
K12D0686_H0689:318a-8: ting nge 'dzin 'thob par 'gyur zhing tshe bskal ba
K12D0686_H0689:318a-10: shi nas bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skye bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:318a-11: byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar du de nyid
K12D0686_H0689:318a-12: kyi zhabs kyi drung na gnas par 'gyur zhing mya
K12D0686_H0689:318a-13: ngan thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:318a-17: spos kyi rigs sna tshogs gzhan dag phye ma zhib mor byas te /
K12D0686_H0689:318a-22: chu dang lhan cig sbyar te sha kha ra btab
K12D0686_H0689:318a-23: la legs par btags pa las 'phags pa spyan ras
K12D0686_H0689:318a-24: gzigs dbang phyug don yod pa'i zhags pa sor bzhi
K12D0686_H0689:318a-25: pa'i tshad du byas te rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan
K12D0686_H0689:318a-26: pa / ral ba'i thor tshugs dang /
K12D0686_H0689:318a-27: ae na ya'i pags pa bsnams pa /
K12D0686_H0689:318a-28: phyugs bdag gi cha lugs 'dzin pa /
K12D0686_H0689:318a-29: phyag bzhi gcig na padma thogs /
K12D0686_H0689:318b-1: gdan padma 'od kyi dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gis brgyan par bya ste /
K12D0686_H0689:318b-4: 'jig rten dbang phyug gi 'og tu ni /
K12D0686_H0689:318b-8: de nas rig sngags 'chang gtsang mas gos gtsang ma

K12D0686_H0689:329b-9: thod pa'i rus pas gang ba dang /
K12D0686_H0689:329b-10: shi ba'i ro rnams spangs pa'i sa gzhi'i phyogs na mtshe'u dang /
K12D0686_H0689:329b-12: 'bab chu byang phyogs nas 'bab pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:329b-13: nye ba na chu yod cing shin tu mdzes pa /
K12D0686_H0689:329b-17: shar phyogs gang na ljon shing gis mdzes par byas pa /
K12D0686_H0689:329b-20: gzi byin du ldan pa'i gnas de lta bu rnyed nas chu dang /
K12D0686_H0689:329b-21: yungs kar la bzlas te kun tu gtor ro //
K12D0686_H0689:329b-22: sa gzhi de lta bu sbyang ba ni /
K12D0686_H0689:329b-24: khro bo'i rgyal pos yungs kar la lan nyi shu
K12D0686_H0689:329b-25: rtsa gcig bzlas te phyogs bzhir gtor nas kun nas
K12D0686_H0689:329b-26: dpag tshad brgya tshun chad phyogs bcing ba dang /
K12D0686_H0689:329b-28: mtshams bcing ba byas par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:329b-31: log 'dren thams cad kyi skad cig kyang mi gnas par phyogs bzhir byer te dong ngo //
K12D0686_H0689:329b-34: sdang ba'i gcan gzan khro bo gang yin pa de
K12D0686_H0689:329b-35: dag thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur zhing lha
K12D0686_H0689:329b-37: gnas kyi phyogs der mkhas pas dkyil 'khor bya ste /
K12D0686_H0689:329b-38: gru bzhi lham pa ngos re re zhing khru sum cu rtsa gnyis gzhal bar bya ste /
K12D0686_H0689:330a-1: pa gru bzhi cha mnyam zhing mdzes la sgo bzhi dang /
K12D0686_H0689:330a-3: 'bras kyi phye ma'i tshon sna bzhir sbyar la de nas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya ste /
K12D0686_H0689:330a-4: tshon sna lnga'i thig skud kyis thig btab nas tsandan
K12D0686_H0689:330a-5: dkar po'i phur bu btab ste zla ba yar gyi
K12D0686_H0689:330a-7: tshes bco lnga'i tshes grangs dang /
K12D0686_H0689:330a-8: rgyu skar bzang po gdams te dkyil 'khor gyi mchog bri par bya'o //
K12D0686_H0689:330a-16: nam mkha'i kha dog gis so //
K12D0686_H0689:330a-18: mig sman gyi kha dog gis te /
K12D0686_H0689:330a-19: dkyil 'khor gyi dbus kyi snying po 'jigs pa med
K12D0686_H0689:330a-20: par cha rnam par mdzes shing gsal bar pir gsar
K12D0686_H0689:330a-22: snod gsar pas bri bar bya ste; dkyil 'khor gyi
K12D0686_H0689:330a-23: snying por padma 'dab ma stong pa khor khor yug
K12D0686_H0689:330a-24: stegs bu dang bcas pa bri zhing /
K12D0686_H0689:330a-25: padma'i phreng ba tshon gyis mdzes pa bris la /
K12D0686_H0689:330a-26: de'i dbus su sangs rgyas bcom ldan thub pa chen po sh'akya'i rgyal po dang /
K12D0686_H0689:330a-28: 'jig rten dbang po'i rgyal po gzhag go /
K12D0686_H0689:330a-29: g-yas su mgon po 'jig rten dbang phyug don yod
K12D0686_H0689:330a-30: pa'i zhags pa'i cha byad 'chang ba gsang sngags kyi
K12D0686_H0689:330a-32: g-yon du phyag na rdo rje rnga yab dang rdo rje thogs pa bzhin khro gnyer can /
K12D0686_H0689:330b-0: @330b 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi drung du lha mo sgrol ma dang /
K12D0686_H0689:330b-2: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi 'og tu dkar sham chen po dang /
K12D0686_H0689:330b-4: dkar mo chen mo lag na dbyug pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:330b-5: ril ba spyi blugs thogs pa'o //
K12D0686_H0689:330b-6: de'i 'og tu srin mo ral pa gcig pa mche ba gtsigs pa /
K12D0686_H0689:330b-7: thod pa'i phreng ba thogs pa /
K12D0686_H0689:330b-8: sbrul gyi mchod phyir thogs pa /
K12D0686_H0689:330b-10: lag pa g-yas pa g-yon gnyis na rdo rje dang /
K12D0686_H0689:330b-12: g-yas pa'i gung mo lha dang log 'dren la bsdigs par bya'o //
K12D0686_H0689:330b-13: g-yon du 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bram
K12D0686_H0689:330b-14: ze'i cha lugs 'chang ba ral pa'i tho tshugs kyis
K12D0686_H0689:330b-15: bzhugs pa / 'od dpag med kyi thor tshugs kyis brgyan pa bya'o //
K12D0686_H0689:330b-16: g-yas g-yon du dbang phyug dang dbang phyug chen po bya'o //
K12D0686_H0689:330b-17: de'i 'og tu dpal lha mo dang /
K12D0686_H0689:330b-18: lha mo dbyangs can ma dang /
K12D0686_H0689:330b-21: lo tog gi lha mo dang /
K12D0686_H0689:330b-22: 'bras bu dang me tog gi lha mo bya'o //
K12D0686_H0689:330b-23: de'i 'og tu khor yug tu gshin rje dang /
K12D0686_H0689:330b-25: rlung lha la sogs pa bya'o //
K12D0686_H0689:330b-26: ral pa'i thor tshugs kyis brgyan pa'i drang srong gzhag par bya'o //
K12D0686_H0689:330b-27: grar rgyal po bzhi go cha bgos pa gzhag par bya'o //
K12D0686_H0689:330b-28: dkyil 'khor gyi snying po'i dbus dang bar bar du lcags kyu dang /
K12D0686_H0689:331a-2: phyi rol tu tshangs pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:331a-5: tshangs pa'i drung du lha dbyangs ldan ma khros pa'i
K12D0686_H0689:331a-6: gzugs can no; ;de dag gnyis kyi bar du dbyug
K12D0686_H0689:331a-7: pa dang / ril ba spyi blugs bri bar bya'o //
K12D0686_H0689:331a-8: grva gcig tu don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po
K12D0686_H0689:331a-9: rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi chos kyi rnam
K12D0686_H0689:331a-10: grangs gzhag go / grva gcig tu shi b'a ba ha gzhag go /
K12D0686_H0689:331a-11: de nas shar phyogs kyi sgor khro bo rta mgrin 'jigs su rung ba'i mig can gzhag go //
K12D0686_H0689:331a-12: lho phyogs kyi sgor rdo rje chen po ki li
K12D0686_H0689:331a-13: ki li zhes bya ba rdo rje rnam par 'dren
K12D0686_H0689:331a-14: pa / lag na rdo rje dang /
K12D0686_H0689:331a-17: nub phyogs kyi sgor pho nya mo padma rigs mdzes
K12D0686_H0689:331a-18: ma lag pa padma'i rtse mo nas 'dzin par bya'o
K12D0686_H0689:331a-19: // byang phyogs kyi sgor rdo rje chen po zom zhes bya ba'i tshogs lag na rdo rje dang /
K12D0686_H0689:331a-21: de nas 'jug pa'i sgo nas gser gyi bum pa
K12D0686_H0689:331a-22: spos chus bkang ste dar las bcings la rnam pa
K12D0686_H0689:331a-23: thams cad dang / me tog gi phreng bas brgyan
K12D0686_H0689:331a-24: nas bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du dkyil 'khor
K12D0686_H0689:331a-25: gyi dbus su bzhag ste steng du sna ma'i me
K12D0686_H0689:331a-26: tog gi gdu bu gzhag par bya'o //
K12D0686_H0689:331a-31: pog phor bzhi bzhag cing aa ga ru'i bdug pas bdug go /
K12D0686_H0689:331b-0: tshon sna lnga'i ras kyi @331b srad bu mchod phyir
K12D0686_H0689:331b-1: gyi srad bu tshad du byas la gser gyi yang
K12D0686_H0689:331b-2: mig rtse gsum can gdags par bya zhing /
K12D0686_H0689:331b-3: thor to gcig tu me tog padma'i gdub 'khor dang /
K12D0686_H0689:331b-5: rin po ches spras pa zlum por bskyil ba bum pa'i steng du bzhag la mchod pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:331b-6: bsnyen bkur byas te yungs dkar la don yod pa'i
K12D0686_H0689:331b-7: zhags pa'i snying po lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te
K12D0686_H0689:331b-8: de la gdab par bya'o; ;tsandan dang /
K12D0686_H0689:331b-10: gla rtsi'i phye mas bgos la bgo bar bya'o //
K12D0686_H0689:331b-11: sgo bzhi'i gnas su dri chab kyis bkang ba'i bum pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:331b-12: zas dkar gsum gyi gtor ma gzhag par bya zhing /
K12D0686_H0689:331b-13: gser dngul gyi mchod yon gyi snod sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /
K12D0686_H0689:331b-14: spos chus bkang ba brgyad dang /
K12D0686_H0689:331b-15: spos chu dkar pos bkang ba brgyad gzhag par bya'o //
K12D0686_H0689:331b-17: dri sna tshogs kyis bkang ba brgyad dang /
K12D0686_H0689:331b-20: spos chus bkang ba brgyad dang /
K12D0686_H0689:331b-21: gtor ma la sogs pa dbul ba sna brgyad dang /
K12D0686_H0689:331b-22: dbul ba sna drug cu rtsa bzhi ba rnams sha dang /
K12D0686_H0689:331b-27: btung ba ngan pa spangs te gtsang mas gtsang ma sbyar bar bya'o //
K12D0686_H0689:331b-28: me tog sna tshogs kyi gcal dgram par bya zhing /
K12D0686_H0689:331b-32: ba dan gyis brgyan par bya /
K12D0686_H0689:331b-33: pog por sum cu rtsa gnyis gzhag par bya zhing bdug spos sna tshogs mang pos bdug par bya /
K12D0686_H0689:332a-0: spos sna brgyad dang ldan pa'i til mar @332a *//
K12D0686_H0689:332a-1: gyi mar me bltam par bya /
K12D0686_H0689:332a-2: dkyil 'khor gyi khor yug tu padma'i phreng ba bri bar bya'o //
K12D0686_H0689:332a-3: rig sngags 'chang gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgo bar bya zhing /
K12D0686_H0689:332a-4: dus gsum du khrus byas la gos gsum bgo bar bya /
K12D0686_H0689:332a-5: grogs gtsang ma bsgrub par bya'o //
K12D0686_H0689:332a-6: 'jug pa'i cho ga byas pa nas don yod pa'i
K12D0686_H0689:332a-7: zhags pa'i snying pos dbang bskur ba'i bar tsam gyis
K12D0686_H0689:332a-8: sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yongs su bzung zhing 'jig
K12D0686_H0689:332a-9: rten mgon pos byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:332a-10: padma'i rigs padma 'chang ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po don
K12D0686_H0689:332a-11: yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i dngos grub la mngon
K12D0686_H0689:332a-13: gang bsam pa thams cad de kho na bzhin byed par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:332a-14: dam tshig thams cad la don yod par 'jug go //
K12D0686_H0689:332a-15: chos nyid thams cad kyi rnam par grol ba'i dkyil
K12D0686_H0689:332a-16: 'khor gyi chos la dam tshig grub par 'gyur ro
K12D0686_H0689:332a-17: // las kyi sgrib pa thams cad las rnam par grol ba dang /
K12D0686_H0689:332a-18: bde ba thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro zhing /
K12D0686_H0689:332a-20: mi'i dpal thams cad myong bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:332a-24: srin po'i tshogs kyi bgo skal la dbang bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:332a-26: gsang sngags la brten par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:332b-3: dbang du bya bas mi tshugs so //
K12D0686_H0689:332b-4: gang dag de lta bu byed pa de nyid kyi
K12D0686_H0689:332b-5: lus sam mgo la brgya phrag stong 'gyur du 'bab
K12D0686_H0689:332b-6: par 'gyur zhing gzhan gyis phyir bzlas cing dgrol bar
K12D0686_H0689:332b-7: mi nus te / rig sngags 'chang des dgrol bar bya'o //
K12D0686_H0689:332b-8: de nas rig sngags 'chang des ri mo'i gzugs de
K12D0686_H0689:332b-9: dkyil 'khor la mngon du phyogs par bzhag nas don
K12D0686_H0689:332b-10: yod pa'i snying po stong rtsa brgyad bzlas la don
K12D0686_H0689:332b-11: yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya lan brgya rtsa brgyad
K12D0686_H0689:332b-13: khro bo'i rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzla bar bya'o //
K12D0686_H0689:332b-14: de'i 'og tu dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams las 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:332b-15: bum pa de yang 'bar la ras kyi sku gzugs
K12D0686_H0689:332b-16: de yang kha dog sna bdun du 'bar zhing shas
K12D0686_H0689:332b-18: khro bo'i rig sngags 'chang snying dga' bar 'gyur zhing
K12D0686_H0689:332b-19: ras kyi sku gzugs las legs so zhes bya ba'i
K12D0686_H0689:332b-23: khyod kyis 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug don
K12D0686_H0689:332b-24: yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po grub cing khyod kyis
K12D0686_H0689:332b-26: khyod kyis yid bzhin gyi nor bu zhags pa'i mchog 'di yang grub kyi /
K12D0686_H0689:333a-0: de dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa chog grub nas bum pa spos chus bkang ba de @333a *//
K12D0686_H0689:333a-1: blangs la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te rgyu skar
K12D0686_H0689:333a-2: rgyal la khrus byas pa'am zla ba yar gyi ngo'i
K12D0686_H0689:333a-3: tshes grangs shis pa la khrus byas pa tsam gyi
K12D0686_H0689:333a-4: mod la lus thams cad dri ma med cing yongs
K12D0686_H0689:333a-6: dngos po lnga'i bdag nyid yongs su dag par 'gyur te rna ba lnga yongs su dag pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:333a-7: mig lnga yongs su dag pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:333a-8: sna lnga yongs su dag pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:333a-9: lce lnga yongs su dag pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:333a-10: rnam par shes pa lnga yongs su dag pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:333a-11: dbang po lnga yongs su dag pa 'thob par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:333a-12: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rtag tu mchog
K12D0686_H0689:333a-13: sbyin par 'gyur zhing rtag tu sku ston bzhed par
K12D0686_H0689:333a-14: yang 'gyur ro // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad zhal ston par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:333a-15: rtag tu byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dgongs par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:333a-16: lha thams cad kyang de la srung ba dang /
K12D0686_H0689:333a-20: tshangs pa la sogs pa dag kyang 'ong bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:333a-21: rgyal po bzhi dpung gi 'khor dang bcas te sa'i phyogs der 'ong bar 'gyur zhing /
K12D0686_H0689:333a-22: rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par srung ba dang /
K12D0686_H0689:333a-28: gsang ba ba brgya stong phrag du ma srung ba dang /
K12D0686_H0689:333b-4: shes pa don yod pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:333b-5: shes rab don yod pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:333b-8: brtson 'grus thob par 'gyur zhing sbyin pa don yod pa'i sbyin par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:333b-9: bsod nams kyi phung po don yod pa dang ldan par 'gyur zhing /
K12D0686_H0689:333b-11: pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:333b-12: rdzu 'phrul dpag tu med pa la mkhas par yang 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:333b-13: rig sngags 'chang gi cho ga zhib mo yang 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:333b-16: pha rol gnon pa don yod par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:333b-17: sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa 'thob par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:333b-18: de bzhin gshegs pa gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma sa
K12D0686_H0689:333b-19: ya snyed sa ya brgya phrag brgya stong drug cu
K12D0686_H0689:333b-20: rtsa bzhi'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su rdzogs pa
K12D0686_H0689:333b-21: yang dag par bzung bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:333b-22: sems can thams cad kyis kyang mchod pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:333b-23: bkur sti bya bar 'gyur zhing thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:333b-24: mchod rten gyi snying po dang 'dra bar phyag bya ba'i 'os su 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:333b-25: dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhib mo'o //
K12D0686_H0689:333b-26: 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po /
K12D0686_H0689:333b-28: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
K12D0686_H0689:333b-29: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stan las langs
K12D0686_H0689:334a-0: nas @334a *// bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar
K12D0686_H0689:334a-1: nas pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs
K12D0686_H0689:334a-2: te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su
K12D0686_H0689:334a-3: thal mo sbyar te btud nas bcom ldan 'das la
K12D0686_H0689:334a-4: lan gsum bskor ba byas te bcom ldan 'das kyi
K12D0686_H0689:334a-5: zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas nas bcom ldan 'das
K12D0686_H0689:334a-7: bcom ldan 'das; bdag la padma'i rigs la rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga /
K12D0686_H0689:334a-8: rig sngags chen po'i rim par phye ba cho ga
K12D0686_H0689:334a-9: zhib mo don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po rig
K12D0686_H0689:334a-10: sngags kyi rgyal po chen po mchis te /
K12D0686_H0689:334a-11: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar de bdag gis yongs su bsgrag par bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:334a-12: de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras
K12D0686_H0689:334a-13: gzigs dbang phyug bzhin 'dzum pas bcom ldan 'das la
K12D0686_H0689:334a-14: blta bzhin du don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po
K12D0686_H0689:334a-15: 'di smras so // na ma stree ya da dh'a nu ga ta pra ti shathi te bhya:/
K12D0686_H0689:334a-16: sarba buddha po dhi satva bhya:/
K12D0686_H0689:334a-17: na ma pra tye ka buddharya shra ba ka sam ghe bhya:/
K12D0686_H0689:334a-18: aa t'i t'a nu ga t'a pra tyud pan ne bhya:/
K12D0686_H0689:334a-19: na ma:samya kasam ga t'a n'a ma /
K12D0686_H0689:334a-20: na ma:sam myakasam pra ti pan n'a n'am/
K12D0686_H0689:334a-21: na ma: sh'a ra dva ti bu tra ya ma h'a ma ta ye /
K12D0686_H0689:334a-22: na ma: a'arya mee tre ya bra mu khe bha /
K12D0686_H0689:334a-23: ma h'a bo dhi satva a'arya ga na ba re bhya:/
K12D0686_H0689:334a-24: na ma: a'arya aa mi t'a bh'a ya ta th'a ga t'a ya aarha te samyakasam buddh'a ya /
K12D0686_H0689:334a-25: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12D0686_H0689:334b-0: na ma:a'ary'a @334b pa lo ki te shva r'a ya /
K12D0686_H0689:334b-3: ma h'a k'a ru ni k'a ya /
K12D0686_H0689:334b-4: ma h'a ri shi a'a rya gan pa re bhy'a:
K12D0686_H0689:334b-5: na m skri tv'a a'arya ba lo ki te shva
K12D0686_H0689:334b-6: ra mu khong+g'i rannam/ aa mo gha r'a dzan n'a ma hri da yan /
K12D0686_H0689:334b-7: ta th'a ga t'a sam mu kham bha shi ti ma h'a tav'am pa ram dhye /
K12D0686_H0689:334b-8: aa hi mi d'a n'i m'a bartti ya shya mi siddhyam tu me mantra pa d'a:sarba k'arya ni /
K12D0686_H0689:334b-9: sarbba bha ye bhyo ma ma sarbba satv'a n'a nytsa rakasha bha wa tu /
K12D0686_H0689:334b-14: ma h'a k'a ru ni ka /
K12D0686_H0689:334b-18: pa ra ma h'a k'a ru ni k'a /
K12D0686_H0689:334b-40: bi tsa la bi tsa la /
K12D0686_H0689:334b-41: ae ta ta ae ta ta /
K12D0686_H0689:334b-47: ma h'a pa shu pa ti be sha dha ra /

K12D0686_H0689:350b-6: cho ga zhib mo grub pa don yod pa'i rig
