K12D0686_H0689:350b-8: mchog cho ga dang yo byad du bcas pa bshad
K12D0686_H0689:350b-10: kun nas cha legs par phye ba /
K12D0686_H0689:350b-13: ri mo mkhan gtsang ma khrus byas pas gos gtsang
K12D0686_H0689:350b-14: ma bgos la gso sbyong dang ldan par byas pas
K12D0686_H0689:350b-15: tshon lhag ma ma yin pa snod gsar bar bzhag
K12D0686_H0689:350b-17: dbus su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ral
K12D0686_H0689:350b-18: ba'i thor tshugs kyis bzhugs shing rgyal ba 'od dpag
K12D0686_H0689:350b-20: thor tshugs kyi g-yas su zla tshes kyis brgyan pa /
K12D0686_H0689:350b-21: ri dvags ae na ya'i phags pa gyon pa /
K12D0686_H0689:350b-22: phyugs bdag gi cha lugs 'chang ba /
K12D0686_H0689:350b-23: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
K12D0686_H0689:350b-24: dbu gsum spyan gsum phyag bzhi pa /
K12D0686_H0689:350b-25: ri'i steng na padma'i gdan la bzhugs pa /
K12D0686_H0689:350b-26: zhal dbus ma zhi ba'i zhal bzhin 'dzum pa /
K12D0686_H0689:350b-27: zhal g-yas pa 'jigs su rung ba khro gnyer can /
K12D0686_H0689:350b-28: thor tshugs 'od dpag med kyis brgyan pa /
K12D0686_H0689:350b-29: dbu zla tshes kyis brgyan pa /
K12D0686_H0689:350b-30: zhal g-yon pa 'jigs su rung ba /
K12D0686_H0689:351a-2: rgyal ba 'od dpag med dbu la bzhugs pa /
K12D0686_H0689:351a-3: phyag gcig na padma thogs pa /
K12D0686_H0689:351a-4: gnyis pa rtse gsum thogs pa /
K12D0686_H0689:351a-5: gsum pa don yod zhags pa sku'i phyed na 'dzin
K12D0686_H0689:351a-6: pa la bcom ldan 'das zhal khro gnyer can don
K12D0686_H0689:351a-7: yod zhags pa'i phyag rgya bcings pa'i phyag la spyan
K12D0686_H0689:351a-9: bzhi pa dbugs 'byin pa'i phyag tu bya zhing /
K12D0686_H0689:351a-10: 'od 'dom gang ba khor yug 'bar ba dang ldan par bya'o //
K12D0686_H0689:351a-11: g-yas phyogs na lha mo sgrol ma 'gying bag dang
K12D0686_H0689:351a-12: bcas shing lus btung par mchog sbyin pa'i phyag la
K12D0686_H0689:351a-14: g-yon du padma'i rigs mdzes ma 'dzem bag dang bcas
K12D0686_H0689:351a-15: pa gsang sngags kyi tshul dang rjes su mthun zhing
K12D0686_H0689:351a-16: don yod pa'i zhags pa la mig gtod pa bya'o
K12D0686_H0689:351a-17: // lha mo sgrol ma'i bar du gnod sbyin mo ral pa gcig ma bya'o //
K12D0686_H0689:351a-18: padma'i rigs mdzes ma'i bar du khro gnyer can bya'o //
K12D0686_H0689:351a-19: phyogs gnyis par lha mo dkar mo lag na padma thogs pa bya'o //
K12D0686_H0689:351a-20: padma'i rigs mdzes ma'i 'og tu pho nya mo gsang sngags kyi rjes su 'brang ba bya'o //
K12D0686_H0689:351a-21: ral pa gcig ma'i 'og tu lha mo chen mo 'jigs byed ma bya'o //
K12D0686_H0689:351a-22: gong du gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu dang /
K12D0686_H0689:351b-0: dbang phyug chen po me tog sna @351b tshogs thogs
K12D0686_H0689:351b-1: te bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed pa bya'o
K12D0686_H0689:351b-2: // 'og tu rgyal po chen po bzhi bya'o //
K12D0686_H0689:351b-3: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi 'og tu
K12D0686_H0689:351b-4: 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje 'jigs su rung ba
K12D0686_H0689:351b-5: gad rgyangs can khro bo don yod pa'i rgyal po
K12D0686_H0689:351b-7: ras kyi sku gzugs 'di mthong ba tsam gyis 'phags
K12D0686_H0689:351b-8: pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ri bo po ta
K12D0686_H0689:351b-9: la na gzhal med khang dang bcas pa mngon sum
K12D0686_H0689:351b-10: du mthong bar rig par bya'o //
K12D0686_H0689:351b-11: 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po /
K12D0686_H0689:351b-13: mthong ba tsam gyis sems can dmyal ba chen po brgyad las thar par 'gyur /
K12D0686_H0689:351b-14: 'jigs pa chen po brgyad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur /
K12D0686_H0689:351b-15: mtshams med pa lnga byed pa yongs su thar par 'gyur /
K12D0686_H0689:351b-16: dam pa'i chos spong ba dang /
K12D0686_H0689:351b-17: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad spong
K12D0686_H0689:351b-18: bas mthong ba tsam gyi mod la rnam par dag
K12D0686_H0689:351b-19: par 'gyur / mnar med pa la gzhol ba'i mthar thug pa yang yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:351b-20: tshangs pa chen po'i bsod nams brgya stong gi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur /
K12D0686_H0689:351b-21: 'jig rten pa thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba mchog thob par 'gyur /
K12D0686_H0689:351b-22: 'chi ba'i dus na 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
K12D0686_H0689:351b-23: phyug mngon sum du ston par 'gyur zhing dbugs 'byin
K12D0686_H0689:352a-1: nas bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skye bar 'gyur /
K12D0686_H0689:352a-2: sgrib pa thams cad dang bral nas tshe rabs brgya
K12D0686_H0689:352a-3: stong phrag lnga bcu rjes su dran par 'gyur ro
K12D0686_H0689:352a-4: // byang chub kyi snying po'i mthar thug gi bar du skye ba 'di tha ma yin te /
K12D0686_H0689:352a-5: 'di mthong ba tsam gyis bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par 'gyur na /
K12D0686_H0689:352a-6: lhag par mang du byed pa lta ci smos te /
K12D0686_H0689:352a-9: bla na med pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:352a-19: btsun mo dam pa gang la la zhig gis ras
K12D0686_H0689:352a-20: kyi sku gzugs bsgrub par bya ba de'i spyan sngar
K12D0686_H0689:352a-21: don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po dran par byed
K12D0686_H0689:352a-22: cing / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug de
K12D0686_H0689:352a-23: la yang mchod na; des na khyod kyis 'di ltar
K12D0686_H0689:352a-25: don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po stong phrag brgya
K12D0686_H0689:352a-26: 'gyur du bzlas brjod kyi cho ga chen po byas
K12D0686_H0689:352a-27: pa yin no // gang zhig khro bo don yod
K12D0686_H0689:352a-28: pa'i zhags pa bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar mi
K12D0686_H0689:352a-29: smra bar lan gsum bzlas brjod byas te chus dbang
K12D0686_H0689:352b-0: pa yin no // bskur na / des na khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams @352b cad dang /
K12D0686_H0689:352b-1: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis bdag byang chub
K12D0686_H0689:352b-2: kyi snying po la thug gi bar du dbang bskur
K12D0686_H0689:352b-3: bar 'gyur ro snyam du de ltar shas par bya'o
K12D0686_H0689:352b-4: // gang gis don yod par grub pa'i cho ga
K12D0686_H0689:352b-5: zhib mo chen po'i gzungs 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
K12D0686_H0689:352b-6: dbang phyug ras kyi sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar mngon
K12D0686_H0689:352b-7: sum du thal mo sbyar te 'dug nas lan gsum
K12D0686_H0689:352b-8: bzlas te bskor ba lan bdun byas la /
K12D0686_H0689:352b-12: me tog phul nas phyag 'tshal lo //
K12D0686_H0689:352b-14: des khyod kyis 'di ltar shes par bya ste /
K12D0686_H0689:352b-15: gzungs thams cad so sor lan stong phrag brgya bzlas par 'gyur zhing /
K12D0686_H0689:352b-16: don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po rnam par grol
K12D0686_H0689:352b-17: ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi chos kyi rnam grangs chen po
K12D0686_H0689:352b-18: 'di lan stong phrag brgya bzlas par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:352b-19: don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya byas la 'phags
K12D0686_H0689:352b-20: pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhal la mig
K12D0686_H0689:352b-21: gtad de lag pa g-yas g-yon gnyis sbyar la snying
K12D0686_H0689:352b-22: gar bzhag cing / tshul 'dis phyag rgya re re nas lan stong phrag brgya byas par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:353a-0: rgyal po'i btsun mo dam pa gang la la zhig 'phags pa spyan @353a *//
K12D0686_H0689:353a-1: ras gzigs dbang phyug don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying
K12D0686_H0689:353a-2: po 'di brgya stong phrag khri bzlas brjod bya bar
K12D0686_H0689:353a-3: 'dod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa brgya stong phrag khris dbang bskur bar 'dod pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:353a-4: rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor mtha' dag gi cho
K12D0686_H0689:353a-5: ga zhib mo 'di rdzogs par lan brgya stong khri
K12D0686_H0689:353a-7: don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya 'di lan brgya
K12D0686_H0689:353a-8: stong phrag khri bya bar 'dod pa des ras kyi
K12D0686_H0689:353a-9: sku gzugs la brtson par bya ste /
K12D0686_H0689:353a-10: ras kyi sku gzugs mngon du bzhag nas gnas gtsang zhing dben pa /
K12D0686_H0689:353a-17: khang par gtsang sbra dang byi dor byas te ba ser mo'i lci ba legs par mnyes la /
K12D0686_H0689:353a-18: ba las byung ba lnga dang bsres te bskus la
K12D0686_H0689:353a-19: spos sna tshogs kyi byug pas byugs nas ras kyi
K12D0686_H0689:353a-20: sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar tsandan dkar po'i dkyil 'khor
K12D0686_H0689:353a-21: byas te gur gum gyis khru do'i tshad tsam bris
K12D0686_H0689:353a-23: ga pur gyis mchod par bya'o //
K12D0686_H0689:353a-24: dri chab kyi bum pa dri rnam pa sna tshogs
K12D0686_H0689:353a-25: kyis bkang ste ras kyi mgul chings kyis bcings la
K12D0686_H0689:353a-26: dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su gzhag par bya /
K12D0686_H0689:353a-28: bdug spos dri zhim po dang /
K12D0686_H0689:353b-0: me tog gi @353b phreng ba nyid shu rtsa gcig gzhag par bya /
K12D0686_H0689:353b-1: dri chab kyis bkang ba brgyad phyogs bzhir gzhag par bya /
K12D0686_H0689:353b-2: 'o mas bkang ba'i snod brgyad gzhag par bya /
K12D0686_H0689:353b-3: stegs bu'i drung du 'o mas bkang ba'i snod gzhag par bya /
K12D0686_H0689:353b-11: zhun mar gyis bkang ba'i snod gzhag par bya; aa ga ru nag po dang /
K12D0686_H0689:353b-15: shi ri p'a sa ka dang /
K12D0686_H0689:353b-16: cung peng rnams snod du bzhag nas aa ga ru'i yam sreg shing gis sbyin sreg bya /
K12D0686_H0689:353b-17: me tog sna tshogs kyis brgyan par mar gyi mar me sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis bltam par bya'o //
K12D0686_H0689:353b-18: de nas rig sngags 'chang gtsang mas gos gtsang ma
K12D0686_H0689:353b-19: bgos shing khrus legs par byas pas tshes bcu bzhi
K12D0686_H0689:353b-20: nas bco lnga'i bar du 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
K12D0686_H0689:353b-21: kyi dbang phyug gi ras kyi sku gzugs la mchod
K12D0686_H0689:353b-22: par bya'o // de'i 'og tu rig sngags 'chang gis
K12D0686_H0689:353b-23: khro bo'i rgyal po lan bdun bzlas te dri chab
K12D0686_H0689:353b-25: don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bya /
K12D0686_H0689:353b-26: de nas mi smra bar skyil mo krung du 'dug ste bzlas brjod kyi phyag rgya bcings la /
K12D0686_H0689:353b-27: don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzla bar bya /
K12D0686_H0689:354a-0: de'i 'og tu don yod par grub pa'i rig sngags kyi rgyal @354a *//
K12D0686_H0689:354a-1: bo stong rtsa brgyad bzlas par byas na /
K12D0686_H0689:354a-2: de nas ras kyi sku gzugs las 'od zer bdun
K12D0686_H0689:354a-3: byung nas kun tu snang bar byas te lan gsum
K12D0686_H0689:354a-4: bskor ba byas nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
K12D0686_H0689:354a-5: phyug gi dpral pa'i spyan du zhugs par 'gyur ro
K12D0686_H0689:354a-6: // zhugs pa tsam gyi mod la sa chen po
K12D0686_H0689:354a-7: g-yo bar 'gyur zhing rig sngags 'chang yang snying dga'
K12D0686_H0689:354a-9: mdog mdangs yongs su dag par 'gyur /
K12D0686_H0689:354a-10: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mchog sbyin
K12D0686_H0689:354a-11: pa'i phyag gi sor mo las lha'i chu 'dzag par
K12D0686_H0689:354a-13: don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag 'bar bar 'gyur /
K12D0686_H0689:354a-14: phyag na padma'i padma lo ma g-yo bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:354a-15: rtse gsum g-yo bar 'gyur zhing legs so //
K12D0686_H0689:354a-16: zhes bya ba'i sgra 'gyur bar 'gyur te; rigs kyi bu /
K12D0686_H0689:354a-18: khyod kyis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po grub kyi /
K12D0686_H0689:354a-20: khyod kyis don yod grub pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i
K12D0686_H0689:354a-21: rgyal po chen po dam pa grub bo zhes nas
K12D0686_H0689:354a-22: de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rang
K12D0686_H0689:354a-24: 'dod pa thams cad kyi mchog sbyin par mdzad do //
K12D0686_H0689:354b-0: grub pa'i mchog bla na med pa @354b ste; ma bsgrubs par las byed pa'o //
K12D0686_H0689:354b-1: de nas dbang du bya bar 'dod pas me tog padma la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas la /
K12D0686_H0689:354b-2: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phul te
K12D0686_H0689:354b-3: gang gi ming nas brjod pa de dbang du 'gyur
K12D0686_H0689:354b-4: ro // sna ma'i me tog la lan brgya rtsa
K12D0686_H0689:354b-5: brgyad bzlas te 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
K12D0686_H0689:354b-6: ro // la phul la / yang lan bdun bzlas
K12D0686_H0689:354b-7: nas me tog snying po blangs te gang la byin
K12D0686_H0689:354b-9: gdon gyis zin pa la byin na /
K12D0686_H0689:354b-10: gnod thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:354b-11: nad kyis thebs pa la byin na; nad thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:354b-13: rgyal po btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:354b-14: mi ro bsregs pa'i sa'i steng du gtor na /
K12D0686_H0689:354b-15: sems can de sems can dmyal ba las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:354b-16: mnar med pa na gnas pa'i sems can la gtor na /
K12D0686_H0689:354b-17: skad cig de la yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:354b-18: nyal ba'i sngas su bzhag na /
K12D0686_H0689:354b-19: rmi lam chen po mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:354b-20: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug sku ston par
K12D0686_H0689:354b-21: mdzad cing yid du 'ong ba thams cad gsung bar
K12D0686_H0689:354b-22: 'gyur ro // skyes pa 'am bud med gang gi
K12D0686_H0689:354b-23: steng du gtor ba de dbang du 'gyur zhing grib
K12D0686_H0689:355a-3: lha'i gzugs brnyan gyi steng du bzhag na /
K12D0686_H0689:355a-4: 'gugs par 'gyur zhing las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:355a-5: mig sman sgrub par 'dod pas ras kyi sku gzugs
K12D0686_H0689:355a-6: kyi spyan sngar mig sman ldod ros la stong rtsa
K12D0686_H0689:355a-7: brgyad bzlas na / grub pa'i rtags gsum ston par 'gyur te /
K12D0686_H0689:355a-13: gter thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:355a-14: gnod sbyin gyi gnas thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:355a-15: dpral bar thig le byas na /
K12D0686_H0689:355a-17: sgo thams cad dang 'khrul 'khor thams cad 'bye bar
K12D0686_H0689:355a-18: 'gyur ro; ;yan lag dang nying lag la bskus na
K12D0686_H0689:355a-20: spyi bor thig le byas na /
K12D0686_H0689:355a-21: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rtag tu mchog sbyin par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:355a-23: khyab 'jug dang dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa
K12D0686_H0689:355a-24: lha rnams rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur zhing
K12D0686_H0689:355a-25: dgos pa thams cad 'grub par byed do //
K12D0686_H0689:355a-26: mtshan mo mig la bskus na /
K12D0686_H0689:355a-27: nyin mo bzhin du mthong bar 'gyur zhing gter thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur te /
K12D0686_H0689:355a-28: kha phug nas dor bar bya'o //
K12D0686_H0689:355b-0: @355b rang gi lus la byugs na /
K12D0686_H0689:355b-1: ji srid 'tsho'i bar du go cha bgos pa'i lus su 'gyur /
K12D0686_H0689:355b-3: srin po la sogs pas mi mthong bar 'gyur zhing las thams cad byed par 'gyur te /
K12D0686_H0689:355b-4: tshe bskal pa stong thub par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:355b-5: yang na bza' ba dang snying gar bsku ba byas na /
K12D0686_H0689:355b-6: nag po chen po'i gzugs su 'gyur zhing lha thams
K12D0686_H0689:355b-7: cad kyi gzugs ston par 'gyur ba nas tshangs pa
K12D0686_H0689:355b-9: dbang phyug chen po'i gzugs dang /
K12D0686_H0689:355b-10: gzugs sna tshogs mang po ston par 'gyur /
K12D0686_H0689:355b-17: kra ku dha la don yod par grub pa khri bzlas /
K12D0686_H0689:355b-18: don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po stong rtsa brgyad bzlas /
K12D0686_H0689:355b-19: khro bo'i rgyal po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pa byas te thams cad du mi smra bar bya zhing /
K12D0686_H0689:355b-20: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan sngar
K12D0686_H0689:355b-21: btags la ras kyi sku gzugs la mngon du phyogs
K12D0686_H0689:355b-22: te gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos la tshes bco
K12D0686_H0689:355b-23: lnga nya la nyin zhag gcig smyung ba byas te
K12D0686_H0689:355b-24: phye ma zhib tu btags te /
K12D0686_H0689:355b-25: yang don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po dang /
K12D0686_H0689:355b-27: don yod pa grub pa'i rig sngags kyi rgyal po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas la /
K12D0686_H0689:355b-28: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi phyag tu bzhag ste /
K12D0686_H0689:356a-0: @356a *// mchod pa chen po byas nas ras kyi sku gzugs
K12D0686_H0689:356a-1: la mchod pa byas la nyin zhag gcig myung ba
K12D0686_H0689:356a-2: byas te / ras kyi sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar
K12D0686_H0689:356a-3: skyil mo krung du 'dug la don yod pa'i zhags
K12D0686_H0689:356a-4: pa'i phyag rgya lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bya /

K12D0686_H0689:372b-7: ga pur dang ni gla rtsi nyid //
K12D0686_H0689:372b-8: lam ka gser shing 'bras bu dang //
K12D0686_H0689:372b-10: snu ha'i 'o ma nyid dang ni //
K12D0686_H0689:372b-11: thod pa skal pa ldan nyid dang //
K12D0686_H0689:372b-12: so ma r'a dza khyab 'jug mnon //
K12D0686_H0689:372b-13: shing dga' rgyal dang rnam rgyal nyid //
K12D0686_H0689:372b-14: n'a ku l'i dri n'a ku y'i //
K12D0686_H0689:372b-15: tshangs pa'i bu dang ku mu dang //
K12D0686_H0689:372b-16: padma'i chu ba sbrang rtsi dang //
K12D0686_H0689:372b-17: bu ram dkar po'i khu ba dang //
K12D0686_H0689:372b-18: 'di rnams lhan cig sbyar ba yi //
K12D0686_H0689:372b-19: bdug pa'i mchog 'di bsgrub par bya //
K12D0686_H0689:372b-20: mkhas pas legs par khrus byas te //
K12D0686_H0689:372b-21: gtsang mas gtsang ma'i gos bgos shing //
K12D0686_H0689:372b-22: zla ba nya'am bcu bzhi la //
K12D0686_H0689:372b-23: bcu gsum pa'am tshes brgyad la //
K12D0686_H0689:372b-24: rtag tu sbyar bya nyin mtshan gzung //
K12D0686_H0689:372b-25: sngags la mkhas pas bdug spos 'di //
K12D0686_H0689:372b-26: so so so sor kun sbyar nas //
K12D0686_H0689:372b-27: phyog rgya dkyil 'khor gsang sngags dang //
K12D0686_H0689:372b-28: me tog bdug spos dri rgya chen //
K12D0686_H0689:372b-29: mchod pa'i cho ga 'di yis dang //
K12D0686_H0689:372b-30: gtor ma'i las la mkhas pa dang //
K12D0686_H0689:372b-31: mchod yon snod ni gang ba dang //
K12D0686_H0689:372b-32: mgo la'ang dri dang til mar gyi //
K12D0686_H0689:372b-33: mar me legs gru gnas su ni //
K12D0686_H0689:372b-34: legs sbas gtsang mar gnas de sgrub //
K12D0686_H0689:372b-35: legs sbas gtsang mar gnas pa yis //
K12D0686_H0689:373a-2: don yod zhags pa'i spyan snga ru //
K12D0686_H0689:373a-3: 'dug nas yongs su dag pa'i lus //
K12D0686_H0689:373a-4: sdom dang byams pa'i sems bzhag nas //
K12D0686_H0689:373a-5: sems can kun la snying rje'i bdag /
K12D0686_H0689:373a-6: sangs rgyas rjes su dran sgom zhing //
K12D0686_H0689:373a-7: gsang sngags bzlas pa mchog gyis shig /
K12D0686_H0689:373a-8: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la dmigs te 'jig
K12D0686_H0689:373a-9: rten dbang phyug gi zhal nas byung ba don yod
K12D0686_H0689:373a-10: pa'i zhags pa'i snying po stong rtsa brgyad /
K12D0686_H0689:373a-11: khro bo'i rgyal po stong rtsa brgyad /
K12D0686_H0689:373a-12: don yod grub pa brgya rtsa brgyad tshig dang yi
K12D0686_H0689:373a-13: ge shin tu gsal bar bzlas nas don yod pa'i
K12D0686_H0689:373a-14: rgya mtsho'i nor bu padma la rnam par lta ba'i
K12D0686_H0689:373a-15: dpal dri ma med pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i
K12D0686_H0689:373a-16: snying po stong phrag bcu bzlas te /
K12D0686_H0689:373a-17: de nas gsang sngags 'di stong phrag brgya bzla'o //
K12D0686_H0689:373a-18: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa ba lo ki te aa mo gha hri da yan /
K12D0686_H0689:373a-19: tsa ra tsa ra tsa ra /
K12D0686_H0689:373a-20: ma h'a ku ru ni k'a ya /
K12D0686_H0689:373a-22: aa bhi shinytsa ya aa mo gha p'a sha ha ste sv'a h'a /
K12D0686_H0689:373a-23: de nas gsang sngags bzlas brjod byas te mnyam par
K12D0686_H0689:373a-24: bzhag la las thams cad la mkhas pas bdug spos
K12D0686_H0689:373a-25: kyi mchog la bzlas pa tsam gyi mod la bdug
K12D0686_H0689:373a-26: spos kyi rgyal po la de bzhin gshegs pa thams
K12D0686_H0689:373a-27: cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs par
K12D0686_H0689:373b-0: 'gyur ro // don yod pa'i zhags pa @373b snang ba rgya che ba /
K12D0686_H0689:373b-1: nor bu chen po'i sprin dri ma med pa zhes bya ba /
K12D0686_H0689:373b-2: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rnam par gzigs pa /
K12D0686_H0689:373b-3: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mchog sbyin
K12D0686_H0689:373b-4: pa'i 'khor los bsgyur ba zhes bya ba'i bdug pa'i
K12D0686_H0689:373b-6: thog mar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la sngags
K12D0686_H0689:373b-7: 'di lan bdun bzlas te bdug pa dbul bar bya'o
K12D0686_H0689:373b-8: // aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa ba lo
K12D0686_H0689:373b-9: ki te ma h'a aa mo gha dza ya dza
K12D0686_H0689:373b-10: // ya sv'a h'a / de'i 'og tu bdag rang la bdugs na /
K12D0686_H0689:373b-11: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis rlob par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:373b-12: byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras
K12D0686_H0689:373b-13: gzigs dbang phyug mchog sbyin pa bdugs pa tsam gyi
K12D0686_H0689:373b-14: mod la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi
K12D0686_H0689:373b-16: dge sbyong dang bram ze'i gzugs kyis de dang lhan cig smra bar byed de /
K12D0686_H0689:373b-18: gang la gtam byas pa de thams cad tshe 'di
K12D0686_H0689:373b-19: la 'grub par 'gyur ro; ;de'i 'og tu mtshan mo
K12D0686_H0689:373b-20: rang gi gzugs ston par 'gyur zhing mchog sbyin par
K12D0686_H0689:373b-21: mdzad do // don yod pa'i zhags pa'i ye shes thob par 'gyur /
K12D0686_H0689:373b-22: 'jigs pa chen po brgyad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur /
K12D0686_H0689:373b-23: sngon gyi sgrib pa dang sdig pa dmyal ba'i tshor
K12D0686_H0689:373b-24: ba myong bar 'gyur ba zad cing mthar thug par
K12D0686_H0689:374a-0: 'gyur ro // gang dag gi lus la @374a *//
K12D0686_H0689:374a-2: mthong ba tsam gyi mod la thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:374a-7: rgyal po btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:374a-11: bram ze mdun na 'don dang bcas pa dbang du
K12D0686_H0689:374a-12: 'gyur zhing thams cad bgyi ba ci mchis zhes bya
K12D0686_H0689:374a-14: rigs bzhi'i 'jig rten dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:374a-17: tshes brgyad la khrus legs par byas te gos gtsang
K12D0686_H0689:374a-18: ma bgos la; ba las byung ba lngas byugs pas
K12D0686_H0689:374a-19: khyim gyi phugs su dkyil 'khor byas la me tog
K12D0686_H0689:374a-20: dang mchod yon gyi snod gzhag par bya /
K12D0686_H0689:374a-21: gtor ma dkar po nye bar gzhag par bya /
K12D0686_H0689:374a-22: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la dmigs la byang
K12D0686_H0689:374a-23: chub sems dpa' thams cad la dmigs te phyogs bzhir
K12D0686_H0689:374a-24: phyag byas la bdug pa'i rgyal po 'dis bdugs pa
K12D0686_H0689:374a-25: byas na; bdugs pa tsam gyi mod la phyogs bcu
K12D0686_H0689:374a-26: mtha' yas mu med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams
K12D0686_H0689:374a-27: kyi rdul phra mo snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pas
K12D0686_H0689:374a-28: yongs su gang ba la 'di lta ste /
K12D0686_H0689:374a-29: sangs rgyas kyi zhing re rer de bzhin gshegs pa
K12D0686_H0689:374a-30: gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed bye ba khrag khrig
K12D0686_H0689:374a-31: stong phrag brgya la bdug pa'i sprin 'khrigs pa /
K12D0686_H0689:374b-0: @374b mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i bdug spos chen po tsandan sbrul gyi snying po dang /
K12D0686_H0689:374b-2: ta ma la'i lo ma dang /
K12D0686_H0689:374b-3: bdug spos mang po nam mkha'i ngos khebs pas mchod par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:374b-4: byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor rnams dang /
K12D0686_H0689:374b-5: sum cu rtsa gsum na gnas pa'i lha brgya byin dang /
K12D0686_H0689:374b-8: dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa 'og min gyi
K12D0686_H0689:374b-9: gnas na gnas pa'i lha'i bar thams cad bdug pa'i
K12D0686_H0689:374b-10: dris rab tu dga' bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:374b-14: zla ba thams cad dga' bar 'gyur te /
K12D0686_H0689:374b-15: 'di la the tshom mi bya zhing yid gnyis bskyed par mi bya'o //
K12D0686_H0689:374b-16: skad chen pos don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po bzlas pa byas na /
K12D0686_H0689:374b-17: des na sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad na bzhugs
K12D0686_H0689:374b-18: pa'i de bzhin gshegs pas legs so zhes bya ba'i
K12D0686_H0689:374b-20: rig sngags 'chang de la yang de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis rlob par 'gyur /
K12D0686_H0689:374b-22: yang dang yang du gzigs pa'i phyir byon par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:374b-23: bde ba can na bzhugs pa de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med dang /
K12D0686_H0689:374b-24: byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /
K12D0686_H0689:374b-25: mthu chen thob la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' thams cad thugs rab tu dgyes par 'gyur /
K12D0686_H0689:375a-1: 'chang la don yod pa chen po'i dngos grub stsol bar mdzad gzigs bzhed par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:375a-2: klu thams cad la bdugs pa tsam gyis dbang du
K12D0686_H0689:375a-3: 'gyur zhing ha cang char ches na gcod par byed
K12D0686_H0689:375a-4: cing / char mi 'beb na 'bebs par byed do //
K12D0686_H0689:375a-7: sprin thams cad gcod par byed /
K12D0686_H0689:375a-8: bdugs pa tsam gyis gdon thams cad 'jig par 'gyur /
K12D0686_H0689:375a-9: bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad phyogs bcur dpag tshad stong du 'bros par 'gyur /
K12D0686_H0689:375a-10: ma mo'i gnas su bdugs na rlung dang /
K12D0686_H0689:375a-12: sprin thams cad gcod par byed /
K12D0686_H0689:375a-14: nag po chen po la sogs pa 'gugs par 'gyur zhing dbang du gyur nas 'dug par 'gyur /
K12D0686_H0689:375a-15: bya ba thams cad byed par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:375a-16: g-yul 'gyed pa'i tshe bdugs na dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa'i dpung las rgyal bar 'gyur /
K12D0686_H0689:375a-17: thams cad du bdugs pa tsam gyis rgyal bar 'gyur /
K12D0686_H0689:375a-18: thams cad du sbyar bar byas na kun tu grub pa chen por 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:375a-20: 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po /
K12D0686_H0689:375a-22: de nas rig sngags 'chang rnams la phan pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:375a-23: bde ba'i phyir thig le bya ba dang /
K12D0686_H0689:375b-0: lus bsku ba byas na ya lad @375b dang go
K12D0686_H0689:375b-1: cha bgos pa dang 'dra bar 'gyur ba bshad par
K12D0686_H0689:375b-2: bgyi yi / bcom ldan 'das gsan du gsol /
K12D0686_H0689:375b-3: don yod pa'i nor bu rgya chen po rdo rje'i
K12D0686_H0689:375b-4: zhags pa zhes bya ba'i nor bu gang sbyor bar
K12D0686_H0689:375b-5: byas pa tsam gyis thams cad 'grub pa /
K12D0686_H0689:375b-7: mkhas pas mdzod spu rnams su thig le byas na /
K12D0686_H0689:375b-9: skye bo mang po'i nang dang /
K12D0686_H0689:375b-11: de bzhin du rigs byed kyi tshogs bzhi'i nang du
K12D0686_H0689:375b-12: skar ma'i tshogs kyi nang na zla ba tshes pa
K12D0686_H0689:375b-13: bzhin du mdzes shing 'jigs pa med do //
K12D0686_H0689:375b-14: lha rnams thams cad ya mtshan skye //
K12D0686_H0689:375b-15: drag po yi ni cod pan 'chang //
K12D0686_H0689:375b-16: 'jig rten mgon po'i g-yas kyi dbu'i //
K12D0686_H0689:375b-17: dbu rgyan rtse phran zla tshes bzhin //
K12D0686_H0689:375b-18: gdong bkru ba ni mchog yin no //
K12D0686_H0689:375b-19: zla ba nya ba'i 'od dang mtshungs //
K12D0686_H0689:375b-20: smin ma rna ba dpral ba dang //
K12D0686_H0689:375b-23: sems can thams cad dga' bas blta //
K12D0686_H0689:375b-24: dga' zhing rtag tu tshig btsan 'gyur //
K12D0686_H0689:375b-25: de yi mig gis gang mthong ba //
K12D0686_H0689:375b-26: thams cad dbang du gyur par 'gyur //
K12D0686_H0689:375b-27: skyes pa la ni bsku byas na //
K12D0686_H0689:375b-28: rtag tu rigs smra blo che zhing //
K12D0686_H0689:375b-29: rtag tu ya lad go bgos pa'i //
K12D0686_H0689:375b-31: 'byung po rnams ni mi bzod cing //
K12D0686_H0689:375b-32: gnod sbyin 'byung po gsang ba pas //
K12D0686_H0689:375b-33: rtag tu thub par mi 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:375b-34: stobs chen pha rol gnon pa dang //
K12D0686_H0689:376a-1: tu sred med stobs ldan zhing //
K12D0686_H0689:376a-2: glang chen stobs kyi stobs ldan 'gyur //
K12D0686_H0689:376a-3: lha rnams 'dar ni yed yed cing //
K12D0686_H0689:376a-4: klu rnams mtsho na skrag par byed //
K12D0686_H0689:376a-5: gal te rig sngags smra ba yis //
K12D0686_H0689:376a-6: reg na ri rab lhun po yang //
K12D0686_H0689:376a-7: g-yo bar 'gyur ba the tshom med //
K12D0686_H0689:376a-8: rtag tu sred med stobs ldan zhing //
K12D0686_H0689:376a-9: stobs dang gzugs dang rtsal ldan 'gyur; ;nor bu rgyal po bla na med //
K12D0686_H0689:376a-10: 'di ni thos pa tsam gyis su //
K12D0686_H0689:376a-11: sdig pa kun las nges grol zhing //
K12D0686_H0689:376a-12: dug rnams thams cad 'joms par byed //
K12D0686_H0689:376a-13: dpal dang skal bzang rtag thob 'gyur //
K12D0686_H0689:376a-14: gang gi lag tu thogs 'gyur ba //
K12D0686_H0689:376a-15: sgrib pa kun las nges grol zhing //
K12D0686_H0689:376a-17: de na de bzhin gshegs kun gyi; ;thugs skyes gsung skyes sras su 'gyur //
K12D0686_H0689:376a-18: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug /
K12D0686_H0689:376a-19: bla ma rtag tu rjes 'brang zhing //
K12D0686_H0689:376a-20: rig sngags smra ba dbugs dbyung phyir //
K12D0686_H0689:376a-21: de bzhin du ni srung ba dang //
K12D0686_H0689:376a-22: rtag tu mchog ni sbyin par 'gyur //
K12D0686_H0689:376a-23: 'jig rten mgon po thub chen gyis //
K12D0686_H0689:376a-24: bsod nams phung po chen po thob //
K12D0686_H0689:376a-25: gang zhig nor bu 'di 'chang ba de de bzhin
K12D0686_H0689:376a-26: gshegs pa gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma bye ba khrag
K12D0686_H0689:376a-27: khrig brgya stong phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi snyed las
K12D0686_H0689:376a-28: dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur /
K12D0686_H0689:376b-0: de bzhin gshegs @376b pa de dag thams cad mthong zhing dngugs 'byin pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:376b-2: dpal dang skal pa bzang po thams cad dang ldan par 'gyur /
K12D0686_H0689:376b-3: rtag tu lus dang ngag dang yid yongs su dag par 'gyur /
K12D0686_H0689:376b-4: sems can thams cad kyi mchod pa gcig pur 'gyur /
K12D0686_H0689:376b-5: dgra thams cad kyis mi sod par 'gyur /
K12D0686_H0689:376b-6: phyag na rdo rjes de la rtag tu bsrung ba dang /
K12D0686_H0689:376b-9: phyag na padma yang rtag tu mchog sbyin par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:376b-11: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis lung bstan pa de /
K12D0686_H0689:376b-12: 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi nor bu
K12D0686_H0689:376b-13: chen po bzung bas sdang ba bdud la sogs pa
K12D0686_H0689:376b-15: log 'dren thams cad las rgyal te /
K12D0686_H0689:376b-16: pha rol tu pham par mdzad nas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ro //
K12D0686_H0689:376b-17: 'dis rnga bo che la bskus te brdungs na /
K12D0686_H0689:376b-18: chos kyi rnga bo che brdungs par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:376b-19: gang dag sgra thos pa tsam gyis sems can thams
K12D0686_H0689:376b-20: cad kyi mtshams med pa lnga'i sdig pa rab tu
K12D0686_H0689:376b-22: tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gtogs pa'i ri dvags dang /
K12D0686_H0689:376b-23: bya gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:376b-24: 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:376b-25: dam pa'i chos spong pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:377a-0: mnar med pa la gzhol zhing gnas @377a *//
K12D0686_H0689:377a-1: pa dag las yongs su grol bar 'gyur /
K12D0686_H0689:377a-2: dmyal ba chen po bcu drug las yongs su grol bar 'gyur /
K12D0686_H0689:377a-3: 'jigs pa chen po brgyad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur /
K12D0686_H0689:377a-4: de la dug gi 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur /
K12D0686_H0689:377a-7: dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur /
K12D0686_H0689:377a-8: rims thams cad kyi 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur /
K12D0686_H0689:377a-9: 'di dung la bskus te bus na /
K12D0686_H0689:377a-10: chos kyi dung chen po bus par 'gyur /
K12D0686_H0689:377a-11: tha na dung gi sgra thos pa'i bar de dag thams cad kyang slar ldog par mi 'gyur /
K12D0686_H0689:377a-15: bu mo dag kyang skye ba dang /
K12D0686_H0689:377a-20: smre sngags 'don pa'i sdug bsngal las yongs su grol bar 'gyur /
K12D0686_H0689:377a-22: skye ba phyi ma yin te /
K12D0686_H0689:377a-23: shi nas thams cad ris mthun par bde ba can
K12D0686_H0689:377a-24: gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su padma las brdzus te
K12D0686_H0689:377a-26: lus skyes bu chen po'i mtshan dang /
K12D0686_H0689:377a-28: rgyan thams cad kyis klubs pa; padma las skyil mo krung bcas te skye bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:377a-29: byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du
K12D0686_H0689:377a-30: 'od dpag med las mngon sum du chos kyi gtam
K12D0686_H0689:377b-0: thos par 'gyur @377b ro; ;zla ba yar gyi ngo
K12D0686_H0689:377b-1: la cod pan dkar po bcings te nor bu chen
K12D0686_H0689:377b-2: po 'di rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags na
K12D0686_H0689:377b-3: / bsgrengs pa tsam gyi mod la chos kyi rgyal mtshan bsgrengs par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:377b-4: 'di rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags pa mthong
K12D0686_H0689:377b-5: ba tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi
K12D0686_H0689:377b-6: snying por chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang /
K12D0686_H0689:377b-7: bdud 'dul ba'i rgyal mtshan bsgreng bar rig par bya'o //
K12D0686_H0689:377b-8: 'di bsgrengs pa tsam gyis 'thab pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:377b-10: khrag khrug thams cad zhi bar 'gyur /
K12D0686_H0689:377b-13: mu ge'i dgon pa rab tu zhi bar 'gyur /
K12D0686_H0689:377b-21: sdang ba'i sems can rab tu zhi bar 'gyur /
K12D0686_H0689:377b-35: ske bgegs pa thams cad 'jigs par 'gyur /
K12D0686_H0689:377b-39: rlung gis mi tshugs shing nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:378a-0: mi mang pos yongs su gang @378a *//
K12D0686_H0689:378a-2: chos 'dod cing chos kyi kun dga' la dga' ba dang /
K12D0686_H0689:378a-9: shin tu 'jam pa phun sum tshogs par 'gyur /
K12D0686_H0689:378a-10: thams cad du lha'i reg pa dang bcas pa'i bza' ba dang btung ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:378a-25: grib ma ngan pa zhi bar 'gyur zhing mi tshugs par 'gyur /
K12D0686_H0689:378a-26: sems can de dag thams cad phan tshun byams pa'i sems su 'gyur /
K12D0686_H0689:378a-27: mchog tu yid bde ba'i gnas pas gnas pas gnas par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:378a-28: yon tan dang phan yon chen po de dag ni /
K12D0686_H0689:378a-29: nor bu'i rgyal po chen po'i byin gyis brlabs pa yin no //
K12D0686_H0689:378a-30: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
K12D0686_H0689:378a-31: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bcom ldan 'das
K12D0686_H0689:378a-32: kyi spyan snga na bzhin 'dzum zhing mig mi 'dzum
K12D0686_H0689:378a-33: pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to
K12D0686_H0689:378a-35: grub pa'i rdzas kyi mchog nor bu gdags pa /
K12D0686_H0689:378b-0: de bzhin @378b gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs shing lung bstan pa /
K12D0686_H0689:378b-1: bdag gi snying po yid bzhin gyi nor bu chen po sems can thams cad la phan pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:378b-2: bde ba'i phyir zhugs pa rjes su bsgrag par bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:378b-23: dz'a ta pa tri ka su ma na dang /
K12D0686_H0689:378b-26: shing aarga'i 'o ma rnams bsags te cha mnyam par
K12D0686_H0689:378b-27: byas la gser nyis 'gyur du byas te rgyu skar
K12D0686_H0689:378b-28: bzang po dang / tshes grangs shis shing dge ba
K12D0686_H0689:378b-29: la khrus legs par byas te gos gtsang ma bgos
K12D0686_H0689:378b-30: nas nyin zhag gcig byams pa'i sems la mnyam par
K12D0686_H0689:378b-31: bzhag ste phye ma zhib mor byas te don yod
K12D0686_H0689:378b-32: pa'i zhags pa'i rgyal po'i snying po'i gzungs stong rtsa
K12D0686_H0689:378b-33: bzang po dang / brgyad bzlas / khro bo'i rgyal
K12D0686_H0689:378b-34: po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te gtor la dri chab
K12D0686_H0689:378b-35: bzang pos sbangs te sbyar la gser dang bsres la
K12D0686_H0689:378b-36: bzang po dang / brgyad bzlas / ga pur dang
K12D0686_H0689:378b-37: / gla rtsi'i bdug pas bdugs te nor bu zho
K12D0686_H0689:378b-38: gnyis pa'i tshad du byas nas phug la ras skud
K12D0686_H0689:378b-39: kyis btags te gser gyis g-yogs la /
K12D0686_H0689:378b-40: yang don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po stong rtsa brgyad bzlas /
K12D0686_H0689:379a-0: @379a *// khro bo'i rgyal po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te 'phags
K12D0686_H0689:379a-1: pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan sngar mi
K12D0686_H0689:379a-2: smra bar bsgrubs par byas la de nyid kyi zhabs
K12D0686_H0689:379a-3: drung du grib ma la bskam par bya ste /
K12D0686_H0689:379a-4: phyed dam bzhi cha gser gyis g-yogs par bya zhing phyed g-yogs par mi bya'o //
K12D0686_H0689:379a-5: gang la gser gyis g-yogs pa 'di ni /
K12D0686_H0689:379a-6: gang la don yod pa'i zhags pa yid bzhin gyi nor bu chen po dang 'dra ste /
K12D0686_H0689:379a-7: sangs rgyas kyi byang chub dang /
K12D0686_H0689:379a-9: 'jig rten las 'das pa las chen po sgrub par byed do //
K12D0686_H0689:379a-10: gser gyis ma g-yogs pas ni /
K12D0686_H0689:379a-11: 'jig rten pa'i dgos pa thams cad sgrub par byed do //
K12D0686_H0689:379a-42: gzhang 'brum thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur zhing /
K12D0686_H0689:379b-0: rims thams @379b cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur te /
K12D0686_H0689:379b-3: mkhris pa las gyur pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:379b-4: bad kan las gyur pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:379b-5: 'dus pa las gyur pa rnams rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:379b-6: lus kyi nang gi nad thams cad la chu dron dang lhan cig sbyin no //
K12D0686_H0689:379b-7: pha rol gyi nad thams cad dang /
K12D0686_H0689:379b-8: gnod pa thams cad la byugs pa tsam gyis yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:379b-9: thams cad du dgos pa thams cad la sbyar ba tsam gyis thams cad 'grub par 'gyur te /
K12D0686_H0689:379b-11: gser gyis g-yogs pa dpung pa la btags na /
K12D0686_H0689:379b-12: thams cad du thogs pa med par 'gyur te /
K12D0686_H0689:379b-15: pha rol gnon pa phyag na rdo rje dang /
K12D0686_H0689:379b-17: dgos pa thams cad 'grub pa bla na med pa
K12D0686_H0689:379b-18: rnam pa gsum po 'di la sbyar bar bya ste
K12D0686_H0689:379b-22: yid la ji ltar bsam pa'i dgos pa sgrub pa'i de kho ni nyid 'grub pa ste /
K12D0686_H0689:379b-24: rgyal po btsun mo'i tshogs dang bcas pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:379b-26: blon por bcas pa rtag tu bgyi ba ci mchis zhes bran bzhin du dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:379b-27: nor bu spyi gtsug tu bzhag nas rig sngags bzlas na /
K12D0686_H0689:379b-28: bgegs med par thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:380a-0: lag pa g-yas pa la btags te rig @380a *//
K12D0686_H0689:380a-2: bzlas brjod kyi cho ga stong phrag brgya 'gyur du byas par 'gyur te /
K12D0686_H0689:380a-3: lan gcig bzlas pas stong phrag brgyar rab tu 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:380a-4: mgul par btags te bcangs na /
K12D0686_H0689:380a-5: khrus ma byas pa khrus byas par 'gyur /
K12D0686_H0689:380a-7: tshangs par mi spyod pa tshangs par spyod par 'gyur /
K12D0686_H0689:380a-8: thub par ma byas pa thub par byas par 'gyur /
K12D0686_H0689:380a-9: smyung bar ma byas pa smyung ba byas par 'gyur /
K12D0686_H0689:380a-10: tshig mi btsan pa tshig btsan par 'gyur /
K12D0686_H0689:380a-12: dam tshig ma shes pa dam tshig shes par 'gyur /
K12D0686_H0689:380a-13: byams pa'i sems dang ldan par 'gyur /
K12D0686_H0689:380a-14: sbyin pa gang chung zad ci sbyin pa chung ngu
K12D0686_H0689:380a-15: yang stong phrag brgya 'gyur du sbyin pa chen po
K12D0686_H0689:380a-16: 'phel bar 'gyur; pha rol tu phyin pa drug rdzogs
K12D0686_H0689:380a-17: par 'gyur / nor bu 'di lag mthil g-yas pa la btags na /
K12D0686_H0689:380a-18: gang la reg pa de zad mi shes par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:380a-19: su la yang brjod par mi bya ste; de'i 'og tu de dag thams cad 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:380a-20: rked pa la btags te chu'i nang du zhugs na /
K12D0686_H0689:380a-21: chu klung chen po'i gting du sleb par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:380a-22: de nas nor bu sgrub par 'dod pas dngul shin
K12D0686_H0689:380a-23: tu yongs su dag pa las padma 'dab ma sum
K12D0686_H0689:380a-24: cu rtsa gnyis pa kha phye ba dbus kyi snying
K12D0686_H0689:380a-25: po dang ze ba za ma tog 'dra ba sor
K12D0686_H0689:380b-0: bcu drug pa'i tshad du @380b [?] gsal [?] de'i
K12D0686_H0689:380b-1: dbus su gser gyi nor bu gzhag par bya'o //
K12D0686_H0689:380b-2: ba lang gi lci ba ba lang gi gcin dang
K12D0686_H0689:380b-3: ldan pas dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa byas la tshon
K12D0686_H0689:380b-4: sna tshogs kyis bri bar bya ste /
K12D0686_H0689:380b-5: kho ra khor yug tu padma bris la /
K12D0686_H0689:380b-6: padma'i dbus kyi ze bar dngul las byas pa'i padma bzhag ste bum pa gang ba bzhi dang /
K12D0686_H0689:380b-7: gtor ma'i bum pa bzhi gzhag par bya zhing /
K12D0686_H0689:380b-8: me tog dgram par bya; tshon rnam pa sna tshogs kyi bri bar bya /
K12D0686_H0689:380b-11: du ru ka'i bdug pas bdug cing gtor ma dkar po gzhag par bya /
K12D0686_H0689:380b-12: 'phan gdugs rnam pa sna tshogs kyis brkyen [?] par bya /
K12D0686_H0689:380b-13: mar gyi mar me sum cu rtsa gnyis bltam par bya /
K12D0686_H0689:380b-14: 'bras bu dang me tog phreng sna tshogs gzhag par bya /
K12D0686_H0689:380b-15: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mngon du phyogs
K12D0686_H0689:380b-16: par bzhag ste rig sngags 'chang gtsang mas gos gtsang
K12D0686_H0689:380b-17: ma bgos la nyin mtshan gcig smyung ba byas la
K12D0686_H0689:380b-18: tshes bco lnga nas nyi shu dgu dang gnam stong
K12D0686_H0689:380b-19: gi bar dus mtshams gsum du mchod par bya zhing
K12D0686_H0689:380b-20: / padma za ma tog de dang /
K12D0686_H0689:380b-21: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la yang mchod
K12D0686_H0689:380b-22: pa byas la dkyil 'khor gyi shar phyogs su mngon
K12D0686_H0689:380b-23: du phyogs te 'dug la bzlas brjod stong rtsa brgyad
K12D0686_H0689:380b-24: bya / khro bo'i rgyal po stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te yungs kar dang /
K12D0686_H0689:381a-1: pa'i phyag rgya stong rtsa brgyad bya /
K12D0686_H0689:381a-2: de bzhin du khro bo'i rgyal po'i phyag rgya bya'o //
K12D0686_H0689:381a-3: mi smra bar dgos pa thams cad byas na /
K12D0686_H0689:381a-4: de'i 'og tu tshes bco lnga zla ba nya'i nang
K12D0686_H0689:381a-5: par gyi dus mtshams su nor bu'i rgyal po padma
K12D0686_H0689:381a-6: dang bcas te gcig tu 'bar bar 'gyur zhing 'phags
K12D0686_H0689:381a-7: pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhal nas sgra
K12D0686_H0689:381a-9: nam mkha'i dkyil nas legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byung bar 'gyur /
K12D0686_H0689:381a-10: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku chen po mthong bar 'gyur //
K12D0686_H0689:381a-11: de nas rig sngags 'chang gis padma 'bar ba de lag pa g-yas pas blang bar bya ste /
K12D0686_H0689:381a-12: blangs pa tsam gyi mod la nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur zhing /
K12D0686_H0689:381a-13: rig sngags 'chang ba thams cad kyi 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur /
K12D0686_H0689:381a-14: 'khor lo'i rgyal po gser gyi mdog can blta na sdug pa chen po mdun na gnas par 'gyur /
K12D0686_H0689:381a-17: mi mdza' ba thams cad zlog par byed /
K12D0686_H0689:381a-18: 'khor bye ba stong phrag bcu gnyis dang ldan pa'i rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal por 'gyur /
K12D0686_H0689:381a-19: tshe bskal pa stong thub par 'gyur /
K12D0686_H0689:381a-20: don yod pa'i rnam par blta ba'i nor bu chen
K12D0686_H0689:381a-21: po rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo dang ldan pa'i ting
K12D0686_H0689:381b-0: don yod pa'i dri ma med pa 'bar ba'i @381b
K12D0686_H0689:381b-1: rtse mo rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i don
K12D0686_H0689:381b-3: phyogs bcu kun gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas
K12D0686_H0689:381b-4: kyi zhing gi rnam par 'phrul pa mthong bar 'gyur
K12D0686_H0689:381b-5: / de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis dbugs 'byin par 'gyur /
K12D0686_H0689:381b-6: nor bu chen po yongs su dag pa rdo rje
K12D0686_H0689:381b-7: la rnam par lta ba'i 'od kyi lus rnam par
K12D0686_H0689:381b-17: lto 'phye chen po rnams bgyi ba ci mchis zhes dbang du 'gro bar 'gyur /
K12D0686_H0689:381b-18: mgo bo'i spyi bor btags na nor bu chen po'i
K12D0686_H0689:381b-19: rdzu 'phrul gyis nub phyogs su song nas bde ba
K12D0686_H0689:381b-20: can gyi rab tu dbye ba gzhal med khang dang
K12D0686_H0689:381b-22: legs par brgyan pa'i dkyil 'khor dang /
K12D0686_H0689:381b-23: byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang bcas pa mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:381b-24: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag las chos snang ba'i sgo'i chos bshad pa chen po thob par 'gyur /
K12D0686_H0689:381b-25: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs dang /
K12D0686_H0689:381b-29: phug gi gnas thams cad du 'jug par 'gyur /
K12D0686_H0689:381b-30: thams cad du rgyal ba'i rje dpon dang /
K12D0686_H0689:382a-1: phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi'i sgo 'bye bar 'gyur /
K12D0686_H0689:382a-2: dpung pa g-yas pa la btags na /
K12D0686_H0689:382a-3: mi snang bar 'gyur zhing lus mi snang ba gangg'a'i
K12D0686_H0689:382a-4: klung bye ba stong phrag brgya snyed kyi lus mi
K12D0686_H0689:382a-5: snang ba rnams kyi mchog rje dpon dang rgyal por
K12D0686_H0689:382a-6: 'gyur ro // dpung pa g-yon pa la btags na /
K12D0686_H0689:382a-9: 'byung po la sogs pa thams cad mi snang bar byas par 'gyur /
K12D0686_H0689:382a-10: thams cad kyi gnas kyi gzhal med khang sgo bye zhing 'dug par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:382a-14: brla g-yas pa la btags na /
K12D0686_H0689:382a-15: nags kyi phug gi gzhal med khang gi gnas thams cad kyi sgo phye zhing /
K12D0686_H0689:382a-16: sman gyi dngos po thams cad rang gi gzugs kyis
K12D0686_H0689:382a-17: mdun na gnas par 'gyur zhing thams cad dbang du
K12D0686_H0689:382a-18: 'gyur ro // rkang pa'i rje ngar la btags na /
K12D0686_H0689:382a-19: rlung gi phung po dang po'i stobs kyi shugs chen
K12D0686_H0689:382a-20: po dang ldan par 'gyur zhing cung zad tsam song
K12D0686_H0689:382a-21: bas dpag tshad stong phrag bcur 'gro zhing slar yang
K12D0686_H0689:382a-22: 'ong par 'gyur / nyin mtshan gcig gis stong gsum
K12D0686_H0689:382a-23: gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rlung chen
K12D0686_H0689:382a-24: po'i shugs kyi stobs dang brtson 'grus kyis song ste
K12D0686_H0689:382a-25: slar yang 'ong bar 'gyur zhing gang gis kyang gnod
K12D0686_H0689:382b-0: @382b du dgos pa sgrub pa thams cad grub par
K12D0686_H0689:382b-1: 'ong par 'gyur / par mi 'gyur / 'gyur ro // rkang mthil la btags na /
K12D0686_H0689:382b-2: sa'i 'og gi dngos grub chen po thob par 'gyur zhing /
K12D0686_H0689:382b-3: sa'i 'og phug gi sgo thams cad bye bar 'gyur te /
K12D0686_H0689:382b-4: rang ji ltar 'dod pa der 'jug cing 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:382b-5: khar bcug na nyi ma re re tshigs su bcad pa stong lobs par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:382b-6: mid pa tsam gyis thos pa rgya mtsho bsags par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:382b-7: lce'i rtse mor bzhag na lce padma dang ku mu
K12D0686_H0689:382b-8: da ltar 'jam par 'gyur zhing thos pa mang po
K12D0686_H0689:382b-9: 'dzin par 'gyur / lag pa la byugs na gang la reg pa de bran bzhin du 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:382b-15: bram ze thams cad bgyi ba ci mchis zhes thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:382b-16: nor bu sgrub pa'i cho ga'o ////
K12D0686_H0689:382b-17: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
K12D0686_H0689:382b-18: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan
K12D0686_H0689:382b-19: 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to; ;bcom ldan 'das
K12D0686_H0689:382b-20: / bdag la don yod grub kyi bum pa rab
K12D0686_H0689:382b-21: mchog ces bgyi ba'i sgrub pa'i cho ga chen po
K12D0686_H0689:382b-22: / mchis te / don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying
K12D0686_H0689:382b-23: po yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i gzungs kyi mthu bstan
K12D0686_H0689:382b-24: / mchis te / pa / ji lta ba der
K12D0686_H0689:382b-25: de ltar bcom ldan 'das bum pa chen po mthu
K12D0686_H0689:382b-26: sgrub pa'i cho ga 'di rnam par 'phrul pa bsam
K12D0686_H0689:383a-0: gyis mi khyab pa sgrub pa 'grub par @383a *//
K12D0686_H0689:383a-2: rig sngags 'chang rnams la phan pa dang bde ba'i
K12D0686_H0689:383a-3: phyir de kho na nyid yang dag par sgrub par
K12D0686_H0689:383a-4: 'gyur lags so // de nas gser ram dngul lam
K12D0686_H0689:383a-5: zangs sam kham pa'i bum pa tshad dang ldan zhing
K12D0686_H0689:383a-6: kun nas shin tu zlum pa mgo'am /
K12D0686_H0689:383a-7: mgrin par byin pa'i tshad shin tu 'jam zhing thag
K12D0686_H0689:383a-8: thug dang shang shong med pa; dbyibs legs shing byi
K12D0686_H0689:383a-10: kun nas yongs su gang ba la mtshal gyi mtshon
K12D0686_H0689:383a-11: gyis padma 'dab ma brgya rtsa brgyad pa bri bar
K12D0686_H0689:383a-12: bya ste / mgrin par padma'i snying po dang ze ba bri /
K12D0686_H0689:383a-13: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bri bar bya ste /
K12D0686_H0689:383a-15: lhor mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'i phyag /
K12D0686_H0689:383a-17: byang du yid bzhin nor bu rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa skyil mo krung du bzhugs par bya'o //
K12D0686_H0689:383a-18: padma'i 'dab ma la dbang phyug dang /
K12D0686_H0689:383a-29: lha'i tshogs gzhan dag bri bar bya zhing /
K12D0686_H0689:383a-36: pho nya mo dkar mo dang /
K12D0686_H0689:383b-1: rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /
K12D0686_H0689:383b-4: padma'i 'dab ma'i khor yug tu padma'i phreng ba bri'o //
K12D0686_H0689:383b-5: de nas bum pa tshon sna tshogs kyis bri bar bya zhing gser gyi rgyan gyis brgyan par bya /
K12D0686_H0689:383b-6: rim pa'i cha bkra zhing mdzes par bya'o //
