K12D0686_H0689:400a-23: sdig pa thams cad yongs su dag cing gsal bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:400a-28: 'chi ba las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:400a-29: 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho'i chu bo'i pha rol tu 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:400b-0: 'on kyang @400b gang la la zhig sems can ches mang po la dbang byed par 'gyur te /
K12D0686_H0689:400b-2: phyir mi ldog par rig par bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:400b-3: sa bcu la rab tu gnas pa dang bcas par brjod par bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:400b-10: dge bsnyen ma gang la la zhig don yod pa'i
K12D0686_H0689:400b-11: rgyal po'i snying po 'di cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal
K12D0686_H0689:400b-15: ras ris yongs su dag nas dad pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:400b-16: gus pa yid la byed pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:400b-17: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la lhag pa'i bsam pa rab tu dang bas 'bri bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:400b-20: byams pa yongs su dag pa'i yid kyis yo byad
K12D0686_H0689:400b-21: yongs su ma tshang ba med pa'i mchod pa dang
K12D0686_H0689:400b-22: / bsnyen bkur ba'i dri mkhan gyis 'bri ba'am 'brir gzhug par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:400b-23: sems can thams cad kyi stobs dang mthus bris pa'i
K12D0686_H0689:400b-24: sems can de yang phyir mi ldog par rig par
K12D0686_H0689:400b-25: bgyi ste / 'di la dogs pa dang yid [?] gnyis bskyed par mi bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:400b-26: gzhan yang sems can 'di de bzhin gshegs pa thams
K12D0686_H0689:400b-27: cad kyi thugs las skyes pa'i sras su rig par
K12D0686_H0689:400b-28: bgyi / zhal las skyes pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:401a-0: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur @401a *//
K12D0686_H0689:401a-1: te; sems can de bla na med pa yang dag
K12D0686_H0689:401a-2: par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par
K12D0686_H0689:401a-3: sangs rgyas par lung bstan to //
K12D0686_H0689:401a-4: de ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba'i phyir cho ga zhib
K12D0686_H0689:401a-5: mo'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa dang mnyam pa
K12D0686_H0689:401a-8: yon tan chen po yongs su bsgrags so //
K12D0686_H0689:401a-9: de nas don yod pa'i dngos grub bla na med
K12D0686_H0689:401a-10: pa'i yo byad dang cho ga bshad par bgyi ste
K12D0686_H0689:401a-11: / ras khru gnyis pa'i tshad du bgyi zhing /
K12D0686_H0689:401a-16: legs par btags pa la ri mo mkhan gtsang ma gos gtsang ma bgos pas /
K12D0686_H0689:401a-23: kha zas ngan pa yongs su spangs pas tshon rnam pa sna tshogs pa 'bar ba /
K12D0686_H0689:401a-24: lhag ma ma yin pa snod gsar par bzhag pas 'brir gzhug par bgyi ste /
K12D0686_H0689:401a-25: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs brnyan ri mor bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:401a-26: don yod pa'i zhags pa zhi ba'i zhal spyan gsum
K12D0686_H0689:401a-27: pa ral pa'i cod pan gyis brgyan pa zhal bcu
K12D0686_H0689:401a-29: phyag sum cu so gnyis pa /
K12D0686_H0689:401a-30: rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa /
K12D0686_H0689:401b-0: phyag na mtshon cha sna tshogs @401b dang /
K12D0686_H0689:401b-2: padma dkar po'i lus dang kha dog can /
K12D0686_H0689:401b-4: zhal g-yas pa dbang phyug chen po'i zhal /
K12D0686_H0689:401b-5: g-yon pa sred med kyi bu'i gzugs 'dzin pa /
K12D0686_H0689:401b-6: dbang phyug chen po'i steng du gshin rje'i gzugs /
K12D0686_H0689:401b-7: sred med kyi bu'i steng du chu lha'i gzugs /
K12D0686_H0689:401b-8: gshin rje'i steng du lus ngan gyi gzugs zhal khro gnyer can /
K12D0686_H0689:401b-9: chu lha'i steng du gzhon nu zhal khro gnyer can /
K12D0686_H0689:401b-10: lus ngan gyi steng du dbang phyug chen po'i gzugs drag po mche ba gtsigs pa'o //
K12D0686_H0689:401b-11: gzhon nu'i steng du dbang phyug drag po'i gzugs mche ba gtsigs pa'o //
K12D0686_H0689:401b-12: dbang phyug gi steng du nyi ma'i zhal /
K12D0686_H0689:401b-13: dbang phyug chen po'i steng du zla ba'i zhal /
K12D0686_H0689:401b-14: steng gi ral pa la 'phags pa 'od dpag med
K12D0686_H0689:401b-15: 'od 'dom gang dang bcas pa'i phyag brkyang bas dbugs
K12D0686_H0689:401b-18: skra'i bar du rlung lha bya ste /
K12D0686_H0689:401b-20: gzhogs g-yon du me'i lha ste /
K12D0686_H0689:401b-22: sngar bshad pa'i phyag rgya dang mtshon cha lag na thogs pa bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:401b-23: g-yas su 'phags pa khro bo'i rgyal po bgyi ste /
K12D0686_H0689:401b-24: rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa khros pa'i gzugs so //
K12D0686_H0689:401b-25: g-yon du rig pa'i rgyal po rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan par bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:402a-0: @402a *// padma dang zhags pa thogs pa'o //
K12D0686_H0689:402a-2: yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang /
K12D0686_H0689:402a-3: me tog gi phur ma thogs par bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:402a-4: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ni /
K12D0686_H0689:402a-5: zhal nas 'od zer 'phro bzhin pa bgyi ste /
K12D0686_H0689:402a-7: lus la padma'i phreng ba 'phyang ba'o //
K12D0686_H0689:402a-8: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi 'og gi padma la dkyil 'khor gyi lha mo bgyi ste /
K12D0686_H0689:402a-9: drag po drag tu dgod pa /
K12D0686_H0689:402a-11: rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa /
K12D0686_H0689:402a-16: padma'i gdan la skyil krung phyed pas bzhugs par bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:402a-17: khro bo'i rgyal po'i rgyab tu 'phags ma sgrol ma bgyi ste /
K12D0686_H0689:402a-18: phyag na gos 'dzin pa; dbu smad pa /
K12D0686_H0689:402a-19: rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa'o //
K12D0686_H0689:402a-20: rig pa'i rgyal po'i rgyab tu dkar sham chen mo bgyi ste /
K12D0686_H0689:402a-21: rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa /
K12D0686_H0689:402a-22: phyag thal mo sbyar zhing mgo smad pa'o //
K12D0686_H0689:402a-23: dkyil 'khor gyi lha de dag gi bar du g-yas
K12D0686_H0689:402a-24: ngos su rig sngags 'chang pus mo btsugs pa bgyi
K12D0686_H0689:402a-25: ste / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhal la blta bzhin pa /
K12D0686_H0689:402a-26: lag na me tog gi phor pa thogs pa bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:402a-27: ngos bzhir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi ri mo bgyi ste /
K12D0686_H0689:402b-0: skyil mo krung @402b gis bzhugs pa /
K12D0686_H0689:402b-1: dkyil 'khor gyi rnam pa sum cu rtsa brgyad rnam par 'byes par bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:402b-2: steng du son par drang srong rnams dang /
K12D0686_H0689:402b-4: gra bzhir rgyal po chen po bzhi bgyi ste /
K12D0686_H0689:402b-5: go cha dang ya lad bgos pa'o //
K12D0686_H0689:402b-6: zhabs dag gi 'og tu dpal lha mo dang /
K12D0686_H0689:402b-9: mtshan mo'i lha mo rnams bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:402b-10: ras ris yongs su rdzogs pa legs par bgyis shing /
K12D0686_H0689:402b-11: las bgyis pa bris nas de'i 'og tu gsang ba'i
K12D0686_H0689:402b-12: gnas su bzhag ste phyogs gtsang mar ba byung gi
K12D0686_H0689:402b-14: kun nas gru bzhi ba bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:402b-15: de'i steng du dri sna tshogs kyi byug pa sbyin par bgyi /
K12D0686_H0689:402b-16: me tog sna tshogs kyis gcal du dgram par bgyi /
K12D0686_H0689:402b-17: gang ba'i bum pas spras par bgyi /
K12D0686_H0689:402b-18: pog phor gyis spras par bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:402b-23: gu gul gyi bdug pa bsreg cing /
K12D0686_H0689:402b-25: zhabs bsil yang gzhag par bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:402b-26: ras ris dkyil 'khor la mngon du phyogs par bzhag
K12D0686_H0689:402b-27: nas rig sngags 'chang gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos
K12D0686_H0689:402b-28: pa legs par khrus byas pas bgyi ste /
K12D0686_H0689:402b-29: ras ris la mchod pa bgyi zhing /
K12D0686_H0689:402b-30: mar me bcu drug sbar bar bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:402b-31: de nas ras ris la mngon du phyogs nas skyil
K12D0686_H0689:402b-32: mo krung gis 'dug nas phyag rgya bcing bar bgyi'o
K12D0686_H0689:403a-1: snying po'i gsang sngags kyi gzungs kyi dam tshig stong phrag bcur bzla'o //
K12D0686_H0689:403a-2: don yod rgyal po'i snying po dang /
K12D0686_H0689:403a-3: khro bo'i rgyal po'i dus gsum du lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas par bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:403a-4: stong phrag bcu rdzogs pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:403a-5: rig sngags 'chang gis mgo la 'bar bar bgyid cing /
K12D0686_H0689:403a-6: ras ris de la yang 'od sna tshogs pa rnams 'bar bar bgyid de /
K12D0686_H0689:403a-7: tho rangs skya rengs ser po'i thun mtshams kyi dus
K12D0686_H0689:403a-8: tshod la ji lta ba bzhin du ras ris mngon
K12D0686_H0689:403a-9: par 'bri na / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
K12D0686_H0689:403a-10: phyug lha'i lus kyis mdun du 'dug ste rig sngags
K12D0686_H0689:403a-12: de bzhin du smra bar bgyid de /
K12D0686_H0689:403a-15: mchog sbyin par bya; yid la ji ltar 'dod pa de dag thams cad sbyin par bya'o //
K12D0686_H0689:403a-16: rig sngags 'chang gis mchog gnyis bslang bar bya ste /
K12D0686_H0689:403a-17: 'jig rten pa'i mchog gi dngos grub dang /
K12D0686_H0689:403a-18: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i mchog sangs rgyas nyid do //
K12D0686_H0689:403a-19: gal te 'jig rten pa'i mchog slong bar byed na /
K12D0686_H0689:403a-20: de thams cad sbyin par bgyid de /
K12D0686_H0689:403a-21: don yod zhags pa'i rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor
K12D0686_H0689:403a-22: cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po chen po mchog gi
K12D0686_H0689:403a-23: sgrub pa'i dngos grub tu 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:403a-24: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan sngar
K12D0686_H0689:403b-0: grub pa'i dngos grub ji @403b lta ba de bzhin
K12D0686_H0689:403b-1: du rig sngags 'chang la mchog gi dngos grub 'grub
K12D0686_H0689:403b-2: par bgyid do // zhes bya ba'i dngos grub chen por 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:403b-3: dngos grub yangs par yang 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:403b-4: 'jig rten pa'i bya ba thams cad kyi mchog sgrub pa'i dngos grub tu 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:403b-5: gzhan pa'i mchog thams cad mngon par bslangs na stsol bar bgyid de /
K12D0686_H0689:403b-16: mi'am ci'i gnas su 'jug pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:403b-20: nor sgyur ba smra ba dang /
K12D0686_H0689:403b-29: rnam par g-yo ba med par byed pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:403b-30: chu klung chen po sgrol ba dang /
K12D0686_H0689:403b-34: sman g-yo bar byed pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:403b-35: bcud kyis len sgrub pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:403b-40: rgyal po dbang du byed pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:404a-0: 'jig rten pa'i sgrub pa'i dngos grub de thams @404a *//
K12D0686_H0689:404a-2: de nas 'jig rten pa gzhan don du gnyer cing 'dod na /
K12D0686_H0689:404a-3: phyag g-yas pa spyi bo'i gtsug tu 'jog par byed de /
K12D0686_H0689:404a-4: bzhag pa tsam kyi mod la lus med pa dri
K12D0686_H0689:404a-5: ma dang bral ba yongs su dag pa zhes bya
K12D0686_H0689:404a-6: ba'i yongs su dag pa'i lus so sor thob ste
K12D0686_H0689:404a-7: sbrul gyi shun pa bzhin du lus 'dor bar bgyid
K12D0686_H0689:404a-8: do // bsam pa nyid kyi mod la de ma
K12D0686_H0689:404a-9: thag kho nar bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi
K12D0686_H0689:404a-11: skye ba bye ba brgya stong phrag gi tshe rabs dran par 'gyur te /
K12D0686_H0689:404a-12: de ma thag kho nar de bzhin gshegs pa tshe
K12D0686_H0689:404a-13: dpag tu med pas lung bstan pa thob pa'i mod
K12D0686_H0689:404a-14: nyid la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
K12D0686_H0689:404a-15: pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro
K12D0686_H0689:404a-17: skye bar skyes pa'i tha ma'o zhes so; ;sgrib pa
K12D0686_H0689:404a-18: thams cad dang bral ba don yod pa rnam par
K12D0686_H0689:404a-19: 'phrul pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin so sor
K12D0686_H0689:404a-20: thob cing / ting nge 'dzin gzhan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag thob bo //
K12D0686_H0689:404a-21: phyogs bcu kun gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
K12D0686_H0689:404a-22: kyis dgongs par 'gyur zhing legs so zhes bya ba
K12D0686_H0689:404a-23: rjes su stsol bar mdzad do //
K12D0686_H0689:404a-24: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis dgongs par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:404a-25: lha thams cad kyis kyang 'di la kun tu srung bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:404a-27: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub kyi mchog gnyis po 'di ni /
K12D0686_H0689:404b-0: mthong @404b ba'i chos nyid la rjes su stsol bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:404b-1: bya ba gzhan mang zhing ches mang ba thams cad sgrub par bgyid do //
K12D0686_H0689:404b-2: gdon grol bar byed pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:404b-6: nad rab tu zhi bar byed pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:404b-45: 'di dag thams cad gsang sngags 'di bzlas pa tsam gyis rnam par nyams par bgyid do //
K12D0686_H0689:404b-46: sdig pa de rnams rnam par nyams par bgyid do //
K12D0686_H0689:404b-49: dgra thams cad rnam par nyams par bgyid do //
K12D0686_H0689:404b-50: de ltar gzungs kyi snying po 'di ni /
K12D0686_H0689:404b-51: stobs chen po dang ldan pas te /
K12D0686_H0689:405a-0: 'jig rten pa'i dngos grub kyi mchog 'di dag 'grub @405a *//
K12D0686_H0689:405a-2: de nas las byed par 'dod na /
K12D0686_H0689:405a-3: de'i 'og tu rig sngags 'chang gtsang ma /
K12D0686_H0689:405a-4: gos gtsang ma bgos pa legs par khrus byas pas
K12D0686_H0689:405a-5: bgyi ste; de nas don yod pa chen po'i snying
K12D0686_H0689:405a-6: po'i gsang sngags kyi gzungs 'di sgrub cing bzlas pas
K12D0686_H0689:405a-8: stong phrag bco brgyad du bzlas pas sdig pa thams
K12D0686_H0689:405a-9: cad zhi zhing 'jig rten pa'i rig sngags chen po
K12D0686_H0689:405a-11: thams cad la lus thams cad du sgrub par byed do //
K12D0686_H0689:405a-12: de nas 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bzlas pa'i cho
K12D0686_H0689:405a-13: ga sgrub par 'dod pa'i rig sngags 'chang des nyi
K12D0686_H0689:405a-14: ma re re zhing gtsang ma legs par khrus bgyis
K12D0686_H0689:405a-15: shing gos gtsang ma bsgos pas bgyis te /
K12D0686_H0689:405a-16: nya la tshes gcig nas brtsams te nyi ma re
K12D0686_H0689:405a-17: re zhing stong phrag bcur bzlas pa dbul bar bya'o
K12D0686_H0689:405a-18: // bcu gcig pa'i phyogs la chos gsum gyi nyin mtshan nas bgyi ste /
K12D0686_H0689:405a-19: nyi ma re re zhing stong phrag phyed dang gnyis bzlas pa dbul bar bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:405a-20: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod par bgyi /
K12D0686_H0689:405a-21: bco lnga'i nya la dkar gsum gyi gtor ma dbul bar bgyi /
K12D0686_H0689:405a-24: de nas zas dkar gsum bza' bar bgyi zhing /
K12D0686_H0689:405a-25: bco lnga nya'i mtshan mo stong rtsa brgyad bzlas pa dbul bar bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:405b-0: thun tha ma la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs @405b dbang phyug 'ongs te /
K12D0686_H0689:405b-1: rig sngags 'chang legs so zhes smra bar bgyid cing /
K12D0686_H0689:405b-2: khyod kyis don yod rgyal po'i snying po mtha' dag yongs su rdzogs pa'i cho ga zhib mo dang /
K12D0686_H0689:405b-3: rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor grub po //
K12D0686_H0689:405b-4: phyag g-yas pa brkyang nas padma stsol bar bgyid do /
K12D0686_H0689:405b-5: rig sngags 'chang gis blang bar bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:405b-6: blangs pa tsam gyi mod la nam mkha' la rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro zhing /
K12D0686_H0689:405b-7: gang du 'dod pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing der 'gro'o //
K12D0686_H0689:405b-8: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis yang dag par dbugs 'byin par bgyid do //
K12D0686_H0689:405b-9: de nas sbyin sreg gi cho ga bgyid par 'dod pas padma'i snying po bza' bar bgyi /
K12D0686_H0689:405b-10: dkyil 'khor gyi tshad la padma'i rtsa ba dang /
K12D0686_H0689:405b-12: lo ma mar dang bsres pa'i sbyin sreg bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:405b-13: dri zhim po'i shing la me sbar la stong phrag brgyad du sbyin sreg bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:405b-14: stong phrag brgyad rdzogs pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:405b-15: dpal lha mo chen mo dngos su 'ongs te /
K12D0686_H0689:405b-16: de la dri zhim po'i mchod yon phul bas rig
K12D0686_H0689:405b-17: sngags 'tshang bgyi ba ci yod ces smra bar bgyid
K12D0686_H0689:405b-18: do // des bcom ldan 'das ma bdag la nor mi zad pa rnyed pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:405b-19: gter rnyed pa rab tu stsol cig ces brjod par bya'o //
K12D0686_H0689:405b-20: de nas khyod kyi de bzhin bya'o //
K12D0686_H0689:405b-21: zhes dbugs 'byin par byed cing mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:405b-22: rig sngags 'chang gang dang gang du 'gro ba de sdang der gtor chen po mthong ste /
K12D0686_H0689:405b-23: nam yang zad par nye bar mi 'gro'o //
K12D0686_H0689:406a-1: mchog gsum la mchod par bgyi /
K12D0686_H0689:406a-2: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod par bgyi /
K12D0686_H0689:406a-3: dpal lha mo chen mo la nyi ma re re zhing so so'i chi shas dbul bar bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:406a-6: mar gsar bsres pas aarga'i shing la me sbar te
K12D0686_H0689:406a-7: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ras ris
K12D0686_H0689:406a-8: kyi mdun du zla phyed cig tu sbyin sreg bgyi
K12D0686_H0689:406a-9: ste / dpag tu med pa dbul bar bgyis na /
K12D0686_H0689:406a-10: rdzogs pa na las thams cad la longs spyod pa thob bo //
K12D0686_H0689:406a-14: yungs kar bsres la padma'i 'dab ma dang /
K12D0686_H0689:406a-15: thang shing gi yam shing gis zhag bdun du thun gsum du sbyin sreg brgyad brgya byas na /
K12D0686_H0689:406a-17: shing mya ngan med pa'i yam shing mar la btags
K12D0686_H0689:406a-18: pas zla phyed cig tu thun gsum du sbyin sreg
K12D0686_H0689:406a-21: mtshan mo bdun du thun gsum du yam shing gis sbyin sreg brgyad brgya byas na /
K12D0686_H0689:406a-22: gnas nges par stan pa'i cho ga smra bar byed do //
K12D0686_H0689:406a-23: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs brnyan
K12D0686_H0689:406a-24: la mtshan mo bcu gnyis su ma la ki'i me
K12D0686_H0689:406a-25: tog stong phrag brgyad kyis mchod par bya ste /
K12D0686_H0689:406a-26: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad la mngon par dad pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:406a-28: klu rnams mngon par dang bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:406b-1: bya ba thams cad sgrub par byed do //
K12D0686_H0689:406b-2: nor bu bzang po spyan drang bar 'dod pas snying
K12D0686_H0689:406b-3: gar ming med kyi sor mo bzhag nas thun gsum
K12D0686_H0689:406b-4: du brgyad brgya bzla bar bya ste; mtshan mo bcu
K12D0686_H0689:406b-5: gnyis su las rdzogs pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:406b-6: nor bu bzang po mthong ba stsol bar byed do //
K12D0686_H0689:406b-7: snying gar yongs su byugs pa tsam gyis nyi ma
K12D0686_H0689:406b-8: re re la dong tse brgya stsol bar bgyid de
K12D0686_H0689:406b-9: / de yang lhag ma med par zad par bgyi ste /
K12D0686_H0689:406b-10: yang dang yang du stsol bar bgyid do //
K12D0686_H0689:406b-11: gang yin pa de dang de ma bgyis na /
K12D0686_H0689:406b-12: phyis stsol bar mi bgyid do //
K12D0686_H0689:406b-13: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mngon du phyogs par 'dug nas sam /
K12D0686_H0689:406b-14: yang na ring bsrel can gyi mchod rten nam /
K12D0686_H0689:406b-15: ras ris la mngon du phyogs par gzhag par bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:406b-16: seng ldeng gi yam shing zho dang /
K12D0686_H0689:406b-18: mar la btags pas thun gsum du brgyad brgya sbyin sreg bgyi ste /
K12D0686_H0689:406b-19: nyi ma bdun yongs su rdzogs pa na zong stong phrag bcu thob bo //
K12D0686_H0689:406b-20: de lta bu la sogs pa'i rgyas pa'i las rnams thams cad du sbyar bar bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:406b-21: de nas mig sman sgrub par 'dod pa'i rig sngags 'chang des gtsang mas bsgrub par bgyi ste /
K12D0686_H0689:406b-23: ldong ros zangs kyi snod du gzhag par bgyi ste /
K12D0686_H0689:406b-24: ras ris la mngon du phyogs nas skyil mo krung
K12D0686_H0689:406b-25: gis 'dug ste tshes brgyad dam bco lnga la nyin
K12D0686_H0689:406b-26: mtshan du smyung bar gnas bas /
K12D0686_H0689:407a-0: aa shvattha'i 'dab ma bzhis dag ba @407a *//
K12D0686_H0689:407a-2: ji srid du dngos grub rnam pa gsum dro bar bgyid pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:407a-3: du ba 'thul bar bgyid pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:407a-4: 'bar bar bgyid pa de srid du bzlas pa bgyi'o;
K12D0686_H0689:407a-5: ;dro bar gyur ba 'dis mig la byugs pas gang
K12D0686_H0689:407a-6: mthong ba de dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:407a-7: gang blangs pa de snyed do //
K12D0686_H0689:407a-8: 'jig rten thams cad kyi mchod pa'i 'os chen por 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:407a-11: btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad kyis mchod pa bya ba'i 'os su 'gyur te /
K12D0686_H0689:407a-13: du ba 'thul ba 'dis mig la byugs pas /
K12D0686_H0689:407a-14: sor mo bcu'i tshad kyi sa gzhi la rkang bas
K12D0686_H0689:407a-15: reg pas dpag tshad stong phrag tu song nas slar
K12D0686_H0689:407a-17: dpag tshad stong phrag tu nyan par byed do; ;dpag tshad stong phrag tu blta bar byed do //
K12D0686_H0689:407a-18: lo stong phrag bcu gsum du 'tsho bar byed do //
K12D0686_H0689:407a-19: su gang gis kyang bka' bsgo bar byed par mi 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:407a-20: rtag tu bde ba dang bcas pa yang dag par thob pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:407a-21: rtag tu bla ma'i gnas su bya bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:407a-22: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad lhag par mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:407a-26: lo stong phrag bcur 'tsho bar byed do //
K12D0686_H0689:407a-27: de nas ldong ros kyi sgrub pa gzhan ni /
K12D0686_H0689:407a-29: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sgrub par byed pa'o //
K12D0686_H0689:407b-0: de nas k'a ra b'i ra @407b dang /
K12D0686_H0689:407b-1: ldong ros dpa' bo'i rin gyis blangs nas sbyong du gzhug par bgyi zhing /
K12D0686_H0689:407b-2: ba byung lngas yang dag par sbyangs nas rdzogs pa
K12D0686_H0689:407b-3: la zhag gsum du smyung bar gnas bas bcom ldan
K12D0686_H0689:407b-4: 'das dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
K12D0686_H0689:407b-5: la mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas padma'i 'dab
K12D0686_H0689:407b-6: ma bzhi rnams kyis ldong ros la rab tu bkod
K12D0686_H0689:407b-7: nas gsum gyis kun tu g-yogs te ji srid du
K12D0686_H0689:407b-8: dngos grub rnam pa gsum dro bar byed pa dang
K12D0686_H0689:407b-9: 'das dang / / du ba 'thul bar byed pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:407b-10: 'bar bar byed pa de srid du bzla bar bya'o //
K12D0686_H0689:407b-11: dro bar byed bzhin pas ni /
K12D0686_H0689:407b-12: thig le byas nas ji srid du sems can mthong ba dang /
K12D0686_H0689:407b-13: gang gis blta ba de thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:407b-14: dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba tshe med pa yang tshe nyis 'gyur du 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:407b-15: du ba 'thul ba zhin pas ni; thig le byas
K12D0686_H0689:407b-16: pas rigs bzhi'i 'jig rten thams cad de'i dbang du
K12D0686_H0689:407b-17: 'gyur ro // skyes bu tsam gyi sa gzhi la
K12D0686_H0689:407b-18: rkang pas reg pas dpag tshad stong phrag gsum mthong
K12D0686_H0689:407b-19: 'gyur ro // ngo // dpag tshad stong phrag gsum nas nyan par byed do //
K12D0686_H0689:407b-20: lo stong phrag bcu gnyis su 'tsho bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:407b-22: thig le byas pas nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:407b-23: lan grangs nyi shur 'phur bar byed do //
K12D0686_H0689:407b-24: ldong ros kyi dngos grub thams cad kyi rgyal por 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:407b-25: dpag tshad stong phrag gsum du 'phur bar byed do //
K12D0686_H0689:407b-26: lo stong phrag brgyad cur 'tsho bar byed do //
K12D0686_H0689:408a-0: @408a *// gi wang sgrub par 'dod pas ba ser skya'i mar
K12D0686_H0689:408a-1: gyis gi wang yang dag par spyangs te dkar po'i
K12D0686_H0689:408a-2: bco lnga'am brgyad la mtshan mo gsum du smyung bar
K12D0686_H0689:408a-4: spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod pa rgya chen
K12D0686_H0689:408a-5: po byas nas rab tu bkod de lag pa g-yas
K12D0686_H0689:408a-6: bas mnan nas ji srid du dngos grub rnam pa
K12D0686_H0689:408a-7: gsum du gyur pa de srid du bzla bar bya'o
K12D0686_H0689:408a-8: // dro bar byed bzhin pas ni /
K12D0686_H0689:408a-9: thig le byas pas gnod sbyin dang /
K12D0686_H0689:408a-13: 'byung po rnams kyis de la ri mor byed do //
K12D0686_H0689:408a-14: gang slongs pa de ster ro //
K12D0686_H0689:408a-15: nyi ma de nas brtsams te tshe lo stong phrag lngar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:408a-17: thig le byas na mi snang ba thams cad kyi rgyal por 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:408a-18: rlung gi phung po rab tu zhi bas bzhon par byed do //
K12D0686_H0689:408a-19: dpag tshad stong phrag nyi shur song nas slar yang 'ong bar byed do //
K12D0686_H0689:408a-20: tshe lo stong phrag drug cur 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:408a-21: dpag tshad stong phrag drug cu rnams mthong bar byed do //
K12D0686_H0689:408a-22: 'bar bar byed pas thig le byas nas nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:408a-23: bdag nyid lan brgyar 'phur bar byed do //
K12D0686_H0689:408a-24: gi wang grub pa thams cad kyi rgyal por 'gyur te /
K12D0686_H0689:408a-26: gang gi tshe 'chi bar 'gyur ba de'i tshe gling bzhi la dbang pa'i rgyal por 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:408b-0: de nas @408b bdag nyid gser gyi kha dog tu
K12D0686_H0689:408b-1: sgrub par 'dod pa'i rig sngags 'chang des zla phyed
K12D0686_H0689:408b-2: drug gi bar du bzlas pa'i cho ga bsgrub par
K12D0686_H0689:408b-3: bgyi'o // de nas rig sngags 'chang gtsang ma gos
K12D0686_H0689:408b-4: gtsang ma bsgos pas legs par khrus byas te sman
K12D0686_H0689:408b-14: shing mya ngan med kyi me tog dang /
K12D0686_H0689:408b-22: byang chub shing gi 'o ma dang /
K12D0686_H0689:408b-24: 'di rnams cha mnyam par sbyar bar byas nas zangs
K12D0686_H0689:408b-25: kyi snod du gzhag par bgyi zhing dkrug par bgyi
K12D0686_H0689:408b-26: ste / zla ba phyed la ba'i 'o ma nyid du 'gyur te /
K12D0686_H0689:408b-28: ras ris la mngon du phyogs par gzhag par bya zhing /
K12D0686_H0689:408b-32: sa'i phyogs gtsang mar ras ris bzhag nas byams pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:408b-36: dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:408b-37: bstan zhing dpa' bas pha rol gnon pa'i go cha chen po bgos pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:408b-38: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchog tu dad cing gus pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:409a-0: byang chub don du gnyer zhing mngon @409a *//
K12D0686_H0689:409a-1: par 'dod bzhin pas nyi ma re re zhing ji
K12D0686_H0689:409a-2: ltar nus pa'i mchod pa sngon du 'gro bas zla
K12D0686_H0689:409a-3: phyed drug tu bzla bar bya'o //
K12D0686_H0689:409a-4: de nas rig sngags 'chang gis zla phyed drug rdzogs pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:409a-5: sman gyi mchog bskams la phye ma zhib mor byed
K12D0686_H0689:409a-6: du bcug ste zangs kyi snod du bzhag nas don
K12D0686_H0689:409a-7: yod rgyal po'i snying po stong rtsa brgyad bzlas shing
K12D0686_H0689:409a-8: / khro bo'i rgyal po stong rtsa brgyad du bzla'o //
K12D0686_H0689:409a-9: de nas tshes bco lnga'i nya la mtshan mo gsum
K12D0686_H0689:409a-10: du smyung bar gnas te sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
K12D0686_H0689:409a-11: dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la
K12D0686_H0689:409a-12: mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas phyogs bzhir gtor
K12D0686_H0689:409a-13: ma ches rgya che ba dbul bar bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:409a-14: de nas rig sngags 'chang gis sman gyi mchog dang /
K12D0686_H0689:409a-16: li kha ra dkar po dang /
K12D0686_H0689:409a-17: sbrang rtsi dang lhan cig sbyar bar bya'o //
K12D0686_H0689:409a-18: de nas slar yang stong phrag bcur bzla'o //
K12D0686_H0689:409a-19: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan snga ru zangs kyi snod la 'bar bar bgyid de /
K12D0686_H0689:409a-21: 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs pa rnams 'bar bar bgyid do //
K12D0686_H0689:409a-22: rig sngags 'chang gi lus 'bar bar 'gyur te /
K12D0686_H0689:409a-24: de nas rig sngags 'chang ba bzhin 'dzum pa yid la bya'o //
K12D0686_H0689:409a-26: prahma pu tra ka'i mar dang lhan cig sbyar la bdag gi lus bsku bar bya'o //
K12D0686_H0689:409b-0: bskus ba tsam @409b gyi mod la rang gi lus kyi pags pa gser gyi mdog tu 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:409b-1: lus rdo rje snying po bzhin du mi chod pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:409b-2: mi phigs par gyur nas 'khor brgya phrag stong dang
K12D0686_H0689:409b-3: bcas te 'phur bar 'gyur ro; ;skra la bskus na
K12D0686_H0689:409b-4: / skra sbu gser gyi mdog tu 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:409b-6: sen mo gser mdog tu 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:409b-9: mi lus gang dang gang du bskus pa de dang de nyid gser mdog tu 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:409b-10: til mar bzhag ste bcud kyis len mchog srang gcig nas [?] zangs srang stong gser du 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:409b-11: til mar dang sbyar ba zangs glebs pa la bskus te mer bsregs na /
K12D0686_H0689:409b-12: srang gcig gis srang bcu gser du 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:409b-15: zhun mar bzhi cha gcig dang sbyar te /
K12D0686_H0689:409b-16: me mi che bas bskol te chos par rig pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:409b-17: 'di de nas phyung la khrus legs par byas shing
K12D0686_H0689:409b-18: gos gsar ba bgos la gtsang mar byas te thog
K12D0686_H0689:409b-19: mar ba'i rnam lnga la reg par bya'o //
K12D0686_H0689:409b-20: de nas chu dron po dang bcud kyis len gyi mchog 'di btung bar bya'o //
K12D0686_H0689:409b-21: sbyor ba zhag bdun du byas na /
K12D0686_H0689:409b-22: de'i lus rnam par dag par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:409b-23: sdig pa thams cad zad pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:409b-24: mod la nyon mongs pa thams cad dang bral ba dang /
K12D0686_H0689:409b-25: nad thams cad byang ba dang /
K12D0686_H0689:409b-26: mod la dug thams cad sel ba dang /
K12D0686_H0689:409b-27: dug slar zhen par mi 'gyur ba dang /
K12D0686_H0689:410a-2: yang dug ma rungs pa gzhan gyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:410a-3: zhag bcu bzhir sbyor ba byas na /
K12D0686_H0689:410a-4: nad thams cad byang ba dang /
K12D0686_H0689:410a-5: 'di'i pags pa rnam par dag pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:410a-8: zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig sbyor ba byas na /
K12D0686_H0689:410a-9: byis pa lo bcu pa padma dkar sham dang 'dra ba'i mdog can gyi lus su 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:410a-11: ku mu da ltar 'jam pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:410a-12: autpa la sngon po lta bu'i mig dang /
K12D0686_H0689:410a-13: mi 'am ci'i dbyangs lta bur ma zhum pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:410a-14: dbu skra 'khyil la 'khyil cing bung ba ltar mdog nag pa lha rdzas lta bur 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:410a-15: zla ba gcig tu sbyor ba byas na /
K12D0686_H0689:410a-16: lo stong phrag bcur 'tsho bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:410a-19: srin pa'i tshogs kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:410a-20: 'byung po dang sdig pa byed pa gzhan rnams kyis kyang de mi mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:410a-21: lo gcig tshang bar bsnyen na /
K12D0686_H0689:410a-22: lha'i bu mo dag dang lhan cig rtse zhing /
K12D0686_H0689:410a-23: lha rdzas kyi longs spyod dang /
K12D0686_H0689:410a-25: ji ltar lha rnams rtse ba bzhin du 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:410a-26: dro bar gyur pa sbrang rtsi dang lhan cig zos
K12D0686_H0689:410a-27: na; lo khri nyis stong du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro
K12D0686_H0689:410a-30: bcud kyis len pa'i mchog srang gcig dang /
K12D0686_H0689:410b-0: dngul srang bcu zangs dang sbyar @410b te bzhu na /
K12D0686_H0689:410b-1: bcud kyis len mchog dngul srang stong du 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:410b-2: srang gcig gis zangs srang stong dngul du 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:410b-3: kha dog sna tshogs kyi 'od zer byung na ni /
K12D0686_H0689:410b-4: kha dog sna tshogs su 'gyur te /
K12D0686_H0689:410b-5: gzugs mdog sna tshogs kyi nor bu rin po che 'chang zhing /
K12D0686_H0689:410b-6: dngul dang gser bzhus la til mar dang lhan cig
K12D0686_H0689:410b-7: bskol te mgo bo la bskus pa tsam gyi mod
K12D0686_H0689:410b-8: la skra mdog sna tshogs su 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:410b-10: kha dog sna tshogs kyi 'od zer 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:410b-12: nam mkha' la 'gro zhing khyim thams cad kyi sgo
K12D0686_H0689:410b-13: phye bar mthong ste; khyim bdag thams cad kyi dpon
K12D0686_H0689:410b-15: dpral ba la thig le byas na mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:410b-17: gang dang smra ba de nor gyi dbang dang /
K12D0686_H0689:410b-19: yang na ba ser skya'i 'o ma mar dang /
K12D0686_H0689:410b-22: bcud kyis len gyi mchog 'bar ba dang lhan cig
K12D0686_H0689:410b-23: bskor te kha ra bzhin du legs par tshos pa
K12D0686_H0689:410b-24: dang blangs la don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying po
K12D0686_H0689:410b-25: brgya stong bzlas brjod byas te rig sngags 'chang ba
K12D0686_H0689:410b-26: bdag nyid bskus pa tsam gyi mod la thams cad
K12D0686_H0689:410b-27: rig 'dzin gyi 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:410b-28: bskal ba chen po bcur 'tsho bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:410b-29: bar gyi bskal bar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:411a-0: byang chub kyi snying po mchog tu lung bstan pa @411a *//
K12D0686_H0689:411a-4: aom zhes bya ba'i sgras tshangs pa gnas nas phyir 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:411a-5: se gol gtogs ba tsam gyis 'og min gyi bar du 'gro zhing phyir yang 'ong bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:411a-6: nam gyi tshe 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ba
K12D0686_H0689:411a-7: de'i tshe bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams
K12D0686_H0689:411a-10: skye ba tha ma yin zhing mngal na gnas pa las yongs su thar pa yin no //
K12D0686_H0689:411a-11: de nas don yod pa'i ril bu brjod par bya ste /
K12D0686_H0689:411a-12: rig sngags 'chang ba sgrub par byed pa legs par bsgrubs na /

K12D0686_H0689:411b-1: gsang sngags stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya'o //

K12D0686_H0689:412a-21: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod pa
K12D0686_H0689:412a-22: rgya cher bya zhing gtor ma yang rgya cher byin

K12D0686_H0689:412a-25: snying po stong rtsa brgyad kyi bar du bzlas brjod

K12D0686_H0689:412a-27: de nas ril bu 'gul bar 'gyur na /

K12D0686_H0689:412b-3: de nas rig sngags 'chang bas 'phags pa spyan ras
K12D0686_H0689:412b-4: gzigs kyi dbang phyug la mchod pa byas te nam
K12D0686_H0689:412b-5: langs ka skya rengs ser po 'char ba'i dus su

K12D0686_H0689:412b-7: dpa' thams cad la phyag byas nas sems can thams
K12D0686_H0689:412b-8: cad la byams pa'i sems bya'o //
K12D0686_H0689:412b-9: grogs byed pa la yang byin te; ril bu gcig khar gzhug par bya'o //
K12D0686_H0689:412b-10: ril bu khar bcug pa tsam gyi mod la mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:412b-12: dpag tshad lnga stong du 'gro zhing slar yang 'ong bar 'gyur /
K12D0686_H0689:412b-13: ril bu sgrub par byed pa tshegs med par grub
K12D0686_H0689:412b-14: pa rnams kyi 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur
K12D0686_H0689:412b-15: / tshe lo lnga stong thub par 'gyur /
K12D0686_H0689:412b-16: khru gang tsam gyis rkang pas la mi reg par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:412b-17: de nas gter rko bar 'dod pas gnas gang na

K12D0686_H0689:412b-22: sha dang khrag gi gtor ma dang /

K12D0686_H0689:412b-26: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod pa bya'o //
K12D0686_H0689:412b-27: stong phrag bcu bzlas brjod bya'o //
K12D0686_H0689:412b-28: stong phrag bcu tshang ba dang /

K12D0686_H0689:413a-13: 'byung po thams cad bcings par 'gyur ro //

K12D0686_H0689:413a-24: dmag bcing bar 'dod pas yungs kar dang /

K12D0686_H0689:413a-28: gi mdun du shing nim pa'i me sbar te thog
K12D0686_H0689:413b-0: brgyad brgya bzlas @413b brjod lan gsum pa byas na /

K12D0686_H0689:413b-14: la mchod pa bya'o; ;de nas rig sngags 'chang ba
K12D0686_H0689:413b-15: dbyug pa blangs te kun tu lan bdun bskor bar
K12D0686_H0689:413b-16: bya'o // de nas dbyug pa de sa la brdab par bya'o //

K12D0686_H0689:414a-13: rig sngags 'chang bas dhig dhig ces khros pa byas pa dang /

K12D0686_H0689:414a-27: lha'i rma bya'i mdog 'dra ba'i skrar 'gyur zhing skra 'khyil la 'khyil bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:414a-28: rna ba'i bu gar blugs na /
K12D0686_H0689:414b-0: dpag tshad stong phrag @414b gsum du thos par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:414b-1: dpag tshad stong phrag gsum du mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:414b-3: bskal pa stong phrag bcu 'tsho bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:414b-4: bar gyi bskal ba rjes su dran par 'gyur ro //

K12D0686_H0689:415a-4: rgyal po dang dpon por 'gyur ro //

K12D0686_H0689:415a-8: pa lag pa g-yas pas bzung ste don yod pa'i

K12D0686_H0689:415b-13: gang 'dod pa de thams cad sbyin par byed do //

K12D0686_H0689:415b-17: rnam thos kyi sras rgyug cing mdun na gnas par 'gyur ro //

K12D0686_H0689:415b-19: gang 'dod pa de thams cad mdzad par 'gyur ro //

K12D0686_H0689:415b-27: grong khyer na gnas pa'i bud med dang /
K12D0686_H0689:415b-30: bu mo rnams dbang du 'gyur zhing gnas so //

K12D0686_H0689:416a-1: ba de thams cad byed par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:416a-2: gang 'dod pa de thams cad sbyin par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:416a-3: nyi ma 'char ba'i tshe nyi ma'i mdun du bskor

K12D0686_H0689:416a-20: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ba dang /
K12D0686_H0689:416a-21: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dbugs 'byin par mdzad pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:416a-22: bsam pa dang re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par mdzad par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:416a-23: yang na 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi

K12D0686_H0689:416b-1: dgos pa thams cad grub par mdzad par 'gyur ro //

K12D0686_H0689:416b-4: pa'i tshe klu'i gnas su song ste don yod pa'i
K12D0686_H0689:416b-5: rgyal po'i snying po dran par bya /
K12D0686_H0689:416b-7: bskor ba tsam gyi mod la klu rnams char ba'i rgyun chen po 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:416b-8: ci 'dod pa'i char gyi rgyun 'bebs so //
K12D0686_H0689:416b-10: khang thog tu don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po skad drag pos brjod de dbyug pa bskor na /
K12D0686_H0689:416b-12: ser ba 'bab pa'i tshe sprin logs su bltas de
K12D0686_H0689:416b-13: khros pas khro bo'i rgyal po skad chen pos dran
K12D0686_H0689:416b-14: par bya zhing khros pas dbyug pa bskor na /
K12D0686_H0689:416b-18: dpag tshad tshun chad du mtshams chen po kun tu bcad par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:416b-19: gdon kun gyis zin pa la khro bo'i rgyal po
K12D0686_H0689:416b-20: la lan bdun dran par bya zhing dbyug pa bstan
K12D0686_H0689:416b-21: na / gdon thams cad du 'bros par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:416b-22: brjed byed la sogs pa'i bar la bstan pa tsam gyis 'bros par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:416b-23: rims thams cad la don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying pos bya bas na /
K12D0686_H0689:416b-24: byabs pa tsam gyi mod la rims thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:417a-1: pa'i tshe don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying po khros pas bzlas brjod bya /
K12D0686_H0689:417a-2: dbyug pa bskor ba byas na /
K12D0686_H0689:417a-5: lag cha thams cad mi snang bar 'gyur zhing /
K12D0686_H0689:417a-6: pha rol gyi dpung rnams kyi hud kyi hud zer zhing 'bros par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:417a-7: 'brog dgon pa'i nang du 'gron po rnams song ba
K12D0686_H0689:417a-8: na don yod pa'i rgyal po dran par bya zhing
K12D0686_H0689:417a-9: dbyug pa bskor ba byas na /
K12D0686_H0689:417a-21: dug dang bcas pa'i srog chags de dag thams cad mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:417a-22: rang gi khyim du bde bar 'gro bar 'gyur ro /
K12D0686_H0689:417a-30: bu mo'i nad chen po byung ba'i tshe don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying po dang /
K12D0686_H0689:417a-31: khro bo'i rgyal po'i skad chen pos dran par bya
K12D0686_H0689:417a-32: zhing dbyug pa grong khyer gyi sgo bzhir bskor ba
K12D0686_H0689:417a-33: byas na / bskor ba tsam gyi mod la mi ngas dang /
K12D0686_H0689:417a-40: mtshang 'dru ba thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:417b-0: 'jigs pa thams cad las grol @417b par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:417b-3: gnas mthon por 'dug ste skad chen pos don yod
K12D0686_H0689:417b-4: pa'i rgyal po'i snying po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig
K12D0686_H0689:417b-5: dran par bya'o // dbyug pa bskor bar bya'o //
K12D0686_H0689:417b-6: gang gi ched du bya ba de ming brjod par byas na /
K12D0686_H0689:417b-7: dpag tshad brgya nas kyang de 'ong zhing bdag dang
K12D0686_H0689:417b-8: nor la dbang bya bar yod cing gnas par 'gyur
K12D0686_H0689:417b-9: ro // ji srid 'tsho'i bar du gnas par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:417b-10: 'on te nor bu bzang po'i sras dgug par 'dod na /
K12D0686_H0689:417b-11: zla ba yar gyi ngo tshes bcu bzhi la smyung
K12D0686_H0689:417b-12: ba byas te dbyug pa la don yod pa'i rgyal
K12D0686_H0689:417b-13: po'i snying po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod
K12D0686_H0689:417b-14: bya ste / nor bzang gi sras kyi lto ba'i steng du gzhag par bya /
K12D0686_H0689:417b-15: khro bo'i rgyal po bzlas ba byas na /
K12D0686_H0689:417b-16: bzhi thun gyi tho rangs tsam na nor bu bzang
K12D0686_H0689:417b-17: po'i sras rang nyid rig sngags 'chang ba'i mdun na
K12D0686_H0689:417b-19: gser gyi dong tse stong phrag bcu sbyin par mdzad do //
K12D0686_H0689:417b-20: de las dkon mchog gsum gyi sku skal dbul bar bya /
K12D0686_H0689:417b-21: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug la mchod pa bya /
K12D0686_H0689:417b-22: nor bu bzang po'i sras la mchod yon gyi chab dbul bar bya /
K12D0686_H0689:417b-23: nyi ma re re zhing nor bzang gi sras la mchod yon gyi chab phul na /
K12D0686_H0689:417b-24: nam 'tsho'i bar du nyi ma re re zhing gser gyi dong tse stong sbyin par mdzad do //
K12D0686_H0689:418a-0: de nas rig sngags 'chang bas phyed dam bzhi cha gcig @418a *//
K12D0686_H0689:418a-3: bsod nams bsags par byas la nor bu bzang po'i
K12D0686_H0689:418a-4: sras dang lhan cig tu rjes su yi rang bar
K12D0686_H0689:418a-5: bya'o // 'brog dgon pa'i nang du 'brog dgon pa
K12D0686_H0689:418a-6: gang na chu dkon par dbyug pa la lan nyi
K12D0686_H0689:418a-7: shu rtsa gcig don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po
K12D0686_H0689:418a-9: gang na ne'u gsing sngon po yod pa'i gnas der
K12D0686_H0689:418a-10: sa la lan bdun brdab cing bskor te skad drag
K12D0686_H0689:418a-11: pos don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying po dran par
K12D0686_H0689:418a-12: bya / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug la nyam thag thag skad du byas na /
K12D0686_H0689:418a-13: de nas gnas gang du brdabs pa'i gnas der lha
K12D0686_H0689:418a-14: rdzas kyi chu ha cang grang ba yang ma yin
K12D0686_H0689:418a-15: / ha cang dro ba yang ma yin /
K12D0686_H0689:418a-16: ro dang chas pa yod pa'i rdzing bu 'byung bar 'gyur /
K12D0686_H0689:418a-17: ro; ;de nas rig sngags 'chang bas dbyug pa la
K12D0686_H0689:418a-18: khro bo'i rgyal po lan bdun bzlas brjod bya ste
K12D0686_H0689:418a-19: / rdzing bu'i nang du chu la brdab par bya'o //
K12D0686_H0689:418a-20: de nas rdzing bu'i nang nas mi ser skya bo
K12D0686_H0689:418a-21: zhig byung ste rig sngags 'chang ba la thal mo
K12D0686_H0689:418a-22: khong stong du sbyar nas mdun na 'dug ste rig
K12D0686_H0689:418a-23: sngags 'chang ba ci 'dod ces smra bar 'gyur ro
K12D0686_H0689:418a-24: // rig sngags 'chang bas bdag ni; kha zas kyi ched du lags kyi /
K12D0686_H0689:418a-25: stsal du gsol zhes brjod par bya'o //
K12D0686_H0689:418a-26: de nas rig sngags 'chang bas mi de la shis pa'i tshig brjod par bya'o //
K12D0686_H0689:418b-0: de nas mi de rdzing bu'i nang du @418b zhugs pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:418b-1: skad cig thang gcig yud tsam la kha zas dang
K12D0686_H0689:418b-2: btung ba'i ro zhim po rnam pa sna tshogs yod
K12D0686_H0689:418b-3: par byed cing rig sngags 'chang ba la sbyin par
K12D0686_H0689:418b-4: byed do // skye bo stong phrag brgya'i ston mo
K12D0686_H0689:418b-5: byar yod cing yo byad phun sum tshogs pa shin
K12D0686_H0689:418b-7: gal te rig sngags 'chang bas rdzing bu med par mi byed na /
K12D0686_H0689:418b-8: rdzing bu de dus rtag tu gnas par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:418b-11: 'gron po thams cad yo byad thams cad kyis brel ba med par 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:418b-12: 'on te don yod pa sna tshogs bya bar 'dod
K12D0686_H0689:418b-13: na; rig sngags 'chang ba des lan nyi shu rtsa
K12D0686_H0689:418b-14: gcig bzlas brjod byas pa'i dri chus khrus byas la
K12D0686_H0689:418b-16: mi smra bar dbyug pa la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas te bskor bar bya'o //
K12D0686_H0689:418b-17: de nas 'khor dang skye bo mang po 'khor zhing rmongs par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:418b-18: de nas dbyug pa bskor ba byas na /
K12D0686_H0689:418b-19: yid la ji ltar sems dpa'i ngo bo de bzhin du thams cad ston par byed do //
K12D0686_H0689:418b-20: 'bras bu dang me tog gi char 'bebs so //
K12D0686_H0689:418b-21: sgyu ma rnam pa sna tshogs ston par byed do //
K12D0686_H0689:418b-22: de nas ro langs bslang bar 'dod na /
K12D0686_H0689:418b-23: rig sngags 'chang ba des legs par khrus byas shing
K12D0686_H0689:418b-24: gos gsar pa bgos te gtsang mar byas la dur
K12D0686_H0689:418b-25: khrod du song ste dbyug pa la don yod pa'i
K12D0686_H0689:418b-26: rgyal po'i snying po lan bdun bzlas brjod byas nas
K12D0686_H0689:419a-1: lan bdun bzlas brjod byed cing dur khrod kyi nang du bskor ba byas na /
K12D0686_H0689:419a-2: dpag tshad tshun chad du kun tu mtshams bcad par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:419a-5: srin po ma rungs pa thams cad bcings par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:419a-6: de nas rig sngags 'chang bas mi ro blangs te bkru bar bya'o //
K12D0686_H0689:419a-7: ba'i rnam lngas sbyang bar bya'o //
K12D0686_H0689:419a-8: ba'i lci bas dkyil 'khor gru bzhi lham par bya'o //
K12D0686_H0689:419a-9: seng ldeng gi phur pa tshad sor bcu gnyis pa bzhi gru bzhir gzugs par bya'o //
K12D0686_H0689:419a-10: tshon sna lnga'i skud pas dkyil 'khor kun tu bskor
K12D0686_H0689:419a-11: bar bya'o; ;mi ro ras dkar pos dkri bar byas
K12D0686_H0689:419a-12: la dkyil 'khor dbus su gzhug par bya'o //
K12D0686_H0689:419a-13: me tog gis gtor bar bya'o //
K12D0686_H0689:419a-14: gtor ma dkar po gzhag par bya'o //
K12D0686_H0689:419a-15: mchod yon gyi chu gzhag par bya'o //
K12D0686_H0689:419a-16: gu gul gyi bdug pa sbyin par bya'o //
K12D0686_H0689:419a-17: rig sngags 'chang ba shar phyogs su kha bltas te
K12D0686_H0689:419a-18: 'dug la dbyug pa lag pa g-yas par bzhag ste
K12D0686_H0689:419a-19: rig pa'i rgyal po gdon par bya'o //
K12D0686_H0689:419a-20: khro bo'i rgyal po lan drug cu dran par bya'o //
K12D0686_H0689:419a-22: lag pa g-yas pa'i dbyug pas brdab pa byas na /
K12D0686_H0689:419a-25: langs te phyogs bcur lta bar 'gyur /
K12D0686_H0689:419a-26: rig sngags 'chang bas dbyug pa de spyi bor bzhag par byas na /
K12D0686_H0689:419a-27: mi ro de tshig smra bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:419b-0: rig sngags 'chang bas @419b gsang sngags dran par bya'o //
K12D0686_H0689:419b-1: yid kyis bsam par byas na /
K12D0686_H0689:419b-2: mi ro de thams cad smra bar 'gyur te /
K12D0686_H0689:419b-6: ma 'ongs pa na 'byung ba smra bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:419b-7: de nas rig sngags 'chang bas dbyug pa snying gar bzhag par byas na /
K12D0686_H0689:419b-9: khrag des thig le byas na /
K12D0686_H0689:419b-10: khyim thams cad la sgo srung med cing sgo thams cad gdangs par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:419b-14: bu mo thams cad dbang du gyur cing 'dug go /
K12D0686_H0689:419b-15: dbyug pa snying gar btsir na skyug par 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:419b-16: rig sngags 'chang bas blangs te mtha' dag bza' bar bya'o //
K12D0686_H0689:419b-17: zos pa tsam gyis nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:419b-18: 'byung bo chen po'i bdag po dang /
K12D0686_H0689:419b-19: dbang phyug chen po 'dra bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:419b-20: lha'i lo stong du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:419b-21: aom zhes bya bas dbyug pas btsir la bsdigs pa byas na /
K12D0686_H0689:419b-23: rig sngags 'chang bas bcad la rig sngags 'chang bas
K12D0686_H0689:419b-24: blang bar bya'o; ;blangs pa tsam gyis nam mkha' la
K12D0686_H0689:419b-26: rig sngags 'chang ba ral gri'i 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:419b-28: rig sngags 'chang ba bco brgyad kyi 'khor gyis bskor bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:419b-29: de nas rig sngags 'chang bas mi ro'i spyi bor dbyug pas brdabs na /
K12D0686_H0689:420a-0: sgra 'byung bar 'gyur zhing shi ba'i ro gcig tu mkhregs @420a *//
K12D0686_H0689:420a-1: pa'i gser yin pas blang ba byas na /
K12D0686_H0689:420a-2: srang gcig gis zangs srang stong gser du 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:420a-4: 'jig rten ba sgrub pa'i cho ga yin no //
K12D0686_H0689:420a-5: de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras
K12D0686_H0689:420a-6: gzigs kyi dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di
K12D0686_H0689:420a-10: sems can thams cad la snying brtse ba'i phyir bdag
K12D0686_H0689:420a-11: gi 'jig rten ba sgrub pa'i cho ga lags so
K12D0686_H0689:420a-12: // de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pas bka' stsal pa /
K12D0686_H0689:420a-14: sems can thams cad la snying brtse ba'i phyir 'jig
K12D0686_H0689:420a-15: rten las 'das pa'i cho ga dam pa gsang ba'i
K12D0686_H0689:420a-16: snying po dang / dkyil 'khor dag blo brtan po 'jigs pa med pa thob par 'gyur ba dang /
K12D0686_H0689:420a-17: rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi dam pa sgrub par
K12D0686_H0689:420a-18: byed pa de kho na nyid grub par 'gyur ba
K12D0686_H0689:420a-21: sgrub par byed pa tsam gyis de dag thams cad grub pa chen po thob par 'gyur ba dang /
K12D0686_H0689:420a-22: bsam pa chen po yongs su rdzogs pa grub par 'gyur ba dang /
K12D0686_H0689:420a-23: mchog grub pa chen po so sor thob par 'gyur ba dang /
K12D0686_H0689:420a-24: rig sngags 'chang ba'i 'dod par gtogs pa bsam pa
K12D0686_H0689:420a-25: thams cad yongs su rdzogs par grub par 'gyur ba
K12D0686_H0689:420a-26: smros shig / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
K12D0686_H0689:420b-0: dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan @420b ras gzigs dbang
K12D0686_H0689:420b-1: phyug bcom ldan 'das kyi drung nas dbugs 'byin pa
K12D0686_H0689:420b-2: smros shig / dang / bsgo ba thos nas shin tu yid dga' ba chen por 'gyur te /
K12D0686_H0689:420b-3: de stan las langs nas bla gos phrag pa gcig
K12D0686_H0689:420b-4: tu gzar te pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa
K12D0686_H0689:420b-5: la btsugs nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de
K12D0686_H0689:420b-6: logs su thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das kyi
K12D0686_H0689:420b-7: zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te me tog
K12D0686_H0689:420b-19: spud pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bcom ldan 'das
K12D0686_H0689:420b-20: la mchod pa dang bsnyen bkur chen po byas te
K12D0686_H0689:420b-21: mchod nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor mang por byang chub
K12D0686_H0689:420b-22: sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag dkyil 'khor
K12D0686_H0689:420b-24: gang dag rig 'dzin grub pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:420b-33: gang dag don yod pa'i zhags pa'i rnam par grol
K12D0686_H0689:420b-34: ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dam tshig la rjes su zhugs
K12D0686_H0689:420b-35: pa dang / gang dag ri po po ta la
K12D0686_H0689:420b-36: na gnas pa de dag thams cad kyi me tog
K12D0686_H0689:420b-37: pa dang / dang / bdug pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:421a-1: mchod pa byas te yid dga' bar gyur to //
K12D0686_H0689:421a-2: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das la stong phrag brgya bskor ba byas /
K12D0686_H0689:421a-3: 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de la yang mchod pa byas
K12D0686_H0689:421a-4: nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su
K12D0686_H0689:421a-5: thal mo sbyar te btud nas bcom ldan 'das kyi
K12D0686_H0689:421a-6: spyan sngar mig mi 'dzum par 'dug ste bcom ldan
K12D0686_H0689:421a-7: 'das la tshig 'jam po 'jam pos 'di skad ces
K12D0686_H0689:421a-10: rmad du byung ba rnam par lta ba don yod pa'i cho 'phrul /
K12D0686_H0689:421a-11: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor dang /
K12D0686_H0689:421a-12: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rmad du byung
K12D0686_H0689:421a-13: ba de kho na nyid rnam par 'phrul pa rnam
K12D0686_H0689:421a-14: par snang mdzad kyi byin gyi rlabs dang /
K12D0686_H0689:421a-15: dam tshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor don yod pa'i rnam par lta ba'i zhags pa'i snying po dang /
K12D0686_H0689:421a-16: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bklags pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:421a-17: sgrub par byed pa grub pa mchog tu gyur pa'i snying po dang /
K12D0686_H0689:421a-18: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i mchog sgrub pa de bzhin
K12D0686_H0689:421a-19: gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs shing lung
K12D0686_H0689:421a-21: de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bcom
K12D0686_H0689:421a-22: ldan 'das kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis rig sngags 'chang
K12D0686_H0689:421a-23: thams cad mchog tu grub par bya ba'i phyir dang
K12D0686_H0689:421b-0: / sems @421b can thams cad bsgral ba'i phyir dmyal ba dang /
K12D0686_H0689:421b-4: sdig pa mi bzad pa 'joms pa /
K12D0686_H0689:421b-5: ngan song thams cad sel ba /
K12D0686_H0689:421b-6: 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sdig pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:421b-7: sgrib pa nges par sreg par byed pa yongs su bsgrag par bgyi'o //
K12D0686_H0689:421b-10: byang chub sems dpa' spong ba dang /
K12D0686_H0689:421b-11: dam pa'i chos spong ba dang /
K12D0686_H0689:421b-12: mtshams med pa la gzhol ba dang /
K12D0686_H0689:421b-16: byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad spong bar byed pa de dag gis mnyan pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:421b-20: 'chad pa tsam gyis thams cad byang bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:421b-21: nga mthong ba tsam gyis thams cad zad par 'gyur /
K12D0686_H0689:421b-27: phrag dog thams cad bral bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:421b-29: sgrib pa thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:421b-30: 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sdug bsngal skye ba dang /
K12D0686_H0689:422a-3: yid mi bde ba thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0686_H0689:422a-43: drug dang bcas pa'i srog chags 'jigs pa sna tshogs dang bcas pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:422a-53: byi ba kha gdug pa'i 'jigs pa thams cad ni /
K12D0686_H0689:422a-56: mthong ba tsam gyis thams cad rnam par zhig par 'gyur /
K12D0686_H0689:422b-1: mod la phye mar brlags par 'gyur ro //

K12D0686_H0689:428a-32: de dang mnyam pa yin no //
K12D0686_H0689:428b-1: ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
K12D0686_H0689:428b-2: dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pas bskal
K12D0686_H0689:428b-3: pa grangs med pa gsum du dka' ba la zhugs
K12D0686_H0689:428b-4: pa dang / sangs rgyas te chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i bar yin no //
K12D0686_H0689:428b-16: sems can gzhan gang yang rung bas gzungs 'di'i dkyil 'khor dang /
K12D0686_H0689:428b-17: cho ga stobs chen po dang /
K12D0686_H0689:428b-18: pha rol gnon pa'i brtson 'grus kyis sgrub par byed pa 'di ni /
K12D0686_H0689:428b-19: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i cho ga tshol ba yin no //
K12D0686_H0689:428b-29: phyag rgya bcings te sgrub pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:428b-34: kun chub par byed pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:428b-35: tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:428b-37: dus gsum du lan gsum don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po dran pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:428b-38: khro bo'i rgyal pos dbang bskur ba dang /
K12D0686_H0689:428b-39: gzungs 'di yang lan nyi shu rtsa gcig tu bzlas brjod dang /
K12D0686_H0689:428b-43: byams pas snying brlan pa dang /
K12D0686_H0689:429a-1: can thams cad la snying brtse ba lhur byed pa de ni /
K12D0686_H0689:429a-2: dka' ba spyod pa chen po la zhugs pa yin no //
K12D0686_H0689:429a-3: bskal pa grangs med pa gsum du dka' ba spyod pa la zhugs pa dang 'dra ba'am /
K12D0686_H0689:429a-5: de'i tshe 'di nyid la 'bras bu chen po thob par 'gyur ba dang /
K12D0686_H0689:429a-6: 'jig rten las 'das pa zhes bya ba dang /
